title: Exciton-polaron Umklapp scattering in Wigner crystals
summary: Strong Coulomb interactions in two-dimensional (2D) semiconductors give rise to tightly bound excitons, exciton polarons, and correlated electronic phases such as Wigner crystals (WCs), yet their mutual interplay remains poorly understood. Here we report the observation of multi-branch excitonic Umklapp scattering in both electron and hole WCs realized in ultraclean monolayer WSe$_2$, exhibiting exceptionally high melting temperatures (T$_c$ $\approx$ 20-30 K). Robust Wigner crystallization activates multiple finite-momentum optical resonances, including quasilinearly dispersing, light-like excitons and exciton polarons, extending far beyond the single excitonic Umklapp feature reported previously. Helicity-resolved magneto-optical measurements reveal a pronounced valley dependence of the scattering processes. Combined experiment and theory identify a polaron-induced brightening mechanism in which exciton polarons transfer oscillator strength from bright zero-momentum states to otherwise dark finite-momentum states, explaining the emergence of multiple Umklapp branches where conventional exciton-WC scattering is ineffective. These results establish WC polarons as a new quasiparticle paradigm and introduce polaron-induced Umklapp scattering as a general route to accessing finite-momentum many-body excitations in 2D quantum materials.

AI.tldr: 在超净单层WSe₂中观察到电子和空穴维格纳晶体中的多分支激子Umklapp散射，揭示了极化子诱导的亮化机制，建立了维格纳晶体极化子作为新的准粒子范式。
AI.motivation: 二维半导体中的强库仑相互作用产生紧密结合的激子、激子极化子和维格纳晶体等关联电子相，但它们之间的相互作用机制尚不清楚，需要深入研究。
AI.method: 在超净单层WSe₂中实现电子和空穴维格纳晶体，通过螺旋分辨磁光测量观察多分支激子Umklapp散射，结合实验和理论分析极化子诱导的亮化机制。
AI.result: 观察到高达20-30K熔化温度的稳健维格纳晶体，激活了多个有限动量光学共振，包括类光激子和激子极化子。螺旋分辨测量显示散射过程的显著谷依赖性，理论分析揭示了极化子将振子强度从亮零动量态转移到暗有限动量态的机制。
AI.conclusion: 建立了维格纳晶体极化子作为新的准粒子范式，提出极化子诱导的Umklapp散射作为访问二维量子材料中有限动量多体激发的通用途径。

title: Laughlin pumping assisted by surface acoustic waves
summary: The quantum Hall effect is a fascinating electrical transport phenomenon signified by precise quantization of Hall conductivity $σ_\mathrm{xy}$ and vanishing longitudinal conductivity $σ_\mathrm{xx}$. Laughlin proposed an elegant explanation in which adiabatic insertion of a flux tube pumps charge through the system. This analysis unveils the fundamental role of gauge invariance and provides a compelling argument about the fractional charge of fractional quantum Hall states. While it has been used extensively as a theoretical tool, a quantitative experimental investigation is lacking despite multiple attempts. Here we report successful realizations of Laughlin pumping in several integer and fractional quantum Hall states. One essential technical innovation is using surface acoustic waves to periodically clear the charges accumulated during the pumping process. Magnetic fluxes are inserted at a constant rate so there is no need to perform complicated data fitting. Furthermore, our setting can reliably extract $σ_\mathrm{xx}$ that is several orders of magnitude lower than the limit of conventional techniques. Effective energy gaps can be deduced from the temperature dependence of $σ_\mathrm{xx}$, which are drastically different from those provided by conventional transport data. This work not only brings a famous gedanken experiment to reality but also serves as a portal for many future investigations.

AI.tldr: 实验首次成功实现Laughlin泵浦，利用表面声波技术清除累积电荷，直接测量量子霍尔电导，无需复杂数据拟合，并能提取极低的纵向电导。
AI.motivation: Laughlin泵浦理论虽然被广泛用作理论工具，但缺乏定量实验验证。尽管多次尝试，仍未有成功的实验实现。
AI.method: 使用表面声波周期性清除泵浦过程中积累的电荷，以恒定速率插入磁通量，无需复杂数据拟合。该设置能可靠提取比传统技术极限低几个数量级的纵向电导。
AI.result: 成功在多个整数和分数量子霍尔态中实现Laughlin泵浦。从纵向电导的温度依赖性推导出有效能隙，这些能隙与传统输运数据提供的能隙显著不同。
AI.conclusion: 该工作不仅将著名的思想实验变为现实，而且为许多未来研究提供了门户，开辟了新的实验途径。

title: Magnetoexcitons and Massive Dirac Fermions in Monolayers of Transition Metal Dichalcogenides in a High Magnetic Field
summary: We present a theory of the emission spectrum of magnetoexcitons interacting with a $ν= 1$ quantum Hall state of massive Dirac fermions in monolayer transition metal dichalcogenides in high magnetic fields. Using an ab initio-parametrized massive Dirac fermion model including valley and spin degrees of freedom, combined with exact diagonalization techniques, we show that interband emission from the massive Dirac Fermion magnetoexciton interacting with $ν= 1$ state directly probes intra-conduction-band excitations of the $ν= 1$. Many-body interactions with the filled massive Dirac fermion $ν= 1$ level yield a strong renormalization of the emission spectrum, including fully polarized emission, a pronounced redshift, and broadening relative to neutral and charged excitons. The calculated spectra are consistent with recent experiments [1-3], establishing magneto-spectroscopy as a probe of finite carrier densities in massive Dirac systems.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种理论，用于描述单层过渡金属二硫化物中磁激子与ν=1量子霍尔态相互作用的发射光谱，揭示了磁光谱可作为探测狄拉克系统中有限载流子密度的探针。
AI.motivation: 研究单层过渡金属二硫化物中磁激子与ν=1量子霍尔态相互作用的发射光谱，以理解强磁场下狄拉克系统的光学响应特性，并与最近的实验结果进行对比验证。
AI.method: 采用从头算参数化的含谷和自旋自由度的有质量狄拉克费米子模型，结合精确对角化技术，分析磁激子与ν=1量子霍尔态的相互作用。
AI.result: 计算显示磁激子发射光谱直接探测ν=1态的带内激发，与填充的ν=1能级的多体相互作用导致光谱强烈重整化，包括完全偏振发射、显著红移和相对于中性及带电激子的展宽，与实验观测一致。
AI.conclusion: 磁光谱可作为探测有质量狄拉克系统中有限载流子密度的有效探针，为理解强磁场下二维材料的量子光学性质提供了理论框架。

title: Ratchet effect in lateral plasmonic crystal: Giant enhancement due to interference of "bright" and "dark" modes
summary: We develop a theory of the ratchet effect in a lateral plasmonic crystal (LPC) formed by a two dimensional electron gas under a periodic dual-grating gate. The system is driven by terahertz radiation, and the spatial asymmetry required for the generation of dc photocurrent is introduced by a phase shift between the radiation's near-field modulation and the static electron density profile. In contrast to the commonly used perturbative "minimal model" of the ratchet effect, which assumes weak density modulation, we solve the problem exactly with respect to the static gate-induced potential while treating the radiation field perturbatively. This approach reveals a dramatic enhancement of the plasmonic contribution to the ratchet current due to the interference of "bright" and "dark" plasmon modes, which are excited on an equal footing in the asymmetric LPC. Specifically, we predict a parametric growth of the plasmonic peak as compared with the Drude peak with increasing coupling, and the appearance of a dense super-resonant structure when the spacing between plasmonic sub-bands becomes larger than the damping rate. Hence, the dc response exhibits both resonant and super-resonant regimes observed in recent experiments on the radiation transmission through the LPC. The interplay of bright and dark modes, together with their interference, provides a powerful mechanism for controlling the magnitude and sign of the photocurrent by gate voltages and the radiation frequency.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种横向等离子体晶体中棘轮效应的精确理论，揭示了亮暗等离子体模式干涉导致的直流光电流显著增强机制。
AI.motivation: 传统棘轮效应的"最小模型"采用弱密度调制近似，无法准确描述强耦合条件下的等离子体贡献。需要发展精确理论来解释实验观测到的共振和超共振现象。
AI.method: 采用精确求解静态栅极诱导势能的方法，同时将辐射场作为微扰处理。这种方法考虑了亮暗等离子体模式的平等激发和干涉效应。
AI.result: 发现等离子体对棘轮电流的贡献显著增强，表现为等离子体峰相对于Drude峰的参数化增长，以及阻尼率小于等离子体子带间距时出现的密集超共振结构。
AI.conclusion: 亮暗模式的干涉为通过栅极电压和辐射频率控制光电流大小和符号提供了强大机制，解释了实验中观察到的共振和超共振现象。

title: Robustness of the Kohn-Luttinger mechanism against symmetry breaking
summary: We investigate how strongly broken spatial symmetries affect the Kohn--Luttinger (KL) mechanism, in which superconductivity emerges purely from repulsive interactions. While the original KL argument assumes continuous rotational symmetry, real materials possess only discrete point-group symmetries, raising a central question: can sufficiently strong symmetry breaking suppress or eliminate KL superconductivity? Using controlled perturbation theory and explicit two-dimensional models with Ising and Rashba spin--orbit coupling (SOC), we find that KL superconductivity is broadly robust and exhibits qualitatively universal behavior across models: the transition temperature $T_c$ is nonmonotonic in the symmetry-breaking field, shows a pronounced maximum at scales of the order of the Fermi energy, and decays exponentially toward zero at asymptotically large fields. However, the physical mechanisms determining this suppression may differ between models. Overall, these results demonstrate that KL-type superconductivity can persist across a wide class of spin--orbit-coupled systems.

AI.tldr: 研究空间对称性破缺对Kohn-Luttinger超导机制的影响，发现即使存在强对称性破缺，KL超导仍然普遍存在且具有定性普适行为。
AI.motivation: 原始KL机制假设连续旋转对称性，但实际材料只有离散点群对称性。核心问题是：足够强的对称性破缺是否会抑制或消除KL超导？
AI.method: 使用受控微扰理论和具有Ising及Rashba自旋轨道耦合的二维模型进行研究。
AI.result: KL超导具有广泛鲁棒性，跨模型表现出定性普适行为：转变温度Tc在对称性破缺场中呈非单调变化，在费米能级量级处出现显著最大值，在渐近大场中指数衰减至零。
AI.conclusion: KL型超导可以在广泛的自旋轨道耦合系统中持续存在，尽管不同模型的物理抑制机制可能不同。

title: Developing a Machine-Learning Interatomic Potential for Non-Covalent Interactions in Proteins
comment: Main text: 42 pages,8 figures; Supplementary Information: 15 pages, 8 figures
summary: Machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) enable efficient modeling of molecular interactions with quantum mechanical (QM) accuracy. However, constructing robust and representative training datasets that capture subtle, system-specific interaction motifs remains challenging. We introduce PANIP (PAirwise Non-covalent Interaction Potential), an ensemble MLIP model built upon the NequIP framework and trained on non-covalent interactions (NCIs) between protein-derived fragments. PANIP is trained using an automated multi-fidelity active learning (MFAL) workflow, in which a representative training subset, termed PDB-FRAGID (PDB Fragment Interaction Dataset), was distilled from an otherwise prohibitively large pool of fragment dimers extracted from the Protein Data Bank (PDB). PANIP retains ωB97X-D3BJ/def2-TZVPP-level accuracy and achieves mean absolute errors below 0.2 kcal/mol on out-of-distribution systems, demonstrating excellent transferability across diverse NCI motifs. Compared to the widely used ANI-2x potential, PANIP delivers substantially lower errors, particularly for charged and strongly interacting dimers. Coupled with a fragmentation-based energy decomposition scheme, PANIP estimates protein-ligand binding energies at near force-field computational cost yet QM-level accuracy, enabling its use as a fragment-based scoring function that rivals specialized docking scoring functions.

AI.tldr: PANIP是一个基于NequIP框架的机器学习原子间势能模型，专门用于蛋白质片段间的非共价相互作用，通过多保真度主动学习从PDB数据库提取训练数据，在QM精度下以接近力场的计算成本预测蛋白质-配体结合能。
AI.motivation: 机器学习原子间势能（MLIPs）虽然能以量子力学精度高效建模分子相互作用，但构建能够捕捉系统特异性相互作用模式的鲁棒且具有代表性的训练数据集仍然具有挑战性。特别是对于蛋白质相关的非共价相互作用，需要能够准确建模这些复杂相互作用的专门模型。
AI.method: 1. 基于NequIP框架开发PANIP模型；2. 使用多保真度主动学习（MFAL）工作流程自动筛选训练数据；3. 从蛋白质数据库（PDB）提取片段二聚体，构建PDB-FRAGID数据集；4. 采用基于片段的能量分解方案；5. 训练目标为达到ωB97X-D3BJ/def2-TZVPP级别的精度。
AI.result: 1. PANIP在分布外系统上达到低于0.2 kcal/mol的平均绝对误差；2. 相比广泛使用的ANI-2x势能，PANIP误差显著降低，特别是对于带电和强相互作用二聚体；3. 能够以接近力场的计算成本实现量子力学级别的蛋白质-配体结合能预测；4. 作为基于片段的评分函数，性能可与专门的对接评分函数相媲美。
AI.conclusion: PANIP是一个专门针对蛋白质非共价相互作用的机器学习原子间势能模型，通过创新的数据筛选和训练方法，实现了在保持量子力学精度的同时大幅降低计算成本，为蛋白质-配体相互作用研究和药物发现提供了高效准确的计算工具。

title: Multi-Scale Negative Coupled Information Systems (MNCIS): A Unified Spectral Topology Framework for Stability in Turbulence, AI, and Biology
comment: Includes supplementary materials and code. Foundation and mathematical proofs can be found in the companion paper arXiv:2601.00638
summary: Complex dynamical systems frequently encounter a recurrent structural instability: the collapse of the spectral gap, driving the system toward a low-dimensional "Zero-Mode Attractor" (e.g., spectral pile-up or over-smoothing). Building upon recent global well-posedness estimates [Hou, arXiv:2601.00638], this work generalizes the Multi-Scale Negative Coupled Information System (MNCIS) framework. We postulate that global stability requires an active topological operator -- Adaptive Spectral Negative Coupling (ASNC) -- functioning as a state-dependent high-pass filter that penalizes entropy accumulation at spectral boundaries. We validate this unified framework via three implementations:(1) Hydrodynamics: In 3D Navier-Stokes turbulence ($N=256^3$), ASNC acts as a global-enstrophy adaptive sub-grid scale (SGS) model, stabilizing the inviscid limit and preserving the Kolmogorov $-5/3$ inertial range without artificial hyper-viscosity.(2) Artificial Intelligence: Addressing Over-smoothing in Graph Neural Networks (GNNs), we implement ASNC as a parameter-free topological constraint. Unlike baselines (e.g., DeepGCNs) relying on dense residual connections to bypass signal decay, our framework enables the training of ultra-deep 64-layer networks without residual connections, maintaining perfectly stationary feature variance ($σ^2 \equiv 1.0$) on the ogbn-arxiv benchmark. (3) Biological Physics: In reaction-diffusion morphogenesis, it stabilizes Turing patterns against diffusive washout in high-entropy regimes. Our results suggest that the MNCIS framework provides a base-independent topological condition for distinguishing viable complex systems from those collapsing into thermal equilibrium, bridging physical stability and information persistence.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个统一的多尺度负耦合信息系统（MNCIS）框架，通过自适应谱负耦合（ASNC）算子防止复杂动力系统中的谱间隙崩溃，并在流体力学、人工智能和生物物理三个领域验证了其有效性。
AI.motivation: 复杂动力系统经常面临谱间隙崩溃的结构不稳定性，导致系统趋向低维"零模吸引子"（如谱堆积或过平滑）。现有方法通常依赖特定领域的技巧（如残差连接、人工超粘性），缺乏统一的拓扑解释。需要建立一个基础独立的框架来区分可行的复杂系统与那些崩溃到热平衡的系统。
AI.method: 基于全局适定性估计，推广了多尺度负耦合信息系统（MNCIS）框架，提出了自适应谱负耦合（ASNC）算子作为状态依赖的高通滤波器，惩罚谱边界处的熵积累。在三个领域实现：(1) 流体力学：作为全局熵自适应亚网格尺度模型；(2) 人工智能：作为无参数的拓扑约束应用于图神经网络；(3) 生物物理：稳定反应-扩散形态生成中的图灵模式。
AI.result: (1) 在3D Navier-Stokes湍流中稳定了无粘极限，保持了Kolmogorov -5/3惯性范围；(2) 在GNN中实现了64层超深网络训练，无需残差连接，特征方差保持完美稳定；(3) 在高熵状态下稳定了图灵模式防止扩散冲刷。MNCIS框架成功桥接了物理稳定性和信息持久性。
AI.conclusion: MNCIS框架提供了一个基础独立的拓扑条件，能够区分可行的复杂系统与那些崩溃到热平衡的系统。自适应谱负耦合作为主动拓扑算子，通过惩罚谱边界处的熵积累来维持全局稳定性，这一框架在多个学科中展现出统一性和有效性。

title: Observation of correlated plasmons in low-valence nickelates
comment: 6 pages plus references, appendices, and supplements
summary: The discovery of nickelate superconductors has opened a new arena for studying the behavior of correlated electron liquids that give rise to unconventional superconductivity. While critical information about a material's charge dynamics is encoded in its plasmons, collective modes of the electron gas, these excitations have not yet been observed in nickelate materials. Here, we use resonant inelastic x-ray scattering (RIXS) to detect plasmons in the metallic, low-valence nickelate Pr4Ni3O8. Although qualitatively similar to those in cuprates, the nickelate plasmons are more heavily damped and have a lower velocity than those in a cuprate at comparable doping, which we attribute to reduced electronic hopping and enhanced screening of the long-range Coulomb interactions. Furthermore, the plasmons in Pr4Ni3O8 soften with increasing temperature, in contrast to the cuprate, where plasmons remain at nearly fixed energy but become more strongly damped. Taken together, these results reveal a distinct charge-screening landscape in nickelates and place quantitative constraints on analogies to cuprates.

AI.tldr: 使用共振非弹性X射线散射在镍酸盐Pr4Ni3O8中首次观测到等离子体激元，发现其比铜酸盐更阻尼、速度更低，且随温度升高软化，揭示了镍酸盐独特的电荷屏蔽特性。
AI.motivation: 镍酸盐超导体的发现为研究非常规超导性提供了新平台，但关于其电荷动力学的关键信息（如等离子体激元）尚未被观测到，需要填补这一空白以理解镍酸盐与铜酸盐的异同。
AI.method: 采用共振非弹性X射线散射（RIXS）技术，在金属性低化合价镍酸盐Pr4Ni3O8中探测等离子体激元，并与铜酸盐进行对比分析。
AI.result: 首次在镍酸盐中观测到等离子体激元，发现其比铜酸盐更阻尼、速度更低；且随温度升高而软化，而铜酸盐的等离子体激元能量基本不变但阻尼增强。
AI.conclusion: 镍酸盐具有独特的电荷屏蔽环境，与铜酸盐存在显著差异，这些定量结果对镍酸盐与铜酸盐的类比研究提出了重要约束。

title: Homogeneous Microwave Delivery for Quantum Sensing with Nitrogen-Vacancy Centers at High Pressures
comment: 5 page main text, 7 page supplement, 4 figure main text, 13 figure supplement
summary: Nitrogen vacancy (NV) centers have been demonstrated as a useful tool in high pressure environments. However, the geometry and small working area of the diamond anvil cells (DACs) used to apply pressure present a challenge to effective delivery of microwave (mw) fields. We designed and characterized a novel slotted design for mw transmission to nitrogen-vacancy centers (NVs) in a diamond anvil cell via zero-field and in-field optically detected magnetic resonance (ODMR) measurements across pressures between 1 and 48 GPa. The mw fields experienced by NVs across the diamond culet was calculated from Rabi frequency and found to be higher and more uniform than those generated by an equivalent simple mw line, which will improve performance for wide-field, high-pressure measurements to probe spatial variations across samples under pressure.

AI.tldr: 提出一种用于金刚石压砧中氮空位中心的槽式微波传输设计，提高高压环境下微波场的均匀性和强度
AI.motivation: 金刚石压砧的几何形状和小工作区域对微波场有效传输构成挑战，需要改进微波传输设计以提升高压测量性能
AI.method: 设计并表征新型槽式微波传输结构，通过零场和场中光探测磁共振测量，在1-48 GPa压力范围内评估微波场分布
AI.result: 槽式设计相比传统微波线产生更高且更均匀的微波场，通过拉比频率计算证实，有利于宽场高压测量
AI.conclusion: 新型槽式微波传输设计能有效改善高压环境下氮空位中心的微波场分布，提升空间分辨率测量性能

title: 100 Glorious Years of the Ising Model
summary: This is an editorial article based on the reseaches on the Ising model over the last 100 years.

AI.tldr: 关于伊辛模型过去100年研究的综述性社论文章
AI.motivation: 总结伊辛模型在过去一个世纪中的研究进展，回顾这一重要统计物理模型的发展历程和影响
AI.method: 社论文章，基于文献综述和历史分析，梳理伊辛模型研究的里程碑和发展脉络
AI.result: 系统回顾了伊辛模型从提出到现代应用的完整发展历程，展示了该模型在统计物理、相变理论、临界现象等领域的核心地位
AI.conclusion: 伊辛模型作为统计物理的基石模型，在过去100年中持续推动理论物理发展，其影响已扩展到多个交叉学科领域

title: Influence of leads on signatures of strongly-correlated zero-bias anomaly in double quantum dot measurements
summary: The combination of disorder and interactions is known in many systems to produce a feature in the single-particle density of states, the shape and parameter dependence of which act as signatures of the underlying electronic state. Strong Coulomb repulsion gives rise to a host of novel phenomena, among these is a unique zero-bias anomaly. While understanding of the anomaly in bulk materials remains incomplete, a version of this anomaly can be found in an ensemble of two-site systems and hence has been predicted to be observable in parallel-coupled double quantum dots. However, prior work did not include the influence of the leads. Here we show that the presence of the leads results in changes to the projected stability diagrams but that the signature of the strongly-correlated zero-bias anomaly nonetheless remains clearly visible.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了强关联无序系统中零偏压异常的特征，特别是在考虑引线影响后，该特征在平行耦合双量子点系统中仍然清晰可见。
AI.motivation: 无序和相互作用的结合会在单粒子态密度中产生特征，这些特征的形状和参数依赖性可作为底层电子态的签名。强库仑排斥会产生一系列新现象，其中包括独特的零偏压异常。虽然对块体材料中该异常的理解仍不完整，但该异常的版本可在两站点系统集合中找到，因此预测可在平行耦合双量子点中观测到。然而，先前的研究未考虑引线的影响。
AI.method: 研究考虑了引线对平行耦合双量子点系统的影响，分析了引线存在时对投影稳定性图的变化，并检验强关联零偏压异常的特征是否仍然可见。
AI.result: 研究发现引线的存在确实会导致投影稳定性图发生变化，但强关联零偏压异常的签名仍然清晰可见。
AI.conclusion: 即使在考虑引线影响的情况下，平行耦合双量子点系统中强关联零偏压异常的特征仍然保持可见，这为该异常的实验观测提供了理论支持。

authors: Luis G. G. V. Dias da Silva
title: Reentrant superconductivity and Stoner boundaries in twisted WSe$_2$
summary: We investigate spin-valley instabilities and their connection to the reentrant superconducting states recently observed in the twisted bilayer dichalcogenide WSe$_2$ at a $5^o$ twist angle. Starting from an effective three-orbital faithful Wannier model for the spin-locked moiré bands, combined with orbital-dependent Hubbard interactions, we analyze the evolution of magnetic instabilities as a function of carrier density using the matrix random phase approximation (mRPA) approach. By computing the Stoner boundary lines from the spin-valley susceptibilities over the electric-field by hole filling phase diagram, we show that the spin-valley instabilities result in ordered states in the region close to the Lifshitz transition at the topmost moiré valence band, marked by crossing of the van Hove singularity in the density of states. These spin-valley ordered states are dominated by interorbital spin-valley-flips involving the $MM$ and $MX$ moiré orbitals and occur at different momenta in each side of the van Hove line, indicating a distinct spatial dependence of the spin-valley order parameter depending on the hole filling. Moreover, the corresponding Stoner boundaries exhibit strong fluctuations on its flanks, which can favor superconducting states in the regions close to the spin-valley-ordered ones. This mechanism provides a natural description for a reentrant superconducting dome consistent with the experimental results. As such, our results suggest spin-valley fluctuations near the van-Hove line as the microscopic origin of the reentrant superconductivity in twisted WSe$_2$.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过矩阵随机相位近似方法分析扭曲WSe₂双层中自旋-谷不稳定性，发现van Hove奇异线附近的spin-valley有序态及其波动是重入超导的微观起源。
AI.motivation: 解释在5°扭曲角WSe₂双层中观察到的重入超导态，探究其与自旋-谷不稳定性的关联，寻找重入超导的微观机制。
AI.method: 采用有效三轨道Wannier模型描述自旋锁定的莫尔能带，结合轨道依赖的Hubbard相互作用，使用矩阵随机相位近似方法分析不同载流子密度下的磁不稳定性，计算自旋-谷磁化率获得Stoner边界线。
AI.result: 在莫尔价带顶Lifshitz转变附近van Hove奇异线区域发现自旋-谷有序态，这些态由MM和MX莫尔轨道间的轨道间自旋-谷翻转主导，在不同空穴填充下具有不同的动量；Stoner边界两侧存在强波动，可在自旋-谷有序态附近区域促进超导态形成。
AI.conclusion: van Hove线附近的自旋-谷波动为扭曲WSe₂中重入超导提供了自然的微观机制解释，与实验结果一致。

title: Large Language Model Agent for User-friendly Chemical Process Simulations
summary: Modern process simulators enable detailed process design, simulation, and optimization; however, constructing and interpreting simulations is time-consuming and requires expert knowledge. This limits early exploration by inexperienced users. To address this, a large language model (LLM) agent is integrated with AVEVA Process Simulation (APS) via Model Context Protocol (MCP), allowing natural language interaction with rigorous process simulations. An MCP server toolset enables the LLM to communicate programmatically with APS using Python, allowing it to execute complex simulation tasks from plain-language instructions. Two water-methanol separation case studies assess the framework across different task complexities and interaction modes. The first shows the agent autonomously analyzing flowsheets, finding improvement opportunities, and iteratively optimizing, extracting data, and presenting results clearly. The framework benefits both educational purposes, by translating technical concepts and demonstrating workflows, and experienced practitioners by automating data extraction, speeding routine tasks, and supporting brainstorming. The second case study assesses autonomous flowsheet synthesis through both a step-by-step dialogue and a single prompt, demonstrating its potential for novices and experts alike. The step-by-step mode gives reliable, guided construction suitable for educational contexts; the single-prompt mode constructs fast baseline flowsheets for later refinement. While current limitations such as oversimplification, calculation errors, and technical hiccups mean expert oversight is still needed, the framework's capabilities in analysis, optimization, and guided construction suggest LLM-based agents can become valuable collaborators.

AI.tldr: 开发了一个基于大语言模型（LLM）的智能体，通过Model Context Protocol（MCP）与AVEVA Process Simulation（APS）集成，使用自然语言与严格的过程模拟进行交互，实现流程分析、优化和自动流程图合成。
AI.motivation: 现代过程模拟器虽然功能强大，但构建和解释模拟耗时且需要专业知识，限制了非专业用户的早期探索。需要一种更直观、易用的交互方式来降低使用门槛。
AI.method: 通过MCP服务器工具集将LLM与APS集成，使LLM能够使用Python与APS进行程序化通信。开发了两种交互模式：逐步对话模式和单提示模式，并在两个水-甲醇分离案例研究中评估框架性能。
AI.result: 框架能够自主分析流程图、发现改进机会、迭代优化、提取数据并清晰呈现结果。逐步对话模式适合教育场景，提供可靠的引导式构建；单提示模式能快速构建基础流程图供后续优化。框架在教育（技术概念转化、工作流演示）和实际应用（自动化数据提取、加速常规任务、支持头脑风暴）方面均有价值。
AI.conclusion: 虽然当前存在过度简化、计算错误和技术故障等限制，仍需专家监督，但LLM智能体在分析、优化和引导构建方面的能力表明它们可以成为有价值的协作工具，适用于新手和专家用户。

title: Level set-based topology optimization of micropolar solids under thermo-mechanical loading
summary: We propose a novel level set-based topology optimization for micropolar solids subjected to thermo-mechanical loading. To capture the size effects, we have incorporated the microstructural length-scale information into the level set-based topology optimization method by adopting a micropolar theory. The proposed non-local topology optimization method can provide accurate topology optimization for size-dependent solids under thermo-mechanical loading. We have demonstrated the effectiveness of the proposed method through a few representative two-dimensional benchmark problems. The numerical results reveal the substantial influence of underlying micro-structures, incorporated in the model through micropolar parameters, and temperature on topology optimization, highlighting the necessity of the proposed thermo-mechanical micropolar formulation for materials with pronounced non-local effects. For the numerical implementation of the proposed model, we have used open-source finite element libraries, \texttt{Gridap.jl}, and \texttt{GridapTopOpt.jl}, available in Julia, to ensure transparency and reproducibility of the reported computational results.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种基于水平集的微极固体热-力载荷拓扑优化方法，通过微极理论引入微结构尺度信息，能够准确处理尺寸效应和热-力耦合问题。
AI.motivation: 传统拓扑优化方法难以处理具有尺寸效应的材料在热-力载荷下的优化问题，需要一种能够考虑微结构尺度信息和非局部效应的优化方法。
AI.method: 采用水平集拓扑优化框架，结合微极理论引入微结构长度尺度参数，建立热-力耦合的微极固体优化模型，使用Julia开源有限元库Gridap.jl和GridapTopOpt.jl进行数值实现。
AI.result: 通过二维基准问题验证了方法的有效性，数值结果表明微结构参数和温度对拓扑优化结果有显著影响，证明了所提热-力微极公式对于具有明显非局部效应材料的必要性。
AI.conclusion: 提出的方法能够准确处理尺寸依赖固体在热-力载荷下的拓扑优化问题，为具有微结构效应的材料优化提供了有效工具，开源实现确保了计算结果的透明性和可重复性。

title: ${\bf \frac{h}{e}}$ flux quantization in metals due to Berry phase coherence
summary: Berry curvature does not show itself in the relative phase correlation of wave-functions at different spatial points in a metal unless the fermions have closed trajectories in momentum space, for example those around isolated impurities. But these, just as the Bloch phase correlations, disappear at lengths larger than the diffusion length. If a quasi-two dimensional metal with Berry curvature has a set of domains, their boundaries necessarily carry chiral currents precluding back-ward scattering. The Berry induced phase coherence then persists over length scales of order the scale at which the chiral one-dimensional states scatter into the bulk states, which can be macroscopic. The conditions for their occurrence and the lengths and the orientation of such states are derived. These calculations are used to understand the remarkable aspects of a recent experiment in an anisotropic metal, reported to have loop-current order, with mean-free path of about 0.01 $μ$m which exhibits flux quantization in some transport properties over lengths of several $μ$m. %It is also shown that generating the appropriately oriented channels in the plane by the field applied is plausible.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了金属中贝里曲率诱导的相位相干性，发现在具有域结构的准二维金属中，域边界会携带手性电流，从而在宏观尺度上维持相位相干性，这可以解释某些实验中的反常量子输运现象。
AI.motivation: 传统观点认为金属中的贝里曲率相位相干性在扩散长度尺度上消失，但某些实验观测到在远大于平均自由程的尺度上出现量子输运现象，这需要新的理论解释。
AI.method: 通过理论分析准二维金属中的域结构，推导域边界手性电流的产生条件，计算手性一维态散射到体态的尺度，建立贝里曲率诱导相位相干性的理论框架。
AI.result: 发现域边界必然携带手性电流，抑制背向散射，使贝里曲率诱导的相位相干性可以扩展到宏观尺度（微米量级），远大于平均自由程（约0.01微米）。
AI.conclusion: 具有贝里曲率的准二维金属中的域结构可以产生宏观尺度的相位相干性，这为解释某些各向异性金属中观测到的反常量子输运现象提供了理论依据。

title: Chemical Vapor Deposition Growth and Characterization of ReSe2
summary: Two-dimensional (2D) flakes of ReSe2 structure were grown by chemical vapor deposition and investigated at room temperature using Raman, photoluminescence, and absorption spectroscopies. The Raman spectra revealed eighteen phonon modes in the range of 100-300 cm-1 that were found in good agreement with the density functional theory (DFT) calculations. The thickness profiles of the ReSe2 flakes are in the range of 5-50 nm. The ReSe2 crystal structure and morphology were investigated using XRD, atomic force microscopy and scanning electron microscopy. The energy dispersion spectroscopy confirmed the 1:2 elemental composition. The absorption spectra were obtained for ReSe2 flakes and found to exhibit excitonic peaks in the spectral region of 885 - 942 nm. These peaks are used to define the band gap of the material. The DFT calculations predicted an indirect bandgap of 0.88 eV for the bulk structure, while a direct bandgap of 1.26 eV was predicted for the monolayer.

AI.tldr: 通过CVD生长ReSe2二维薄片，结合光谱学表征和DFT计算，研究了其结构、光学性质和能带特性。
AI.motivation: 研究ReSe2二维材料的生长方法、结构特征和光学性质，特别是其能带结构随厚度的变化，为二维材料在光电子器件中的应用提供基础。
AI.method: 采用化学气相沉积（CVD）生长ReSe2薄片，通过拉曼光谱、光致发光光谱、吸收光谱、XRD、AFM、SEM和EDS进行表征，并结合密度泛函理论（DFT）计算进行理论验证。
AI.result: 成功生长出厚度5-50nm的ReSe2薄片；拉曼光谱观察到18个声子模式与DFT计算吻合；吸收光谱在885-942nm范围内显示激子峰；DFT预测体材料间接带隙为0.88eV，单层直接带隙为1.26eV。
AI.conclusion: ReSe2二维材料表现出厚度依赖的能带结构变化，从体材料的间接带隙转变为单层的直接带隙，这使其在光电子器件中具有潜在应用价值。

title: In memoriam J. Robert Dorfman
summary: An obituary of J.R. Dorfman. The focus is on his scientific career and on his many important publications.

AI.tldr: J.R. Dorfman的讣告，重点回顾其科学职业生涯和众多重要出版物
AI.motivation: 纪念和总结J.R. Dorfman的科学贡献，回顾他在学术领域的成就和影响力
AI.method: 通过讣告形式，系统梳理其学术生涯发展轨迹、研究方向和代表性著作
AI.result: 全面呈现Dorfman的学术遗产，包括他在特定科学领域的开创性工作和持续影响
AI.conclusion: J.R. Dorfman是一位杰出的科学家，他的研究成果对相关领域产生了深远影响，其学术遗产将继续启发后人

title: Guided spin wave in monolayer CrSBr: Localization and spin-orbit coupling from dipolar field
summary: Spin-wave spectrum of monolayer CrSBr waveguides was studied by numerically diagonalizing the Bogoliubov-de Gennes Hamiltonian derived from linearising the Landau-Lifshitz-Gilbert equation. In contrast to its short-range counterparts, the long-range dipolar field acts statically as a confining potential for spin wave, while the dynamic part couples the spin and orbit degrees of freedom, thus giving rise to spin-orbit coupling for spin wave. Due to the inversion symmetry of the Hamiltonian and the spinor structure of the wave function, spin-wave eigenstates form doublets with definite parity. Micromagnetic simulation tallies well with numerical calculation. Our study on spin-wave eigenstates in CrSBr waveguides sheds light on the nature of exchange-dipole spin wave in ferromagnetic slabs. We confirm particularly that the robustness of the Damon-Eshbach mode is not derived from topology, but rather from the static dipolar field. Moreover, a thorough knowledge on spin wave in monolayer CrSBr itself represents a step forward to understanding the more complicated antiferromagnetic resonance in bulk CrSBr.

AI.tldr: 研究了单层CrSBr波导中自旋波的能谱，发现长程偶极场作为静态约束势，其动态部分耦合自旋和轨道自由度，产生自旋轨道耦合。自旋波本征态形成具有确定宇称的双重态。
AI.motivation: 研究单层CrSBr波导中自旋波的特性，特别是长程偶极场对自旋波的影响，以及理解交换-偶极自旋波在铁磁板中的本质。
AI.method: 通过线性化Landau-Lifshitz-Gilbert方程推导Bogoliubov-de Gennes哈密顿量，并进行数值对角化分析。同时使用微磁模拟验证数值计算结果。
AI.result: 长程偶极场的静态部分作为自旋波的约束势，动态部分耦合自旋和轨道自由度，产生自旋轨道耦合。自旋波本征态形成具有确定宇称的双重态。Damon-Eshbach模式的鲁棒性源于静态偶极场而非拓扑特性。
AI.conclusion: 研究揭示了CrSBr波导中自旋波的本征态特性，阐明了交换-偶极自旋波在铁磁板中的本质。对单层CrSBr自旋波的深入理解有助于研究更复杂的体材料CrSBr中的反铁磁共振。

title: Quaternionic superconductivity with a single-field Bogoliubov-de Gennes--Ginzburg-Landau framework and charge-4e couplings
summary: We recast spinful superconductivity as a quaternion field theory -- where a quaternion is a four-component hypercomplex number with units $(\boldsymbol{i},\boldsymbol{j},\boldsymbol{k})$ -- that encodes the spin-singlet/triplet gap in a single field $q(\mathbf{k})$. This yields a compact Bogoliubov--de Gennes (BdG) Hamiltonian $H_{\rm BdG}=ξ_{\mathbf{k}}τ_z+τ_{+}q+τ_{-}\,\overline{q}$ and keeps time-reversal symmetry, Altland-Zirnbauer classification, and topological diagnostics in the same variables. We introduce a quarteting field $Q\propto\mathrm{Sc}(q^2)$ and a minimal Ginzburg-Landau (GL) functional with covariant derivatives $(\nabla-2ie\mathbf{A})q$ and $(\nabla-4ie\mathbf{A})Q$. Analytically, a one-loop evaluation of the fluctuation bubble $Π(0)$ (with prefactors) gives a quantitative vestigial charge-$4e$ criterion $μ_{\rm eff}=μ-g^2Π(0)<0$. Numerically, we verify: (i) a two-dimensional (2D) class-DIII lattice model whose $\mathbb{Z}_2$ index, computed directly from $q(\mathbf{k})$ using the matrix Pfaffian of an antisymmetric sewing matrix at time-reversal-invariant momenta (TRIM), matches helical edge spectra; (ii) a GL simulation of a pure-$Q$ vortex carrying $hc/4e$ flux within $\sim2\%$ and exhibiting $ξ_Q\propto\sqrt{η/|μ_{\rm eff}|}$; and (iii) a short-junction current-phase relation with a controlled window where the second harmonic dominates ($I_2\gg I_1$), together with doubled alternating-current (ac) Josephson emission and even-only Shapiro steps. The framework provides a compact, symmetry-faithful route from microscopic pairing to device-level charge-$4e$ signatures.

AI.tldr: 该论文将自旋超导性重新表述为四元数场论，提供了一个紧凑的框架来统一描述自旋单态/三重态配对，并预测了电荷-4e超导的多种实验特征。
AI.motivation: 传统超导理论中自旋单态和三重态配对需要分开处理，缺乏统一的数学框架。该研究旨在建立一个紧凑、对称保持的框架，能够统一描述自旋超导性，并系统性地探索电荷-4e超导的物理特征。
AI.method:
1. 将自旋超导性重新表述为四元数场论，用单一四元数场q(k)编码自旋单态/三重态能隙
2. 引入四重配对场Q ∝ Sc(q²)和包含协变导数的最小金兹堡-朗道泛函
3. 通过一涨落泡计算定量推导电荷-4e判据
4. 数值验证：二维DIII类晶格模型的拓扑指标计算、纯Q涡旋的GL模拟、短结电流-相位关系分析
AI.result:
1. 建立了紧凑的BdG哈密顿量形式，保持时间反演对称性和拓扑分类
2. 推导出电荷-4e超导的定量判据μ_eff = μ - g²Π(0) < 0
3. 数值验证：拓扑指标与螺旋边缘谱匹配；纯Q涡旋携带hc/4e磁通，精度达~2%；在可控参数窗口实现第二谐波主导的电流-相位关系
4. 预测了双倍交流约瑟夫森发射和仅偶数夏皮罗台阶等电荷-4e特征
AI.conclusion: 该四元数场论框架为自旋超导性提供了一个紧凑、对称保持的数学描述，能够从微观配对机制直接推导到器件层面的电荷-4e超导特征，为实验探测电荷-4e超导提供了系统的理论预测和诊断工具。

title: Time-dependent density functional theory study of strong-field laser-induced coulomb explosion of the HCl dimer
summary: We present a channel-resolved interpretation of laser-driven Coulomb explosion of the HCl dimer from an ensemble of trajectories. Three dominant outcomes are identified: a minor three-body channel and two four-body channels (sequential and near-simultaneous dissociation of both molecules). The key result is that pathway selection is strongly correlated with the degree of ionization during the laser interaction, which is in turn strongly modulated by laser-molecule orientation. Higher early-time ionization predisposes the system toward near-simultaneous four-body breakup, whereas lower ionization favors sequential and three-body fragmentation; for low-ionization cases, a fragment-resolved charge metric further differentiates three-body and sequential behavior. These charge-dependent trends consistently map onto experimentally accessible observables: the simultaneous mechanism dominates the high-energy tail of the kinetic energy release (KER) spectrum and populate distinct regions of the emission-angle distributions, while sequential events concentrate at lower KER. Overall, early-time charge evolution provides a unifying explanation for channel branching and for the channel-resolved fragmentation signatures.

AI.tldr: 激光驱动HCl二聚体库仑爆炸的通道分辨研究：早期电离程度决定碎片化通道选择，高电离导致近同步四体解离，低电离导致顺序解离或三体碎片化。
AI.motivation: 研究HCl二聚体在激光驱动库仑爆炸中的碎片化机制，理解不同解离通道的选择规律及其与实验可观测量的关系。
AI.method: 采用轨迹系综方法，对激光驱动的HCl二聚体库仑爆炸进行通道分辨分析，通过电荷演化研究碎片化机制。
AI.result: 识别出三种主要通道：次要的三体通道和两种四体通道（顺序解离和近同步解离）。通道选择与激光-分子取向调制的早期电离程度强相关：高早期电离倾向近同步四体解离，低电离倾向顺序解离和三体碎片化。
AI.conclusion: 早期电荷演化统一解释了通道分支和通道分辨的碎片化特征，为实验观测提供了理论解释框架。

title: Padé Approximation and Partition Function Zeros
summary: Fisher zeros play a central role in the theoretical understanding of phase transitions. However, their computation requires knowledge of the density of states, which limits their practical applicability. Alternative approaches based on the Energy Probability Distribution (EPD) and Moment Generating Function (MGF) alleviate the computational cost but suffer from convergence issues in the two-dimensional \textbf{anisotropic Heisenberg} model (XY model). In this work, we introduce a Padé approximation to systematically reduces the number of zeros required in the Fisher, EPD, and MGF formulations without loss of accuracy. Moreover, since the Fisher zeros formulation does not rely on a convergence algorithm, their combination with a Padé approximation enables a reliable analysis of the XY model while significantly reducing computational cost. Applications to the two-dimensional Ising and XY models demonstrate substantial reductions in polynomial degree and computation time while preserving accurate estimates of the critical temperature.

AI.tldr: 提出使用Padé近似来减少Fisher零点、能量概率分布和矩生成函数方法中所需零点数量，降低计算成本，应用于二维Ising和XY模型验证有效性。
AI.motivation: Fisher零点在相变理论中很重要，但计算需要态密度信息，限制了实际应用。基于能量概率分布和矩生成函数的方法计算成本较低，但在二维各向异性海森堡模型（XY模型）中存在收敛问题。
AI.method: 引入Padé近似来系统性地减少Fisher零点、能量概率分布和矩生成函数方法中所需的零点数量，同时保持准确性。由于Fisher零点方法不依赖收敛算法，与Padé近似结合可以实现对XY模型的可靠分析。
AI.result: 应用于二维Ising和XY模型，在保持临界温度准确估计的同时，显著减少了多项式阶数和计算时间。
AI.conclusion: Padé近似与Fisher零点方法的结合提供了一种可靠且计算高效的相变分析方法，特别适用于传统方法存在收敛问题的模型。

title: Universal and non-universal contributions of entanglement under different bipartitions
summary: Entanglement entropy (EE) is a fundamental probe of quantum phases and critical phenomena, which was thought to reflect only bulk universality for a long time. Very recently, people realized that the microscopic geometry of the entanglement cut can induce distinct entanglement-edge modes, whose coupling to bulk critical fluctuations may alter the scaling of the EE. However, this perception is very qualitative and lacks quantitative consideration. Here, we investigate this problem through high-precision quantum Monte Carlo simulations combined with the analysis of scaling theory to build a quantitative understanding. By considering three distinct bipartitions corresponding to three surface criticality types, we reveal a striking dependence of the constant term γ on the microscopic cut at the quantum critical point. Notably, cuts that generate extra gapless edge modes yield a sign reversal in γ compared to those producing gapped edges. We explain this behavior via a modified scaling form that incorporates contributions from both bulk and surface critical modes. Furthermore, we demonstrate that the derivative of EE robustly extracts the bulk critical point and exponent ν regardless of the cut geometry, providing a reliable diagnostic of bulk universality in the presence of strong surface effects. Our work for the first time establishes a direct quantitative connection between surface criticality and entanglement scaling, challenging the conventional view that EE solely reflects bulk properties and offering a refined framework for interpreting entanglement in systems with boundary-sensitive criticality.

AI.tldr: 纠缠熵的常数项γ对微观分割方式敏感，能反映表面临界性类型，而纠缠熵导数则能稳健提取体临界性质。
AI.motivation: 传统观点认为纠缠熵仅反映体相普适性，但最近研究发现纠缠切割的微观几何会诱导不同的纠缠边缘模式，这些模式与体临界涨落耦合可能改变纠缠熵的标度行为。然而这种认识还很定性，缺乏定量研究。
AI.method: 采用高精度量子蒙特卡洛模拟结合标度理论分析，考虑三种不同的二分分割对应三种表面临界性类型，研究纠缠熵的标度行为。
AI.result: 发现常数项γ对微观切割方式有显著依赖性：产生额外无能隙边缘模式的切割会导致γ符号反转，而生成有能隙边缘的切割则不会。通过修改的标度形式解释了这一行为，该形式同时包含体相和表面临界模式的贡献。此外，纠缠熵导数能稳健提取体临界点和指数ν，不受切割几何影响。
AI.conclusion: 首次建立了表面临界性与纠缠标度之间的直接定量联系，挑战了纠缠熵仅反映体相性质的传统观点，为解释具有边界敏感临界性系统中的纠缠提供了精细化框架。

title: Quantum Kernel Machine Learning for Autonomous Materials Science
summary: Autonomous materials science, where active learning is used to navigate large compositional phase space, has emerged as a powerful vehicle to rapidly explore new materials. A crucial aspect of autonomous materials science is exploring new materials using as little data as possible. Gaussian process-based active learning allows effective charting of multi-dimensional parameter space with a limited number of training data, and thus is a common algorithmic choice for autonomous materials science. An integral part of the autonomous workflow is the application of kernel functions for quantifying similarities among measured data points. A recent theoretical breakthrough has shown that quantum kernel models can achieve similar performance with less training data than classical models. This signals the possible advantage of applying quantum kernel machine learning to autonomous materials discovery. In this work, we compare quantum and classical kernels for their utility in sequential phase space navigation for autonomous materials science. Specifically, we compute a quantum kernel and several classical kernels for x-ray diffraction patterns taken from an Fe-Ga-Pd ternary composition spread library. We conduct our study on both IonQ's Aria trapped ion quantum computer hardware and the corresponding classical noisy simulator. We experimentally verify that a quantum kernel model can outperform some classical kernel models. The results highlight the potential of quantum kernel machine learning methods for accelerating materials discovery and suggest complex x-ray diffraction data is a candidate for robust quantum kernel model advantage.

AI.tldr: 量子核模型在材料科学自主探索中优于部分经典核模型，展示了量子核机器学习加速材料发现的潜力
AI.motivation: 自主材料科学需要高效探索大成分相空间，量子核模型理论上能用更少训练数据达到类似性能，可能为自主材料发现带来优势
AI.method: 比较量子核和经典核在相空间顺序导航中的效用，计算Fe-Ga-Pd三元成分扩散库X射线衍射图的量子核和多个经典核，在IonQ Aria离子阱量子计算机硬件和相应经典噪声模拟器上进行研究
AI.result: 实验验证量子核模型可以超越部分经典核模型，量子核机器学习方法在加速材料发现方面具有潜力
AI.conclusion: 复杂X射线衍射数据是量子核模型优势的候选领域，量子核机器学习方法有望加速材料发现

title: Reversible to Irreversible Transitions in Pattern-Forming Systems with Cyclic Interactions
summary: Transitions from reversible to irreversible or fluctuating states above a critical density and shear amplitude have been extensively studied in non-thermal cyclically sheared suspensions and amorphous solids. Here, we propose that the same type of reversible to irreversible transition occurs for a system of particles with competing short-range attraction and long-range repulsion, which can form crystals, stripes, and bubbles as the ratio of attraction to repulsion varies. By oscillating the strength of the attractive part of the potential, we find that the system can organize into either time-periodic states consisting of nondiffusive complex closed orbits, or into a diffusive fluctuating state. A critical point separates these states as a function of the maximum strength of the attraction, oscillation frequency, and particle density. We also find a re-entrant behavior of the reversible state as a function of the strength of the attraction and the oscillation frequency.

AI.tldr: 研究具有竞争性短程吸引和长程排斥势的粒子系统在周期性振荡吸引势强度下的可逆-不可逆转变，发现系统可组织成时间周期态或扩散性涨变态，存在临界点分离这些状态。
AI.motivation: 在非热循环剪切悬浮液和非晶固体中，可逆到不可逆或涨变态的转变已被广泛研究。本研究旨在探索具有竞争性短程吸引和长程排斥势的粒子系统是否也会发生类似的可逆-不可逆转变，这种系统可形成晶体、条纹和气泡等结构。
AI.method: 通过振荡吸引势的强度，研究具有竞争性短程吸引和长程排斥势的粒子系统。分析系统在不同吸引势最大强度、振荡频率和粒子密度下的行为，观察系统是组织成时间周期态（非扩散性复杂闭合轨道）还是扩散性涨变态。
AI.result: 系统可组织成两种状态：时间周期态（由非扩散性复杂闭合轨道组成）和扩散性涨变态。这些状态之间存在一个临界点，该临界点取决于吸引势最大强度、振荡频率和粒子密度。还发现了可逆态随吸引势强度和振荡频率的重入行为。
AI.conclusion: 具有竞争性短程吸引和长程排斥势的粒子系统在周期性振荡吸引势强度下确实会发生可逆到不可逆的转变，表现出与循环剪切系统相似的行为。系统状态由临界点分离，并显示出重入现象，这扩展了我们对非平衡系统中可逆-不可逆转变的理解。

title: Zero-phonon line emission of single photon emitters in helium-ion treated MoS$_2$
summary: We explore the zero-phonon line of single photon emitters in helium-ion treated monolayer MoS$_2$, which are currently understood in terms of single sulfur-site vacancies. By comparing the linewidths of the zero-phonon line as extracted directly from optical spectra with values inferred from the first-order autocorrelation function of the photoluminescence, we quantify bounds of the homogeneous broadening and of phonon-assisted contributions. The results are discussed in terms of both the independent boson model and ab-initio results as computed from GW and Bethe-Salpeter equation approximations.

AI.tldr: 研究氦离子处理的单层MoS₂中单光子发射器的零声子线，通过比较光学光谱直接提取的线宽与光致发光一阶自相关函数推断的线宽，量化均匀展宽和声子辅助贡献的界限。
AI.motivation: 目前对氦离子处理单层MoS₂中单光子发射器的理解基于单硫空位模型，需要更精确地量化其零声子线的展宽机制，特别是均匀展宽和声子辅助贡献的相对重要性。
AI.method: 通过比较光学光谱直接测量的零声子线线宽与光致发光一阶自相关函数推断的线宽，量化展宽界限。使用独立玻色子模型和基于GW近似及Bethe-Salpeter方程的从头算方法进行分析。
AI.result: 获得了零声子线均匀展宽和声子辅助贡献的量化界限，为理解单层MoS₂中单光子发射器的物理机制提供了实验和理论依据。
AI.conclusion: 通过综合实验测量和理论模型分析，成功量化了氦离子处理单层MoS₂中单光子发射器零声子线的展宽机制，为基于二维材料的量子光源研究提供了重要见解。

title: Microscopic origin of orbital magnetization in chiral superconductors
summary: Chiral superconductivity is a time reversal symmetry breaking superconducting phase that has attracted broad interest as a potential platform for topological quantum computation. A fundamental consequence of this symmetry breaking is orbital magnetization, yet a clear microscopic formulation of this quantity has remained elusive. This difficulty arises because Bogoliubov quasiparticles do not carry a definite electric charge, precluding a simple interpretation of orbital magnetization in terms of circulating quasiparticle currents. Moreover, superconductivity and ferromagnetism rarely coexist, and in the few materials where they do (e.g. uranium-based compounds), strong spin-orbit coupling obscures the orbital contribution to the magnetization. The recent report of chiral superconductivity in rhombohedral multilayer graphene, which has negligible spin-orbit coupling, therefore provides a unique opportunity to develop and test a microscopic theory of orbital magnetization in chiral superconductors. Here we develop such a theory, unifying the interband coherence effects underlying normal-state orbital magnetization with the intrinsic orbital moments of the Cooper-pair condensate. Applying our theory to rhombohedral tetralayer graphene, we find that the onset of superconductivity can either enhance or suppress the normal-state orbital magnetization, depending sensitively on the bandstructure. We further identify a generalized clapping mode corresponding to coherent fluctuations between the two opposite chiral windings of the p-wave order parameter, with a gap set by the sublattice winding form factor. This collective mode is unique to chiral superconductors and contributes to the orbital magnetization through its role in dressing the photon vertex. Experimental measurements of the orbital magnetization relative to the quarter-metal phase would provide a direct test of our theory.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了手性超导体中轨道磁化的微观理论，应用于菱面体多层石墨烯，发现超导起始可增强或抑制正常态轨道磁化，并识别出独特的集体模式。
AI.motivation: 手性超导体作为时间反演对称性破缺的超导相，是拓扑量子计算的潜在平台。轨道磁化是这种对称性破缺的基本结果，但由于Bogoliubov准粒子不携带确定电荷，且超导与铁磁很少共存，其微观理论一直难以建立。菱面体多层石墨烯中手性超导的发现为发展该理论提供了独特机会。
AI.method: 发展了手性超导体中轨道磁化的微观理论，将正常态轨道磁化的带间相干效应与Cooper对凝聚的本征轨道矩统一起来。将该理论应用于菱面体四层石墨烯系统。
AI.result: 发现超导起始可增强或抑制正常态轨道磁化，具体取决于能带结构。识别出p波序参数两种相反手性缠绕之间相干涨落的广义拍打模式，其能隙由子晶格缠绕形状因子决定。该集体模式通过修饰光子顶点贡献于轨道磁化。
AI.conclusion: 建立了手性超导体轨道磁化的统一微观理论，为实验测量轨道磁化相对于四分之一金属相的变化提供了直接测试依据。该理论特别适用于自旋轨道耦合可忽略的菱面体多层石墨烯系统。

title: Extension of the CIPSI-Driven CC($P$;$Q$) Approach to Excited Electronic States
comment: 18 pages, 5 tables, and 1 figure. Supplementary Data as an ancillary file. This article has been submitted to Chemical Physics Letters
summary: We extend the CIPSI-driven CC($P$;$Q$) methodology [K. Gururangan et al., J. Chem. Phys. 155 (2021) 174114], in which the leading higher-than-doubly excited determinants are identified using the selected configuration interaction (CI) approach abbreviated as CIPSI, to excited electronic states via the equation-of-motion (EOM) coupled-cluster (CC) formalism. By examining vertical excitations in CH+ at equilibrium and stretched geometries, adiabatic excitations in CH, and ground- and excited-state potential cuts of water, we demonstrate that the CIPSI-driven CC($P$;$Q$) method converges parent CC/EOMCC singles, doubles, and triples energetics from relatively inexpensive Hamiltonian diagonalizations in CI spaces smaller than the corresponding triples manifolds.

AI.tldr: 将CIPSI驱动的CC(P;Q)方法扩展到激发态，通过EOM-CC形式，在CH+、CH和H2O体系中验证了该方法能高效收敛CCSDT级别的激发态能量。
AI.motivation: 将先前发展的CIPSI驱动的CC(P;Q)方法（用于基态）扩展到激发电子态，以高效处理激发态的高阶激发贡献。
AI.method: 通过EOM-CC形式扩展CIPSI驱动的CC(P;Q)方法，使用CIPSI选择重要的三激发及以上激发组态，在较小的CI空间中通过哈密顿量对角化来收敛CCSDT级别的激发态能量。
AI.result: 在CH+的垂直激发、CH的绝热激发以及H2O的基态和激发态势能曲线中，该方法能够从比完整三激发空间更小的CI空间出发，高效收敛到CC/EOMCCSDT级别的能量。
AI.conclusion: CIPSI驱动的CC(P;Q)方法可成功扩展到激发态，为高效计算高精度激发态能量提供了有前景的途径。

title: Efficient O(N^1.5) Electronic Structure Computation of Million-Atom Systems
summary: The exploration of quantum phenomena in complex materials such as moiré superlattices is limited by the O(N^3) scaling of conventional electronic structure methods. Here we introduce a high-performance tight-binding framework that reduces the complexity to O(N^1.5) by transforming the Hamiltonian into a real symmetric form and combining Sylvester's inertia law with LDL decomposition. This approach enables efficient band structure calculations for large systems: solving magic angle twisted bilayer graphene in minutes on a laptop and scaling to 1.5 million atoms within days on a workstation. We apply it to the previously inaccessible ultra-low twist-angle regime (less than 0.16 degree) with mechanical strain relaxation and find robust flat bands persisting down to 0.09 degree. Our framework bridges density functional theory accuracy with large-scale quantum simulation, opening a route to systematic data-driven exploration of mesoscale quantum materials.

AI.tldr: 提出高性能紧束缚框架，将复杂度从O(N^3)降至O(N^1.5)，实现大规模量子材料计算
AI.motivation: 传统电子结构方法O(N^3)的复杂度限制了复杂材料（如莫尔超晶格）中量子现象的研究，需要更高效的算法来处理大规模系统
AI.method: 将哈密顿量转化为实对称形式，结合Sylvester惯性定律和LDL分解，构建高性能紧束缚框架
AI.result: 在笔记本电脑上几分钟内求解魔角扭曲双层石墨烯，工作站上可扩展到150万个原子；在0.09度超低扭转角下仍发现稳健的平带
AI.conclusion: 该框架将密度泛函理论精度与大规模量子模拟相结合，为介观尺度量子材料的系统数据驱动探索开辟了新途径

title: Measurements of electronic band structure in CeCoGe$_3$ by angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy
summary: We report a comprehensive study of the electronic structure of CeCoGe$_3$ throughout the entire Brillouin zone in the non-magnetic regime using angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy (ARPES). The electronic structure agrees in large part with first principles calculations, including predicted topological nodal lines. Two new features in the band structure are also observed: a surface state and folded bands, the latter which is argued to originate from a unit cell reconstruction.

AI.tldr: 使用ARPES研究CeCoGe₃在非磁态下的电子结构，发现与理论计算基本一致，包括预测的拓扑节线，并观察到表面态和折叠能带
AI.motivation: 研究CeCoGe₃在非磁态下的电子结构，验证理论预测的拓扑节线，探索可能的表面态和能带重构现象
AI.method: 使用角分辨光电子能谱(ARPES)在整个布里渊区测量电子结构，并与第一性原理计算进行比较
AI.result: 电子结构与理论计算基本一致，确认了预测的拓扑节线，同时发现了两个新特征：表面态和折叠能带，后者可能源于晶胞重构
AI.conclusion: CeCoGe₃在非磁态下表现出与理论预测相符的电子结构，包括拓扑节线特征，并揭示了表面态和晶胞重构引起的能带折叠现象

title: Deriving a comprehensive dataset of optical constants for metal halide perovskites
summary: Accurate optical constants are essential for modelling light propagation, absorption, and ultimately photovoltaic performance in state of the art perovskite solar cells and is especially important for multiple junction or tandem cells. However, available datasets for metal halide perovskites remain sparse, inconsistent in quality, and often suffer from unphysical sub bandgap extinction caused by surface roughness and limitations of conventional ellipsometry fits. Here, we present a comprehensive library of complex refractive indices (n,k) for a technologically relevant set of FA based lead perovskites, spanning bromide compositions from 0 to 100 percent, and mixed Pb Sn perovskites with Sn fractions from 0 to 60 %. Using state of the art fabrication protocols that yield high quality films, we combine variable angle spectroscopic ellipsometry measurements with highly sensitive sub bandgap probes, including photothermal deflection spectroscopy for neat lead based perovskites and Fourier transform photocurrent spectroscopy for Pb Sn alloys, to reconstruct fully zeroed dielectric functions across and below the band edge. The measured data are then stitched and recalculated via a Kramers Kronig consistent framework, ensuring physically accurate behaviour across the full spectral range. Finally, we introduce a transformation based interpolation scheme that preserves spectral shape and feature alignment, enabling reliable determination of (n,k) for any intermediate composition or band gap. This complete dataset and interpolation protocol provide a standardized foundation for optical modelling of perovskite and tandem solar cells, addressing longstanding data gaps and supporting accurate simulations of next generation photovoltaic architectures.

AI.tldr: 该研究建立了一个全面的金属卤化物钙钛矿复折射率(n,k)数据库，通过先进测量技术和Kramers-Kronig一致性框架，解决了现有数据稀疏、不一致和亚带隙吸收不准确的问题，并开发了保持光谱特征的插值方案。
AI.motivation: 现有钙钛矿光学常数数据稀疏、质量不一致，且传统椭圆偏振测量存在亚带隙吸收不准确的问题，这影响了钙钛矿太阳能电池和多结/串联电池的光学建模精度。
AI.method: 采用高质量薄膜制备技术，结合可变角度光谱椭圆偏振测量与高灵敏度亚带隙探测技术（光热偏转光谱和傅里叶变换光电流光谱），通过Kramers-Kronig一致性框架重建完整介电函数，并开发了保持光谱特征的插值方案。
AI.result: 建立了FA基铅钙钛矿（溴化物组成0-100%）和铅锡混合钙钛矿（锡含量0-60%）的全面复折射率数据库，提供了物理准确的光学常数数据。
AI.conclusion: 该完整数据集和插值协议为钙钛矿和串联太阳能电池的光学建模提供了标准化基础，解决了长期存在的数据缺口问题，支持下一代光伏架构的准确模拟。

title: Far tails of the biased CTRW model under the short time limit
summary: It has been observed in numerous experiments, simulations, and various theoretical treatments that the spreading of particles can be modeled by the continuous-time random walk. We consider two well-known cases, i.e., Gaussian displacements and discrete displacements, to compute the position distribution and demonstrate the emergence of exponential decay in the far tails when a bias is introduced. We further analyze the temporal rate function and the positional rate function to examine the convergence of the theoretical predictions. For Gaussian displacements, we further discuss the relationship between the position distributions with and without bias in different asymptotic limits.

AI.tldr: 研究连续时间随机游走模型中偏置对粒子扩散的影响，发现偏置引入后远尾分布呈现指数衰减，并分析了不同渐近极限下位置分布的关系。
AI.motivation: 在众多实验、模拟和理论研究中观察到粒子扩散可用连续时间随机游走建模，但偏置对分布尾部行为的影响需要系统分析。
AI.method: 考虑高斯位移和离散位移两种经典情况，计算位置分布，分析时间率函数和位置率函数来检验理论预测的收敛性。
AI.result: 引入偏置后，位置分布的远尾部呈现指数衰减特征；对于高斯位移，进一步探讨了有偏和无偏情况下位置分布在不同渐近极限下的关系。
AI.conclusion: 连续时间随机游走模型中偏置显著影响粒子扩散的尾部行为，导致指数衰减，这为理解偏置扩散系统的统计特性提供了理论框架。

title: Study of Twistronics Induced Superconductivity in Twisted Bilayer Graphene
comment: Published in BIBECHANA, Vol. 23, No. 1, pp. 48-56 (2026). 9 pages, figures included
summary: This work investigates the electronic properties of twisted bilayer graphene (TBG) through computational calculations, with the aim of understanding the emergence of flat bands and conditions favorable for superconductivity close to the magic angle. This study utilizes a k\cdot p continuum model, and the low-energy Hamiltonians are derived from angle-dependent datasets provided by Carr et al. Using this model, the band structure, density of states (DoS), and Fermi velocity are systematically calculated across a range of twist angles. The calculations are performed by discretizing high-symmetry paths in the moire Brillouin zone for band structure calculations, uniformly sampling a square grid for DoS analysis, and employing finite-difference methods to evaluate the Fermi velocity near the Dirac points. The results identify a narrow magic-angle window around $θ\approx 0.98^\circ-1.00^\circ$, where the bands become nearly dispersionless, the DoS exhibits a sharp peak, and the Fermi velocity is strongly suppressed. This computational framework does not directly predict superconductivity, but rather establishes the electronic foundation for exploring flat-band physics and correlation-driven phenomena such as unconventional superconductivity in twisted bilayer graphene.

AI.tldr: 通过k·p连续模型计算扭曲双层石墨烯的电子性质，发现魔角θ≈0.98°-1.00°附近出现平带、态密度峰值和费米速度抑制，为探索超导等关联现象提供电子基础。
AI.motivation: 研究扭曲双层石墨烯的电子性质，特别是理解平带的出现以及魔角附近有利于超导的条件。
AI.method: 使用k·p连续模型，基于Carr等人提供的角度相关数据集推导低能哈密顿量。通过离散化莫尔布里渊区高对称路径计算能带结构，均匀采样正方形网格分析态密度，采用有限差分法评估狄拉克点附近的费米速度。
AI.result: 在θ≈0.98°-1.00°的狭窄魔角窗口内，能带几乎无色散，态密度呈现尖锐峰值，费米速度显著抑制。
AI.conclusion: 该计算框架虽不直接预测超导，但为探索扭曲双层石墨烯中的平带物理和关联驱动现象（如非常规超导）建立了电子基础。

title: Correlation between superfluid density and transition temperature in infinite-layer nickelate superconductor $Nd_{1-x}Sr_xNiO_2$
summary: A strong correlation between zero-temperature superfluid density ($ρ_{s0}$) and transition temperature ($T_c$) is considered as a hallmark of unconventional superconductivity. However, their relationship has yet to be unveiled in nickelates due to sample inhomogeneity. Here we perform local susceptometry on an infinite-layer nickelate superconductor $Nd_{0.8}Sr_{0.2}NiO_2$. The sample shows inhomogeneous superfluid density and $T_c$ on micron-scale. The spatial statistics for different scan areas reveal a linear dependence of local $T_c$ on $ρ_{s0}$ for $T_c$>8 K and a sub-linear one for $T_c$<8 K. Remarkably, the overall relationship is reminiscent of that reported in overdoped cuprate superconductors, hinting at a close connection between them.

AI.tldr: 通过局域磁化率测量发现无限层镍酸盐超导体中零温超流密度与转变温度存在线性关系，与过掺杂铜氧化物相似
AI.motivation: 零温超流密度与转变温度的强相关性被认为是非常规超导的标志，但在镍酸盐中由于样品不均匀性，这一关系尚未揭示
AI.method: 对无限层镍酸盐超导体Nd₀.₈Sr₀.₂NiO₂进行局域磁化率测量，分析微米尺度上超流密度和Tc的空间分布
AI.result: 样品在微米尺度上表现出不均匀的超流密度和Tc；空间统计显示对于Tc>8K的区域，局域Tc与ρs0呈线性依赖，而Tc<8K时呈亚线性依赖；整体关系与过掺杂铜氧化物超导体相似
AI.conclusion: 镍酸盐超导体中零温超流密度与转变温度的关系与过掺杂铜氧化物相似，暗示两者之间存在密切联系

title: Towards accurate predictions of bond-selective fluorescence spectra
summary: Vibrational-encoded fluorescence spectro-microscopies are emerging as powerful tools for studying molecular vibrations with the unparalleled sensitivity of fluorescence spectroscopy. We recently described one such technique, termed bond-selective fluorescence-detected infrared-excited (BonFIRE) spectro-microscopy. Currently, prospects of BonFIRE towards rational molecular design are limited, but they have the potential to be assisted by computational tools. In this Perspective, we provide a brief overview of the theory of BonFIRE spectroscopy. We then describe a fully automated computational pipeline for calculating BonFIRE spectra, reproducing key features of experimental results. Finally, we highlight a few potential applications of computational methods for vibrational-encoded fluorescence spectro-microscopies and their broader implications for chemistry and biology.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了一种计算BonFIRE光谱的自动化计算流程，用于辅助振动编码荧光光谱显微镜技术，并探讨了其在化学和生物学中的潜在应用。
AI.motivation: 振动编码荧光光谱显微镜技术（如BonFIRE）是研究分子振动的强大工具，但目前其在理性分子设计方面的应用有限，需要计算工具的辅助来提升其潜力。
AI.method: 首先概述BonFIRE光谱的理论基础，然后开发了一个全自动计算流程来计算BonFIRE光谱，该流程能够复现实验结果的关键特征。
AI.result: 成功开发了计算BonFIRE光谱的自动化计算管道，能够准确再现实验数据的关键特征，验证了计算方法的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 计算工具可以显著增强振动编码荧光光谱显微镜技术的应用前景，为化学和生物学研究提供新的可能性，特别是在理性分子设计和机理研究方面。

title: Hitchhiker's guide to second-generation Car-Parrinello ab-initio molecular dynamics
summary: In a recent letter [T. D. Kühne, M. Krack, F. Mohamed and M. Parrinello, Phys. Rev. Lett. 98, 066401 (2007)], we outlined a new Car-Parrinello-like approach to Born-Oppenheimer molecular dynamics. Here, we provide a guide to performing actual calculations using our method and demonstrate this on liquid water at ambient conditions. We do not go into methodological details beyond those necessary for applying this approach, but focus on practical details pertinent to our particular implementation within the CP2K/Quickstep code [T. D. Kühne et al., J. Chem. Phys. 152, 194103 (2020)].

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了一种新的Car-Parrinello类Born-Oppenheimer分子动力学方法，并提供了在CP2K/Quickstep代码中实现该方法的实用指南，以环境条件下的液态水为例进行演示。
AI.motivation: 在先前的工作中提出了新的Car-Parrinello类Born-Oppenheimer分子动力学方法，本文旨在提供该方法的实际计算指南，帮助研究人员应用这一新方法进行分子动力学模拟。
AI.method: 采用Car-Parrinello类Born-Oppenheimer分子动力学方法，在CP2K/Quickstep代码中实现，重点关注实际计算中的具体实现细节，以液态水在环境条件下的模拟作为演示案例。
AI.result: 成功实现了该方法的实际计算指南，并在液态水系统中进行了演示，展示了该方法在实际应用中的可行性和有效性。
AI.conclusion: 本文提供了新Car-Parrinello类Born-Oppenheimer分子动力学方法的实用计算指南，通过液态水案例验证了该方法的实用性，为研究人员应用该方法进行分子动力学模拟提供了具体指导。

title: Self-Consistent Coulomb Interactions from Embedded Dynamical Mean-Field Theory
summary: We develop a self-consistent first-principles framework for determining the screened Coulomb interaction strength (U) based on constrained dynamical mean-field theory (cDMFT). Unlike conventional approaches, this method incorporates essential vertex corrections within the same embedded-DMFT formalism used for the electronic structure calculation. Using the cDMFT-derived interaction strengths as input to embedded DMFT yields spectral functions in excellent agreement with photoemission experiments across a wide range of materials, spanning 3d to 5d transition-metal compounds, including correlated metals, Mott insulators, altermagnets, and unconventional superconductors. This unified many-body framework establishes a systematic first-principles route for determining interaction strengths in correlated materials and substantially enhances the predictive power of DFT+DMFT and its extensions.

AI.tldr: 开发了一种基于约束动力学平均场理论(cDMFT)的第一性原理框架，用于确定屏蔽库仑相互作用强度(U)，该方法将顶点修正纳入电子结构计算中，显著提高了DFT+DMFT的预测能力。
AI.motivation: 传统方法在确定相关材料中的相互作用强度(U)时存在局限性，缺乏系统性的第一性原理框架，且通常忽略顶点修正，限制了DFT+DMFT方法的预测准确性。
AI.method: 基于约束动力学平均场理论(cDMFT)开发自洽第一性原理框架，在相同的嵌入DMFT形式中纳入顶点修正，使用cDMFT导出的相互作用强度作为嵌入DMFT的输入。
AI.result: 该方法在广泛的材料体系中(3d到5d过渡金属化合物，包括相关金属、莫特绝缘体、交变磁体和非常规超导体)产生的光谱函数与光电子发射实验数据高度一致。
AI.conclusion: 该统一的多体框架为确定相关材料中的相互作用强度建立了系统性的第一性原理路径，显著增强了DFT+DMFT及其扩展方法的预测能力。

title: Discovery of Van Hove Singularities: Electronic Fingerprints of 3Q Magnetic Order in a van der Waals Quantum Magnet
comment: 23 pages, 4 figures. Accepted in Nature Communications
summary: Magnetically intercalated transition metal dichalcogenides are emerging as a rich platform for exploring exotic quantum states in van der Waals magnets. Among them, CoxTaS2 has attracted intense interest following the recent discovery of a distinctive 3Q magnetic ground state and a pronounced anomalous Hall effect below a critical doping of x=1/3, both intimately tied to cobalt concentration. To date, direct signatures of this enigmatic 3Q magnetic order in the electronic structure remain elusive. Here we report a comprehensive doping dependent angle resolved photoemission spectroscopy study that unveils these long-sought fingerprints. Our data reveal an unexpected "inverse Mexican hat" dispersion along the K-M-K direction, accompanied by two van Hove singularities. These features are consistent with theoretical predictions for a 3Q magnetic order near three-quarters band filling on a cobalt triangular lattice. These results provide evidence of 3Q magnetic order in the electronic structure, establishing TMD van der Waals magnets as tunable materials to explore the interplay between magnetism and topology.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过角分辨光电子能谱揭示了CoxTaS2中3Q磁序在电子结构中的直接证据，发现了"倒墨西哥帽"色散和范霍夫奇点特征。
AI.motivation: 磁插层过渡金属二硫化物是探索范德华磁体中奇异量子态的新平台。CoxTaS2在掺杂浓度x<1/3时表现出独特的3Q磁基态和显著反常霍尔效应，但3Q磁序在电子结构中的直接证据一直缺失。
AI.method: 采用掺杂依赖的角分辨光电子能谱研究，系统分析不同钴浓度下CoxTaS2的电子结构特征。
AI.result: 发现了沿K-M-K方向的"倒墨西哥帽"色散和两个范霍夫奇点，这些特征与钴三角晶格上四分之三能带填充附近的3Q磁序理论预测一致。
AI.conclusion: 研究首次提供了3Q磁序在电子结构中的直接证据，确立了TMD范德华磁体作为可调谐材料，可用于探索磁性与拓扑之间的相互作用。

title: Measurement-induced crossover in quantum first-detection times
summary: The quantum first-detection problem concerns the statistics of the time at which a system, subject to repeated measurements, is observed in a prescribed target state for the first time. Unlike its classical counterpart, the measurement back action intrinsic to quantum mechanics may profoundly alter the system dynamics. Here we show that it induces a distinct change in the statistics of the first-detection time. For a quantum particle in one spatial dimension subject to stroboscopic measurements, we observe an algebraic decay of the probability of the first-detection time if the particle is free, an exponential decay in the presence of a confining potential, and a time-dependent crossover between these behaviors if the particle is partially confined. This crossover reflects the purely quantum nature of the detection process, which fundamentally distinguishes it from the first-passage problem in classical systems.

AI.tldr: 量子首次检测问题研究量子系统在重复测量下首次被观测到处于目标态的时间统计特性，揭示了测量反作用导致的独特统计行为。
AI.motivation: 研究量子首次检测问题，探索量子测量反作用如何影响系统动力学，并与经典首次通过问题进行区分。
AI.method: 对一维空间中的量子粒子进行频闪测量，分析自由粒子、束缚势场和部分束缚情况下的首次检测时间统计特性。
AI.result: 自由粒子的首次检测概率呈代数衰减，束缚势场下呈指数衰减，部分束缚情况下呈现时间依赖的交叉行为。
AI.conclusion: 量子首次检测过程展现出与经典系统根本不同的统计特性，反映了量子测量反作用的独特影响。

title: Giant Damping-like Spin-Torque Conductivity in a GeTe/Py van der Waals Heterostructure
summary: Recent observations of large unconventional spin-orbit torques in van der Waals (vdW) materials are driving intense interest for energy-efficient spintronic applications. A key limitation of ferromagnet (FM)/vdW heterostructures is their lower value of damping-like torque conductivity ($σ{\rm_{DL}^{y}}$) compared to the conventional heavy metal-based systems, limiting their prospects for commercial spintronic devices. Here, we report both a giant $σ{\rm_{DL}^{y}}$ of $-(1.25 \pm 0.11)\times 10^{5}~\hbar/ 2e~Ω^{-1}$m$^{-1}$ and an unconventional spin-orbit torque in a heterostructure comprising an FM (Ni$_{80}$Fe$_{20}$) and the vdW material GeTe. The value of $σ{\rm_{DL}^{y}}$ represents the highest reported torque conductivity for any FM/vdW interface and is comparable to benchmark heavy metal heterostructures. First-principles calculations reveal that this substantial torque originates from the cooperative interplay of the spin Hall effect, orbital Hall effect, and orbital Rashba effect, assisted by interfacial charge transfer. These findings demonstrate the potential of carefully engineered vdW heterostructures to achieve highly efficient electrical manipulation of magnetization at room temperature, paving the way for next-generation low-power spintronic devices.

AI.tldr: 在NiFe/GeTe范德华异质结构中实现了巨大的阻尼类扭矩电导率，达到-(1.25±0.11)×10⁵ ħ/2e Ω⁻¹m⁻¹，这是所有FM/vdW界面中最高的，可与传统重金属系统媲美。
AI.motivation: 范德华材料中的巨大非常规自旋轨道扭矩引起了人们对高效自旋电子应用的浓厚兴趣，但FM/vdW异质结构的阻尼类扭矩电导率较低，限制了其商业应用前景。
AI.method: 采用铁磁体(Ni₈₀Fe₂₀)与范德华材料GeTe组成的异质结构，通过第一性原理计算揭示扭矩的物理机制。
AI.result: 获得了巨大的阻尼类扭矩电导率σDL^y = -(1.25±0.11)×10⁵ ħ/2e Ω⁻¹m⁻¹，这是所有FM/vdW界面中最高的，可与基准重金属异质结构相媲美。
AI.conclusion: 研究表明，通过精心设计的范德华异质结构可以实现室温下高效的电控磁化，为下一代低功耗自旋电子器件铺平道路。

title: Unusual antiferromagnetic order and fluctuations in RbMn$_{6}$Bi$_{5}$
summary: Quasi-one-dimensional RbMn$_{6}$Bi$_{5}$, the first pressure-induced ternary Mn-based superconductor, exhibits a phase diagram analogous to those of cuprate and iron-based superconductors, with superconductivity neighboring antiferromagnetic order. Here, we use $^{55}$Mn and $^{87}$Rb nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) to unravel its magnetic structure and fluctuations. Above the Néel temperature ($T_{\rm N}$), strong antiferromagnetic fluctuations dominate, characteristic of a paramagnetic state with pronounced spin-lattice relaxation rate enhancement. Below $T_{\rm N}$, a first-order phase transition establishes a commensurate antiferromagnetic order, where Mn atoms at the pentagon corners exhibit distinct magnetic moments with different orientations, while the central Mn atom carries no magnetic moment. The complex magnetic architecture, revealed by zero-field and high-magnetic-field NMR spectra, contrasts with earlier neutron diffraction models proposing uniform spin density waves, instead supporting localized moments ordering with charge rearrangement. The proximity of robust antiferromagnetic fluctuations to the high-pressure superconducting phase suggests a potential role for magnetic excitations in mediating unconventional Cooper pairing, akin to paradigmatic high-$T_c$ systems. These findings provide critical insights into the interplay between geometric frustration, magnetic order, and superconductivity in manganese-based materials.

AI.tldr: 通过核磁共振研究揭示了RbMn₆Bi₅的复杂磁结构和涨落，发现其相图类似于铜基和铁基超导体，具有反铁磁涨落与超导相邻的特征
AI.motivation: 研究第一个压力诱导的三元锰基超导体RbMn₆Bi₅的磁结构和涨落，探索其与超导性的关联，特别是其相图与铜基和铁基超导体的相似性
AI.method: 使用⁵⁵Mn和⁸⁷Rb核磁共振技术，在零场和高磁场条件下测量NMR谱，分析自旋-晶格弛豫率增强和磁结构
AI.result: 发现高于奈尔温度时存在强反铁磁涨落，低于奈尔温度时发生一级相变形成共线反铁磁序，五边形角上的Mn原子具有不同取向的磁矩，而中心Mn原子无磁矩，这与之前中子衍射提出的均匀自旋密度波模型不同
AI.conclusion: RbMn₆Bi₅中强反铁磁涨落与高压超导相的邻近关系表明磁激发可能在介导非常规Cooper配对中起关键作用，为锰基材料中几何阻挫、磁序和超导性的相互作用提供了重要见解

title: Full Reaction Pathway Dynamics for Atmospheric Decomposition Reactions: The Photodissociation of H$_2$COO
summary: Branching ratios for fragmentation channels of important meta- and unstable species are essential for a molecular-level characterization of atmospheric chemistry. Here, the molecular product channels for the decomposition dynamics of the smallest Criegee intermediate, H$_2$COO, are quantitatively investigated. Using a high-quality, full-dimensional machine learned potential energy surface (CASPT2/aug-cc-pVTZ), the translational, rotational, and vibrational energy distributions of the CO$_2$+H$_2$, H$_2$O+CO, and HCO+OH fragmentation channels were analyzed to elucidate partitioning of the available energy. The CO$_2$ + H$_2$ product forms through two different pathways that bifurcate after formation of the OCH$_2$O intermediate. Along the direct pathway, CO$_2$ is preferentially vibrationally excited with H$_2$in its vibrational ground state, whereas for the indirect pathway going through formic acid, H$_2$ can populate levels with $v > 0$. For all product channels passing through energized formic acid, the lifetime distributions are described by stretched exponentials with $β$ ranging from 1.1 to 1.7. This is a clear signature of non-RRKM effects and suggests that the explicit molecular dynamics needs to be followed for a quantitative and realistic description of the photodissociation dynamics.

AI.tldr: 研究最小Criegee中间体H₂COO的分解动力学，分析CO₂+H₂、H₂O+CO和HCO+OH三种碎片通道的能量分布，揭示非RRKM效应的重要性
AI.motivation: 大气化学中重要亚稳态和不稳定物种的碎片通道分支比对分子水平表征至关重要，需要定量研究最小Criegee中间体H₂COO的分解动力学产物通道
AI.method: 使用高质量全维机器学习势能面（CASPT2/aug-cc-pVTZ），分析CO₂+H₂、H₂O+CO和HCO+OH碎片通道的平动、转动和振动能量分布，阐明可用能量的分配机制
AI.result: CO₂+H₂产物通过两条不同路径形成：直接路径中CO₂优先振动激发，H₂处于振动基态；间接路径通过甲酸时H₂可占据v>0的能级。所有通过激发态甲酸的产物通道寿命分布均可用β值1.1-1.7的拉伸指数函数描述，表明存在非RRKM效应
AI.conclusion: 拉伸指数寿命分布是非RRKM效应的明确标志，表明需要显式分子动力学模拟才能对光解离动力学进行定量和现实的描述

title: Chaotic Dynamics and Bifurcation Analysis of the Hindmarsh-Rose Neuron Model with Blue-Sky Catastrophe under Magnetic Field Influence
summary: We investigate the impact of magnetic-field-induced feedback on the dynamics of a Hindmarsh-Rose neuron model exhibiting a blue-sky catastrophe. By introducing a magnetic flux variable that couples nonlinearly to the membrane potential, we demonstrate that electromagnetic effects profoundly reshape neuronal firing patterns and bifurcation structure. Interspike-interval bifurcation analysis reveals a nonmonotonic dependence on the magnetic coupling strength, with weak coupling preserving regular spiking and bursting, intermediate coupling promoting chaotic bursting, and strong coupling yielding structured irregular dynamics. These transitions are quantitatively characterized using the largest Lyapunov exponent computed via the Wolf algorithm and supported by Poincaré sections and time-series analysis. Our results establish electromagnetic feedback as a robust and tunable mechanism for controlling instability and chaos in slow-fast neuronal systems.

AI.tldr: 研究磁场反馈对Hindmarsh-Rose神经元模型动力学的影响，发现电磁效应能重塑神经元放电模式和分岔结构，提供可调控的混沌控制机制。
AI.motivation: 探究电磁场如何影响神经元动力学，特别是对经历蓝天空难的Hindmarsh-Rose神经元模型，理解电磁反馈在神经元活动调控中的作用。
AI.method: 引入磁通量变量与膜电位非线性耦合，采用Wolf算法计算最大Lyapun夫指数，结合庞加莱截面和时间序列分析进行定量表征。
AI.result: 发现磁耦合强度对神经元放电模式有非单调影响：弱耦合保持规则放电和爆发，中等耦合促进混沌爆发，强耦合产生结构化不规则动力学。
AI.conclusion: 电磁反馈是控制慢-快神经元系统不稳定性和混沌的稳健可调机制，为神经元动力学调控提供了新途径。

title: Emergent gauge flux and spin ordering in magnetized triangular spin liquids: applications to Hofstadter-Hubbard model
summary: Motivated by the recent progress in the moiré superlattice systems and spin-1/2 triangular lattice antiferromagnets, we revisit the triangular-lattice spin liquids and study their magnetic responses. While the magnetic responses on the ordered phases can be mundane, the orbital magnetic flux and the Zeeman coupling have synergetic effects on the internal gauge flux generations in the relevant spin liquid phases. The former was known to induce an internal U(1) gauge flux indirectly through the charge fluctuations and ring exchange, and thus could lead to the formation of a chiral spin liquid. The latter could spontaneously generate a uniform field-dependent internal gauge flux, driving a conically-ordered state. The competition and interplay between these two field effects are discussed through a generic spin-1/2 $J_1$-$J_2$-$J_χ$ model and with the experimental consequences. Our results could find applications in the moiré superlattice systems with the Hofstadter-Hubbard model as well as the triangular lattice antiferromagnets.

AI.tldr: 研究三角晶格自旋液体在轨道磁通和塞曼耦合协同作用下的磁响应，探讨两者竞争与相互作用对内部规范通量生成的影响。
AI.motivation: 受莫尔超晶格系统和三角晶格反铁磁体最新进展的启发，重新研究三角晶格自旋液体及其磁响应特性。
AI.method: 通过通用的自旋-1/2 J1-J2-Jχ模型，分析轨道磁通和塞曼耦合对内部规范通量生成的协同效应。
AI.result: 轨道磁通通过电荷涨落和环交换间接诱导U(1)规范通量，可能导致手性自旋液体形成；塞曼耦合能自发产生均匀场依赖的内部规范通量，驱动锥形有序态。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果可应用于具有Hofstadter-Hubbard模型的莫尔超晶格系统以及三角晶格反铁磁体，揭示了两种场效应竞争与相互作用的物理机制。

title: Spin-Valley Locking in 2H-TaS2 and Its Co-Intercalated Counterpart: Roles of Surface Domains and Co Intercalation
summary: Tuning and probing spin-valley coupling is key to understanding correlated ground states in 2$\it{H}$-TaS$_2$. Its magnetically intercalated analogue, Co$_{1/3}$TaS$_2$, introduces additional degrees of freedom, including modified interlayer coupling and magnetism, to modulate spin-valley physics. Surface-sensitive probes like ARPES are essential for accessing surface spin texture, yet previous studies on 2$\it{H}$-TMDs have reported conflicting results regarding spin-polarized bands, leaving open whether these discrepancies are intrinsic or extrinsic. Here we performed spatially resolved spin-ARPES measurements on 2$\it{H}$-TaS$_2$ and Co$_{1/3}$TaS$_2$. Our results reveal robust spin-valley locking on both compounds. Importantly, Co intercalation enhances interlayer hybridization and introduces magnetism while preserving the TaS$_2$-derived spin texture. We further observe a spatial reversal of the out-of-plane spin polarization, which we attribute to different surface domains. This effect complicates quantifying spin textures and may underlie prior inconsistent observations. Our findings provide microscopic insight into how interlayer interactions and surface domains together govern spin-valley phenomena in layered TMDs.

AI.tldr: 通过空间分辨自旋ARPES研究2H-TaS₂和Co₁/₃TaS₂，发现两者均存在稳健的自旋-谷锁定，Co插层增强层间杂化并引入磁性但保持TaS₂的自旋纹理，观察到空间反转的自旋极化源于不同表面畴
AI.motivation: 研究2H-TaS₂及其磁性插层类似物Co₁/₃TaS₂中的自旋-谷耦合，解决先前关于TMDs中自旋极化能带存在矛盾结果的问题，确定这些差异是内在还是外在因素导致
AI.method: 采用空间分辨自旋角分辨光电子能谱（spin-ARPES）对2H-TaS₂和Co₁/₃TaS₂进行测量，分析表面自旋纹理和空间分布
AI.result: 两种化合物均显示稳健的自旋-谷锁定；Co插层增强层间杂化并引入磁性，但保持TaS₂衍生的自旋纹理；观察到空间反转的出平面自旋极化，归因于不同表面畴
AI.conclusion: 层间相互作用和表面畴共同调控层状TMDs中的自旋-谷现象，表面畴效应可能解释了先前不一致的观测结果

title: Stochastic dynamics from maximum entropy in action space
summary: We develop an information-theoretic formulation of stochastic dynamics in which the fundamental stochastic variable is the total action connecting spacetime points, rather than individual paths. By maximizing Shannon entropy over a joint distribution of actions and endpoints, subject to normalization and a constraint on the mean action, we obtain a Boltzmann-like distribution in action space. This framework reproduces the standard Brownian propagator in the nonrelativistic limit and naturally extends to relativistic regimes, where the Wiener construction fails to preserve Lorentz covariance. The approach bypasses functional integration over paths, makes the role of entropic degeneracy explicit through an action-space density of states, and provides a transparent connection between the principle of least action and statistical inference. We derive the density of states explicitly using large deviation theory, showing that it takes a Gaussian form centered at the minimal action, and rigorously justify the saddle-point approximation in the diffusive regime. The Markovian property of the resulting propagator is verified to hold via the Chapman--Kolmogorov equation, following from the additivity of the minimal action for free-particle dynamics. In the diffusive regime, the resulting dynamics are governed by a competition between extremization of the action and entropic effects, which can be interpreted in terms of an effective action free energy. Our results establish an unified, covariant, and information-based foundation for classical and relativistic stochastic processes.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种基于信息论的动作空间随机动力学框架，通过最大化动作和端点的联合分布的香农熵，得到类似玻尔兹曼分布的动作空间分布，统一了经典和相对论性随机过程。
AI.motivation: 传统路径积分方法在相对论性区域无法保持洛伦兹协变性，且功能积分计算复杂。需要一种统一、协变、基于信息论的基础来建立经典和相对论性随机过程。
AI.method: 将基本随机变量设为连接时空点的总作用量而非单个路径，在归一化和平均作用量约束下最大化香农熵，得到动作空间的玻尔兹曼分布。使用大偏差理论推导状态密度，验证马尔可夫性质。
AI.result: 在非相对论极限下重现标准布朗传播子，自然扩展到相对论区域。动作空间状态密度呈以最小作用量为中心的高斯形式，在扩散区域严格证明鞍点近似。传播子满足查普曼-科尔莫戈罗夫方程。
AI.conclusion: 该框架建立了统一、协变、基于信息论的经典和相对论随机过程基础，绕过了路径的功能积分，通过动作空间状态密度明确熵简并作用，揭示了最小作用量原理与统计推断之间的透明联系。

title: Kineo-Elasticity and Nonreciprocal Phonons by Rashba-induced Interfacial Spin-Lattice Coupling
summary: We identify a previously unrecognized spin-lattice coupling that is allowed in the presence of broken inversion symmetry that can be considered as a lattice analogue to the electronic Rashba spin-orbit coupling. In the low-frequency regime with magnons integrated out, the interfacial spin-lattice coupling is shown to engender a kineo-elastic term in the phonon Lagrangian that couples the strain on the lattice to its velocity and thereby gives rise to a nonreciprocity in transverse phonon velocity. We further analyze the full magnon-phonon spectrum and uncover directional hybridization and absorption, leading to asymmetric phonon propagation lengths for opposite directions. Our results indicate that such interfacial spin-lattice coupling can serve as an efficient route to achieve nonreciprocal phonon propagation properties in magnetic heterostructures with strong Rashba spin-orbit coupling.

AI.tldr: 发现一种新型自旋-晶格耦合机制，类似于电子Rashba自旋轨道耦合，可在磁性异质结构中实现非互易声子传播
AI.motivation: 在具有破缺反演对称性的磁性异质结构中，探索实现非互易声子传播的新物理机制，为声子器件设计提供新途径
AI.method: 理论识别界面自旋-晶格耦合机制，分析低频区磁振子积分后的运动-弹性项，研究完整磁振子-声子谱中的定向杂化和吸收效应
AI.result: 发现界面自旋-晶格耦合产生晶格应变与速度耦合的运动-弹性项，导致横向声子速度非互易性；揭示定向杂化和吸收导致相反方向声子传播长度不对称
AI.conclusion: 界面自旋-晶格耦合是强Rashba自旋轨道耦合磁性异质结构中实现非互易声子传播特性的有效途径

title: Finite-momentum bound pairs of two electrons in an altermagnetic metal
summary: We solve the two-electron problem on a square lattice with $d$-wave altermagnetism, considering both on-site and nearest-neighbor attractive interactions. The altermagnetic spin-splitting in the single-particle dispersion naturally gives rise to a ground state of two-electron bound pairs with nonzero center-of-mass momentum. This finite-momentum pairing can be interpreted as a two-body mechanism underlying the recently proposed altermagnetism-induced Fulde--Ferrell--Larkin--Ovchinnikov (FFLO) superconducting state. Additionally, when the nearest-neighbor attraction is strong, the resulting finite-momentum bound pairs exhibit a mixture of both spin-singlet and spin-triplet characteristics, suggesting the possibility of unconventional superconductors, where spin-singlet and spin-triplet pairings coexist.

AI.tldr: 在具有d波交变磁性的方晶格上研究双电子问题，发现交变磁性的自旋劈裂导致具有非零质心动量的双电子束缚对，这为交变磁性诱导的FFLO超导态提供了微观机制，并在强近邻吸引下出现自旋单态与三重态的混合配对。
AI.motivation: 研究交变磁性系统中双电子配对行为，探索交变磁性如何影响超导配对机制，特别是能否产生有限动量配对（FFLO态）以及是否会出现非常规的自旋混合配对。
AI.method: 在具有d波交变磁性的方晶格上求解双电子问题，同时考虑在位和最近邻吸引相互作用，分析单粒子色散中的自旋劈裂如何影响双电子束缚态的形成。
AI.result: 交变磁性的自旋劈裂导致双电子束缚对具有非零质心动量，这为交变磁性诱导的FFLO超导态提供了微观机制；强近邻吸引下，有限动量束缚对表现出自旋单态和自旋三重态的混合特征。
AI.conclusion: 交变磁性系统能够自然地产生有限动量配对（FFLO态），并在适当条件下实现自旋单态与三重态的共存，为探索新型非常规超导体提供了理论可能性。

title: Simplified Range-Separation Tuning as a Practical Starting Point for G0W0 and Bethe-Salpeter Calculations
summary:
The accuracy of one-shot $G_0W_0$ and the Bethe-Salpeter equation (BSE) is well known to be highly sensitive to the choice of the starting-point eigensystem, typically obtained from mean-field theory. A highly effective method explored is the use of density functional approximation (DFA) with a range-separated hybrid (RSH) approach.
  In this work, we evaluate the performance of $G_0W_0$ in predicting ionization potentials and the BSE for describing neutral excitations, employing a recently proposed, broadly applicable, and computationally efficient range-separation tuning scheme [Singh \textit{et. al.}, Journal of Physical Chemistry Letters, 16, 32, 8198-8208, (2025)]. Our results demonstrate that this simplified tuning protocol provides an accurate starting point for many-body perturbation theory, thereby eliminating the need for conventional, multi-step optimally tuned RSH optimization procedure. The resulting quasiparticle energies from $G_0W_0$ closely reproduce reference ionization potentials, while BSE calculations based on the same tuned RSH orbitals yield quantitatively accurate optical absorption spectra and excitonic properties across a range of molecular systems and clusters.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种简化的范围分离调谐方案，用于改进G₀W₀和BSE计算的起始点，无需传统多步优化过程，即可获得准确的准粒子能量和光学性质。
AI.motivation: 传统G₀W₀和BSE计算的准确性高度依赖于起始点本征系统（通常来自平均场理论）的选择，而传统的多步最优调谐范围分离杂化（RSH）优化过程计算成本高且复杂。
AI.method: 采用最近提出的简化范围分离调谐方案，该方案具有广泛适用性和计算效率，用于优化密度泛函近似（DFA）中的范围分离杂化（RSH）参数，作为G₀W₀和BSE计算的起始点。
AI.result: 简化的调谐协议为多体微扰理论提供了准确的起始点，G₀W₀计算的准粒子能量与参考电离势高度吻合，基于相同调谐RSH轨道的BSE计算在多种分子系统和团簇中产生了定量准确的光学吸收光谱和激子性质。
AI.conclusion: 该简化调谐方案能够替代传统的多步最优调谐RSH优化过程，为G₀W₀和BSE计算提供高效且准确的起始点，显著提高了计算效率和预测准确性。
