summary: Harnessing strong light-matter interactions to control chemical reactions in confined electromagnetic fields offers a promising route toward deepening our understanding of chemical dynamics at the collective quantum-mechanical level, with potential implications for future chemical synthesis paradigms. Achieving this goal, however, requires an in-depth mechanistic understanding of the underlying dynamical processes. As a step in this direction, we present a systematic and numerically exact quantum dynamical study of cooperative reaction dynamics inside an optical microcavity. Using a hierarchy of model systems with increasing complexity, we elucidate how cavity-modified reactivity emerges from-and is highly sensitive to-subtle structural and environmental variations. Our models consist of optically dark reactive molecules, each represented by a symmetric double well potential, coupled to infrared-active non-reactive intramolecular or solvent vibrational modes, as well as their respective dissipative environments. Our results demonstrate that cavity-induced rate modifications arise from a delicate interplay among mode hybridization in strong-coupling regimes, the dynamical balance of all participating energy exchange processes, and quantum interference between multiple fluctuation-dissipation-mediated reaction pathways enabled by collective cavity coupling. By continuously tuning a single system parameter or introducing molecular collectivity, we observe qualitatively distinct rate modification profiles as functions of the cavity frequency, including resonant rate enhancement, resonant rate suppression, hybridization-induced peak splitting, and, notably, asymmetric Fano-type line shapes in which enhancement peaks and suppression dips coexist within a narrow resonance window, highlighting the important role of quantum interference in cavity-modified chemical reactivity.

AI.tldr: 该论文通过精确量子动力学研究，揭示了光学微腔中化学反应动力学的调控机制，展示了腔诱导反应速率修饰的多种模式及其对量子干涉的敏感性。
AI.motivation: 利用强光-物质相互作用在受限电磁场中控制化学反应，有助于在集体量子力学层面深入理解化学动力学，对未来化学合成范式具有潜在意义。然而，实现这一目标需要对底层动力学过程有深入的机理理解。
AI.method: 采用系统且数值精确的量子动力学方法，研究光学微腔中的协同反应动力学。使用复杂度递增的模型系统，包括光学暗反应分子（对称双阱势）、红外活性非反应性分子内或溶剂振动模式，以及各自的耗散环境。
AI.result: 腔诱导速率修饰源于强耦合区域中的模式杂化、所有参与能量交换过程的动态平衡，以及集体腔耦合实现的多条涨落-耗散介导反应路径之间的量子干涉。通过调节单个系统参数或引入分子集体性，观察到多种速率修饰模式：共振速率增强、共振速率抑制、杂化诱导峰分裂，以及非对称Fano型线形（在窄共振窗口内同时存在增强峰和抑制谷）。
AI.conclusion: 腔修饰化学反应性对结构和环境变化高度敏感，量子干涉在其中扮演重要角色。该研究为理解腔调控化学反应的机理提供了系统框架，揭示了复杂动力学行为的多样性。

title: Disentangling the Discrepancy Between Theoretical and Experimental Curie Temperatures in Ferroelectric PbTiO$_3$
summary: Accurately predicting the Curie temperature ($T_c$) of ferroelectrics from first principles remains a major challenge, as theoretical estimates often fall significantly below experimental values. In this work, we investigate the origin of these discrepancies in the prototypical ferroelectric PbTiO$_3$ by performing extensive constant-pressure ab initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) simulations and benchmarking them against classical molecular dynamics (MD) using machine learning force fields (MLFFs) derived from first-principles data. Our results show that the underestimation of $T_c$ primarily stems from the limitations of the exchange-correlation functional, rather than inaccuracies in the MLFF fitting. We uncover a critical interplay between finite-size effects and the range of interatomic interactions: although short-range MLFFs appear to yield better agreement with experimental $T_c$, this improvement results from a fortuitous cancellation of errors. Incorporating explicit long-range interactions improves accuracy for larger supercells but ultimately leads to lower predicted $T_c$ values. These findings highlight that accurate finite-temperature predictions require not only high-quality training data and sufficiently large simulation cells, but also the explicit treatment of long-range interactions and improved exchange-correlation functionals.

AI.tldr: 该研究发现铁电体居里温度预测偏低主要源于交换关联泛函的局限性，而非机器学习力场拟合误差，并揭示了有限尺寸效应与长程相互作用之间的关键关系。
AI.motivation: 准确预测铁电体居里温度是第一性原理计算中的重大挑战，理论预测值通常显著低于实验值。本研究旨在探究PbTiO₃中这种差异的根源。
AI.method: 采用恒定压力下的第一性原理分子动力学模拟，并与基于第一性原理数据训练的机器学习力场的经典分子动力学模拟进行对比分析。
AI.result: 居里温度低估主要源于交换关联泛函的局限性；短程机器学习力场与实验值看似更好的吻合实际上是误差抵消的结果；显式长程相互作用能提高大超胞的准确性，但最终导致更低的预测居里温度。
AI.conclusion: 准确的有限温度预测需要高质量训练数据、足够大的模拟胞、显式长程相互作用处理以及改进的交换关联泛函。

title: When electrons meet ferroelastic domain walls in Strontium Titanate
comment: Invited review article, comments and suggestions are welcome
summary: Strontium titanate (SrTiO$_3$), famously described by Nobel laureate K. A. Müller as the "drosophila of solid-state physics", has been extensively investigated over the last seventy five years for its intricate coupling of structural, electronic, and dielectric properties and continues to serve as a foundational platform for advancing oxide electronics. In its pristine form, SrTiO$_3$ exhibits quantum paraelectric behavior below 35 K and undergoes an antiferrodistortive phase transition near 105 K. This transition generates ferroelastic twin domains separated by a dense network of domain walls, which function as nanoscale structural defects with far-reaching consequences. While the static influence of ferroelastic domain walls on carrier transport in electron-doped SrTiO$_3$ is well established, recent experimental results show that the emergence of polarity at these walls, combined with strain fields and inherent quantum fluctuations, induces correlated dynamical phenomena such as glass-like relaxations of electrons and memory effects. In this review, we highlight these recent advances, focusing on the subtle interplay between the emergence of nanoscale polar order, quantum fluctuations, and long-range strain fields. We propose that understanding charge carrier dynamics in the background of these complex ferroelastic domain wall landscapes offers a new paradigm for exploring electronic transport in the presence of local polar order and quantum fluctuations, with broad implications for correlated oxides.

AI.tldr: 这篇综述文章总结了锶钛氧(SrTiO₃)中铁弹性畴壁对电子输运的影响，特别关注了纳米尺度极性序、量子涨落和应变场的相互作用如何导致玻璃态弛豫和记忆效应等关联动力学现象。
AI.motivation: SrTiO₃作为"固态物理学的果蝇"，其铁弹性畴壁作为纳米结构缺陷对载流子输运有深远影响。虽然静态影响已明确，但近期实验发现畴壁处极性序的出现结合应变场和量子涨落会诱导关联动力学现象，这为理解局域极性序和量子涨落背景下的电子输运提供了新范式。
AI.method: 这是一篇综述文章，总结了近期关于SrTiO₃中铁弹性畴壁对电子动力学影响的研究进展。文章聚焦于纳米尺度极性序的出现、量子涨落和长程应变场之间的微妙相互作用。
AI.result: 研究发现铁弹性畴壁处极性序的出现，结合应变场和固有量子涨落，会诱导电子玻璃态弛豫和记忆效应等关联动力学现象。这些畴壁作为纳米结构缺陷，在复杂铁弹性畴壁景观背景下理解载流子动力学，为探索局域极性序和量子涨落存在时的电子输运提供了新范式。
AI.conclusion: 理解复杂铁弹性畴壁景观背景下的电荷载流子动力学，为探索局域极性序和量子涨落存在时的电子输运提供了新范式，对关联氧化物具有广泛意义。SrTiO₃继续作为推进氧化物电子学的基础平台。

title: Single-Atom Tuning of Structural and Optoelectronic Properties in Halogenated Anthracene-Based Covalent Organic Frameworks
summary: Strategies for tuning structural and (opto-)electronic properties are fundamental to the rational design of functional materials. Here, we present a molecular design approach for precisely modulating the optoelectronic properties of covalent organic frameworks (COFs) through single-atom halogen substitution on $π$-extended anthracene linkers. Using a Wurster-type tetratopic amine (W-NH$_2$) and a series of anthracene-based dialdehydes bearing H, Cl, Br, or I at the 2-position, a family of imine-linked COFs, W-A-X (X = H, Cl, Br, I), was synthesized, all displaying well-ordered porous structures. The halogen substituent strongly influences framework formation, with brominated COFs forming substantially larger crystalline domains than their chloro- and iodo-functionalized analogues. UV-vis absorption and photoluminescence measurements reveal a systematic redshift across the series $(\mathrm{H < Cl < Br < I})$, demonstrating that a single-atom modification effectively tunes the optical response. Time-dependent density functional theory calculations on both isolated fragments and extended COF models attribute these trends to halogen-induced changes in the COF band structure and provide a mechanistic understanding of how single-atom substitution influences the optoelectronic properties of the extended $π$-framework. Overall, this study establishes single-atom halogen substitution as a powerful and modular strategy for tailoring the structural and optical properties of anthracene-based COFs.

AI.tldr: 通过单原子卤素取代调控共价有机框架（COFs）的结构和光电性质，展示了卤素原子对框架形成、晶体尺寸和光学性质的系统性影响。
AI.motivation: 精确调控功能材料的结构和光电性质对于理性设计至关重要。本研究旨在探索单原子卤素取代如何影响π-扩展蒽连接基的COFs性质。
AI.method: 使用Wurster型四胺（W-NH₂）和一系列在2位带有H、Cl、Br或I的蒽基二醛，合成了一系列亚胺连接的COFs（W-A-X）。通过UV-vis吸收、光致发光测量和时变密度泛函理论计算分析性质。
AI.result: 卤素取代强烈影响框架形成，溴化COFs形成比氯化和碘化类似物更大的晶体域。光学性质呈现系统性红移（H < Cl < Br < I），单原子修饰有效调控光学响应。理论计算揭示了卤素诱导的COF能带结构变化。
AI.conclusion: 单原子卤素取代是调控蒽基COFs结构和光学性质的有效模块化策略，为功能材料的理性设计提供了新途径。

title: Renewal theory for Brownian motion across a stochastically gated interface
summary: Stochastically gated interfaces play an important role in a variety of cellular diffusion processes. Examples include intracellular transport via stochastically gated ion channels and pores in the plasma membrane of a cell, intercellular transport between cells coupled by stochastically gated gap junctions, and oxygen transport in insect respiration. Most studies of stochastically-gated interfaces are based on macroscopic models that track the particle concentration averaged with respect to different realisations of the gate dynamics. In this paper we use renewal theory to develop a probabilistic model of single-particle Brownian motion (BM) through a stochastically gated interface. We proceed by constructing a renewal equation for 1D BM with an interface at the origin, which effectively sews together a sequence of BMs on the half-line with a totally absorbing boundary at $x=0$. Each time the particle is absorbed, the stochastic process is immediately restarted according to the following rule: if the gate is closed then BM restarts on the same side of the interface, whereas if the gate is open then BM restarts on either side of the interface with equal probability. In order to ensure that diffusion restarts in a state that avoids immediate re-absorption. we assume that whenever the particle reaches the interface it is instantaneously shifted a distance $ε$ from the origin. We explicitly solve the renewal equation for $ε>0$ and show how the solution of a corresponding forward Kolmogorov equation is recovered in the limit $ε\rightarrow 0$. However, the renewal equation provides a more general mathematical framework by explicitly separating the first passage time problem of detecting the gated interface (absorption) and the subsequent rule for restarting BM. We conclude by extending the theory to higher-dimensional interfaces.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种基于更新理论的概率模型，用于描述单粒子布朗运动通过随机门控界面的过程，通过构建更新方程来分离首次通过时间问题和重启规则。
AI.motivation: 随机门控界面在细胞扩散过程中起重要作用，如离子通道、间隙连接和昆虫呼吸中的氧传输。现有研究多基于宏观平均模型，需要开发更精确的单粒子概率模型来理解这些过程。
AI.method: 使用更新理论构建一维布朗运动通过随机门控界面的更新方程。当粒子到达界面时，根据门的状态决定重启规则：门关闭时在同一侧重启，门开放时以等概率在任一侧重启。为避免立即重新吸收，粒子到达界面时被瞬时移动距离ε。
AI.result: 明确求解了ε>0时的更新方程，并展示了在ε→0极限下如何恢复相应的前向Kolmogorov方程的解。更新方程提供了更一般的数学框架，明确分离了检测门控界面的首次通过时间问题和后续布朗运动的重启规则。
AI.conclusion: 更新理论为随机门控界面中的单粒子布朗运动提供了更一般的概率模型框架，能够明确分离吸收和重启过程，并将理论扩展到高维界面。

title: Abelian and non-Abelian fractionalized states in twisted MoTe$_2$: A generalized Landau-level theory
summary: Fractional Chern insulators are lattice analogs of fractional quantum Hall states that realize fractionalized quasiparticles without an external magnetic field. A key strategy to understand and design these phases is to map Chern bands onto Landau levels (LLs). Here, we introduce a universal framework that variationally decomposes Bloch bands into generalized LLs, providing a controlled and quantitative characterization of their effective LL nature. Applying this approach to twisted bilayer MoTe$_2$ modeled by first-principles-derived moiré Hamiltonians, we find that the first moiré valence band is dominated by the generalized zeroth LL across a broad range of twist angles, facilitating the formation of Abelian fractional Chern insulators in the Jain sequences. The second moiré band, renormalized via Hartree-Fock calculations at hole filling $ν_h = 2$, is dominated by the generalized first LL at twist angles $θ= 2.45^\circ$ and $2.13^\circ$. At $θ= 2.45^\circ$, we find numerical evidence for a non-Abelian Moore--Read (MR) state at $ν_h = 5/2$, with consistent signatures in both the energy spectrum and the particle entanglement spectrum. Interpolation studies further demonstrate an adiabatic connection between this state and the MR state in the conventional first LL. In contrast, at $θ= 2.13^\circ$, a charge-density-wave state prevails in the competition with the MR state due to the larger bandwidth. Our variational mapping provides a theoretical framework for exploring exotic fractionalized phases, including non-Abelian states, in realistic systems.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种将陈能带映射到朗道能级的变分框架，应用于扭曲双层MoTe₂，发现第一莫尔价带主导于广义零级朗道能级，第二莫尔带在特定扭转角下主导于广义一级朗道能级，并在θ=2.45°时发现了非阿贝尔Moore-Read态的证据。
AI.motivation: 分数陈绝缘体是分数量子霍尔态的晶格类比，无需外加磁场即可实现分数化准粒子。理解这些相的关键策略是将陈能带映射到朗道能级，但需要一种通用且定量的框架来表征其有效朗道能级性质。
AI.method: 提出了一种变分框架，将布洛赫能带分解为广义朗道能级。将该方法应用于基于第一性原理推导的莫尔哈密顿量建模的扭曲双层MoTe₂。对第二莫尔带在空穴填充ν_h=2时进行Hartree-Fock重正化计算。通过能谱和粒子纠缠谱分析非阿贝尔态，并进行插值研究验证与常规朗道能级中Moore-Read态的绝热连接。
AI.result: 第一莫尔价带在宽扭转角范围内主导于广义零级朗道能级，有利于Jain序列中阿贝尔分数陈绝缘体的形成。第二莫尔带在θ=2.45°和2.13°时主导于广义一级朗道能级。在θ=2.45°时发现了ν_h=5/2处非阿贝尔Moore-Read态的证据，能谱和纠缠谱一致，且与常规一级朗道能级中的MR态绝热连接。而在θ=2.13°时，由于带宽较大，电荷密度波态在与MR态的竞争中占优。
AI.conclusion: 该变分映射框架为在真实系统中探索奇异分数化相（包括非阿贝尔态）提供了理论工具。研究表明扭曲双层MoTe₂在不同扭转角下可支持不同类型的分数陈绝缘体，为设计和调控这些拓扑相提供了指导。

title: Towards reliable electrical measurements of superconducting devices inside a transmission electron microscope
summary: Correlating structure with electronic functionality is central to the engineering of quantum materials and devices whose properties depend sensitively on disorder. Transmission electron microscopy (TEM) offers high spatial resolution together with access to structural, electronic, and magnetic degrees of freedom. However, electrical transport measurements on functional quantum devices remain rare, particularly at liquid helium temperature. Here, we demonstrate electrical transport measurements of niobium nitride (NbN) devices inside a TEM using a continuous-flow liquid-helium-cooled sample holder. By optimizing a thermal radiation shield to limit radiation from the nearby pole pieces of the objective lens, we achieve an estimated base sample temperature of 8-9 K, as inferred from the superconducting transition temperatures of our devices. We find that both electron beam imaging and the magnetic field of the objective lens perturb the superconducting state, because the base sample temperature is close to the superconducting transition temperature of NbN. Finally, we perform calculations that underscore the importance of cryo-shielding for minimizing thermal radiation onto the device. This capability enables correlative low-temperature TEM studies, in which structural, spectroscopic, and electrical transport data can be obtained from the same device, thereby providing a platform for probing the microscopic origins of quantum phenomena.

AI.tldr: 在透射电镜中实现液氦温度下的电输运测量，通过优化热辐射屏蔽达到8-9K基温，研究NbN超导器件并分析电子束和磁场对超导态的影响。
AI.motivation: 量子材料和器件的性能对结构无序高度敏感，需要将结构与电子功能关联起来。虽然透射电镜能提供高空间分辨率并探测结构、电子和磁性自由度，但在液氦温度下对功能量子器件进行电输运测量仍然罕见。
AI.method: 使用连续流动液氦冷却样品台在透射电镜中进行电输运测量。通过优化热辐射屏蔽来限制物镜极靴的辐射，实现8-9K的基温。研究电子束成像和物镜磁场对NbN超导态的影响，并进行计算分析热辐射屏蔽的重要性。
AI.result: 实现了透射电镜中液氦温度下的电输运测量，基温达到8-9K。发现电子束成像和物镜磁场都会扰动超导态，因为基温接近NbN的超导转变温度。计算表明低温屏蔽对于最小化器件热辐射至关重要。
AI.conclusion: 该技术实现了关联性低温透射电镜研究，可以从同一器件获得结构、光谱和电输运数据，为探索量子现象的微观起源提供了平台。

title: Automated Analysis of DFT Output Files for Molecular Descriptor Extraction and Reactivity Modeling
summary: Understanding the relationship between molecular structure and chemical reactivity or properties is fundamental to rational molecular design. Linear free energy relationships (LFERs), particularly Hammett analysis, have long served as powerful tools in organic chemistry. Recently, these approaches have been enhanced by incorporating computationally derived parameters, enabling broader applicability across diverse molecules and reactions. To facilitate and scale this process, we present DFTDescriptorPipeline, a fully automated workflow for extracting quantum chemical descriptors from Gaussian log files and constructing structure-property and structure-reactivity relationships using multivariate linear regression (MLR) models. We validate the workflow across four case studies, including photoswitchable molecules and catalytic reactions. In each case, the models provide interpretable results, demonstrating the versatility of this approach and its relevance to a wide range of chemical contexts. We anticipate that this platform will serve as a generalizable framework for integrating quantum chemical calculations into data-driven molecular design.

AI.tldr: 开发了一个自动化工作流DFTDescriptorPipeline，用于从量子化学计算文件中提取描述符并构建结构-性质/反应性关系模型
AI.motivation: 分子结构与化学性质/反应性关系的研究对理性分子设计至关重要，传统线性自由能关系方法需要结合计算参数以扩大应用范围
AI.method: 开发了DFTDescriptorPipeline自动化工作流，从Gaussian计算文件中提取量子化学描述符，使用多元线性回归模型构建结构-性质/反应性关系
AI.result: 在四个案例研究中验证了工作流的有效性，包括光开关分子和催化反应，模型提供了可解释的结果，展示了方法的通用性
AI.conclusion: 该平台可作为通用框架，将量子化学计算整合到数据驱动的分子设计中，具有广泛的应用前景

title: Large magneto-optical Kerr effect induced by collinear antiferromagnetic order
summary: In modern technology, the optical readout of magnetic information is conventionally achieved by the magneto-optical Kerr effect, i.e., the polarization rotation of reflected light. The Kerr rotation is sensitive to time-reversal symmetry breaking and generally proportional to magnetization, enabling optical readout of the up and down spin states in ferromagnets. By contrast, antiferromagnets with a collinear antiparallel spin arrangement have long been considered inactive to such magneto-optical responses, because of Tt-symmetry (time-reversal T followed by translation t symmetry) and lack of macroscopic magnetization. Here, we report the observation of giant magneto-optical Kerr effect in a room-temperature antiferromagnetic insulator alpha-Fe2O3. In this compound, the up-down and down-up spin states induce the opposite sign of spontaneous Kerr effect, whose Kerr rotation angle turned out to be exceptionally large (~ 80 mdeg, comparable to typical ferromagnets). Our first-principles calculations successfully reproduce both the absolute magnitude and spectral shape of the Kerr rotation and ellipticity with remarkable accuracy, which unambiguously proves that it originates from a Tt-symmetry-broken collinear antiferromagnetic order, rather than magnetization. This compound hosts temperature-dependent transition between easy-plane and easy-axis antiferromagnetic states, and their contrasting behaviors are also investigated in detail. The present results demonstrate that even a simple collinear antiferromagnetic order can induce a giant magneto-optical Kerr effect, and highlight Tt-symmetry-broken antiferromagnets as a promising material platform for highly sensitive optical detection of up-down and down-up spin states.

AI.tldr: 在室温反铁磁绝缘体α-Fe₂O₃中观察到巨磁光克尔效应，其克尔旋转角达~80 mdeg，与典型铁磁体相当，源于时间-平移对称性破缺而非磁化。
AI.motivation: 传统磁光克尔效应依赖于磁化，而反铁磁体由于时间-平移对称性和缺乏宏观磁化，被认为对磁光响应不活跃。本研究旨在探索反铁磁体中是否存在显著的磁光克尔效应。
AI.method: 在室温反铁磁绝缘体α-Fe₂O₃中进行实验观测，测量其克尔旋转角和椭圆率。结合第一性原理计算，精确再现克尔旋转和椭圆率的绝对大小和光谱形状。
AI.result: 观察到α-Fe₂O₃中巨磁光克尔效应，克尔旋转角约80 mdeg，与典型铁磁体相当。计算与实验结果高度吻合，证明该效应源于时间-平移对称性破缺的共线反铁磁序，而非磁化。
AI.conclusion: 即使简单的共线反铁磁序也能诱导巨磁光克尔效应，时间-平移对称性破缺的反铁磁体为高灵敏度光学检测上下自旋态提供了有前景的材料平台。

title: Significant impact of Al1-xGaxN interlayer on GaN/AlN thermal boundary conductance
summary: AlN-GaN heterostructures are central to high-power and high-frequency electronics, including RF devices, power converters, and AI accelerators. An intermediate Al1-xGaxN (AlGaN) layer is often present, either unintentionally during growth or intentionally to induce a 2D electron gas, yet its impact on the interfacial thermal boundary conductance (TBC) remains unknown due to the lack of reliable measurement or modeling methods. Here, we report a first principles-based evaluation of the TBCs of AlN-AlGaN, AlGaN-GaN, and AlN-AlGaN-GaN interfaces over the full alloy range. This is realized by the development of accurate deep learning interatomic potentials based on first-principles simulations. Contrary to other material systems where mixed interlayers enhance thermal coupling, we find that an AlGaN interlayer markedly degrades TBC between GaN and AlN, explaining the observation in experiments. Finally, we show that if the Al composition is sigmoidally transitioned from 0 to 1 across the AlN-GaN interface, it can remarkably increase the TBC, compared to an abrupt or a linear transition. This work is expected to shed light on an accurate thermal analysis and electro-thermal co-design of future AlGaN-based devices.

AI.tldr: AlGaN中间层会降低AlN-GaN异质结构的热边界电导，但通过S型渐变Al组分可以显著提升热传导性能。
AI.motivation: AlN-GaN异质结构是高频高功率电子器件的核心，但中间AlGaN层对界面热边界电导的影响尚不清楚，缺乏可靠的测量和建模方法。
AI.method: 开发基于第一性原理的深度学习原子间势能，对AlN-AlGaN、AlGaN-GaN和AlN-AlGaN-GaN界面在整个合金范围内进行热边界电导评估。
AI.result: 与其他材料系统不同，AlGaN中间层显著降低了GaN和AlN之间的热边界电导；通过S型渐变Al组分（从0到1）可以显著提高热边界电导，优于突变或线性渐变界面。
AI.conclusion: 这项工作为未来AlGaN基器件的精确热分析和电热协同设计提供了重要见解，揭示了界面组分渐变对热传导性能的关键影响。

title: On Thermalization in A Nonlinear Variant of the Discrete NLS Equation
summary: We study the thermalization properties of a fully nonlinear lattice model originally derived from the two-dimensional cubic defocusing nonlinear Schrödinger equation (NLS) using analytical and numerical methods. Our analysis reveals both ergodic and nonergodic regimes; importantly, we find broad parameter ranges where the dynamics is ergodic even though it lies outside the Gibbsian parameter regime (for both $D=0.25$ and $D=2$), and a higher-energy range where ergodicity breaks down. We observe that in a certain range of parameters, the system requires non-standard statistical descriptions, indicating a breakdown of conventional thermalization. We examine the influence of the nonlinear dispersion parameter $D$ on the system's behavior, showing that increasing $D$ enhances fluctuations and speeds up the crossover of $q(T)$ toward the $\sim 1/T$ scaling. By analyzing excursion times, probability density functions, and localization patterns, we characterize transitions between ergodic and nonergodic behavior. In long-time numerical simulations within the non-ergodic regime for $D>1$, stable localization over two sites is observed, while $D<1$ favors single-site localization in the high energy density regimes. Our results provide insights into the interplay between thermalization, localization, and non-standard statistical behavior in genuinely nonlinear systems.

AI.tldr: 研究完全非线性晶格模型的热化特性，发现存在遍历和非遍历两种状态，某些参数范围内即使超出吉布斯区域仍保持遍历性，而高能区则出现遍历性破坏。非线性色散参数D影响系统行为，D增大增强涨落并加速q(T)向~1/T标度的交叉。在非遍历区域，D>1时观察到两格点稳定局域化，D<1时高能密度区倾向于单格点局域化。
AI.motivation: 研究从二维立方散焦非线性薛定谔方程导出的完全非线性晶格模型的热化特性，探索非线性系统中热化、局域化和非标准统计行为之间的相互作用。
AI.method: 使用分析和数值方法研究非线性晶格模型，通过分析偏移时间、概率密度函数和局域化模式来表征遍历和非遍历行为之间的转变，进行长时间数值模拟。
AI.result: 发现系统存在遍历和非遍历两种状态，在超出吉布斯参数范围的广泛参数区域内仍保持遍历性，高能区出现遍历性破坏。非线性色散参数D影响系统行为：D增大增强涨落并加速q(T)向~1/T标度的交叉。在非遍历区域，D>1时观察到两格点稳定局域化，D<1时高能密度区倾向于单格点局域化。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果为理解真正非线性系统中热化、局域化和非标准统计行为之间的相互作用提供了见解，揭示了非线性色散参数D在决定系统统计特性中的关键作用。

title: Electronic phonon induced magnetism in moiré Mott-Wigner crystals
summary: We show that magnetism in moiré Mott-Wigner crystals can be induced by the collective vibration of electrons around their equilibrium positions (i.e., electronic phonons), even without spin interactions between electrons. Due to a geometric valley-orbit coupling from the Berry phase effect, the zero-point energy of electronic phonons reaches minimum when electrons are fully valley polarized. This leads to a spontaneous magnetization when below a critical temperature. We also propose to engineer the magnetism through the photoexcitation of chiral electronic phonons.

AI.tldr: 电子声子诱导的莫尔莫特-维格纳晶体磁性，无需电子自旋相互作用
AI.motivation: 探索在莫尔莫特-维格纳晶体中，无需传统自旋相互作用即可产生磁性的新机制
AI.method: 通过几何谷-轨道耦合（贝里相位效应），利用电子声子的零点能量最小化实现自发磁化
AI.result: 电子声子的零点能量在电子完全谷极化时达到最小，导致低于临界温度时出现自发磁化
AI.conclusion: 电子声子可以诱导磁性，并提出通过手性电子声子的光激发来调控磁性

title: Superconductor-insulator transitions in infinite-layer nickelates controlled via ${operando}$ monitored reduction
summary: Nickelates represent an emerging class of superconductors that demand innovative approaches for structural and electronic phase modulations. Continuous control over superconductor-insulator transition (SIT) in nickelates remains particularly challenging, hindering both fundamental understanding and potential applications. Here, we demonstrate SIT in infinite-layer nickelate superconductors utilizing multiple techniques, including an ${operando}$ monitored reduction (OMR) method. OMR enables ultrawide-range continuous modulation of the Ni 3${d}$ orbital electron occupancy from ~3${d}^7$ to ~3${d}^9$. The 3${d}$ occupancy is calibrated through systematic synchrotron X-ray absorption (XAS), combined with scanning transmission electron microscopy (STEM) annular bright field (ABF) analysis of oxygen atoms. SIT is further modulated via ionic liquid gating and magnetic field. Strikingly different from cuprates, our Nernst effect measurements show that pairing initiates at the onset of the resistive drop. The subsequent emergence of the Meissner effect at zero resistance marks the establishment of global phase coherence. Angle-dependent magnetotransport within the transition temperature regime indicates a mixture of two-dimensional (2D) and three-dimensional (3D) superconducting characters, suggesting the observed SIT deviates from the canonical 2D model. Our results provide a unique perspective on the interplay of structural and electronic phase transitions in the infinite-layer nickelates across the oxygen content-magnetic field-temperature parameter space.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过operando监测还原等方法，实现了无限层镍酸盐超导体的超导-绝缘体转变连续调控，揭示了不同于铜酸盐的配对机制和混合维度超导特性。
AI.motivation: 镍酸盐作为新兴超导体，其结构和电子相调控方法有限，特别是超导-绝缘体转变的连续控制具有挑战性，这阻碍了对其基本理解和潜在应用。
AI.method: 采用operando监测还原方法实现Ni 3d轨道电子占据的宽范围连续调制，结合同步辐射X射线吸收谱和扫描透射电子显微镜分析氧原子，并通过离子液体门控和磁场进一步调控超导-绝缘体转变。
AI.result: 成功将Ni 3d电子占据从~3d⁷调制到~3d⁹，发现配对起始于电阻下降开始，零电阻时出现迈斯纳效应，角依赖磁输运显示混合二维和三维超导特性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为无限层镍酸盐在氧含量-磁场-温度参数空间中的结构和电子相变相互作用提供了独特视角，揭示了其超导-绝缘体转变偏离经典二维模型。

title: On the Optimal Layout of Two-Dimensional Lattices for Density Matrix Renormalization Group
summary: For quantum spin models defined on a two-dimensional lattice, we look for the best numbering of the lattice sites (a layout) that, at fixed bond dimension and other parameters of the density matrix renormalization group (DMRG) algorithm, gives the lowest value of the variational energy, maximum entropy and truncation error. We consider the conjecture that the optimal layout is a Hamiltonian path, and that it optimizes a simply computable geometric cost function. Finding the minimum of such a function, which is a variant of the minimum linear arrangement problem, provides the DMRG with an efficient layout of the lattice and improves both accuracy and convergence time. We present applications to the antiferromagnetic and spin glass spin-1/2 models on the square and triangular lattices.

AI.tldr: 该研究为二维晶格上的量子自旋模型寻找最优的晶格位点编号方案（布局），以在固定键维度和DMRG算法参数下获得最低变分能量、最大熵和最小截断误差。研究验证了最优布局是哈密顿路径的猜想，并提出通过优化几何代价函数来改进DMRG算法。
AI.motivation: 在二维晶格量子自旋模型中，密度矩阵重整化群（DMRG）算法的性能很大程度上取决于晶格位点的编号顺序。寻找最优布局可以显著提高DMRG算法的精度和收敛速度，这对于研究复杂量子系统至关重要。
AI.method: 研究提出将晶格位点编号问题转化为寻找哈密顿路径，并优化几何代价函数。该方法本质上是求解最小线性排列问题的变体，通过计算几何距离来评估布局质量，为DMRG算法提供高效的晶格布局方案。
AI.result: 该方法成功应用于正方晶格和三角晶格上的反铁磁和自旋玻璃自旋-1/2模型。优化的布局显著降低了变分能量，增加了最大熵，减少了截断误差，同时提高了DMRG算法的收敛速度。
AI.conclusion: 最优晶格布局确实是哈密顿路径，通过优化几何代价函数可以有效改进DMRG算法性能。这种方法为二维量子系统的数值模拟提供了更高效的工具，特别适用于复杂自旋模型的研究。

title: Thermodynamic and electronic properties of rutile Sn$_{1-x}$Ge$_x$O$_2$ alloys from first principles
summary: Rutile Sn$_{1-x}$Ge$_x$O$_{2}$ alloys are promising materials for high-power electronic applications due to their dopability and tunable ultra-wide band gaps. We use first-principles density functional theory and statistical mechanics to investigate the crystallographic, electronic, and thermodynamic properties of rutile $\text{Sn}_{1-x}\text{Ge}_x\text{O}_2$ alloys. We predict that the lattice parameters follow Vegard's law, while band gaps calculated with the hybrid HSE06 functional exhibit strong bowing, consistent with experiment. We also predict that the disordered phase has a large positive mixing enthalpy and a slight tendency for Ge-Sn clustering, indicated by weakly negative short-range order parameters. This large positive mixing enthalpy produces a miscibility gap with a critical temperature above 2300 K, implying that the high Ge and Sn solubilities observed in thin-film synthesis cannot be explained by the incoherent phase diagram alone. We demonstrate that coherency strain during epitaxial growth substantially alters phase stability. Calculations of the coherent spinodal show significant suppression of the miscibility gap, reducing the critical temperature to $\approx 900$ K. These coherent phase boundaries account for the experimentally observed high solubilities at typical growth temperatures. Our results indicate that coherency strain stabilizes these metastable alloys and enables bandgap engineering in this ultrawide-bandgap material system.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过第一性原理计算和统计力学分析了Sn₁₋ₓGeₓO₂合金的晶体、电子和热力学性质，预测了晶格参数符合Vegard定律、带隙存在强弯曲，并发现相干应变能显著抑制混溶隙，从而解释实验中观察到的高溶解度现象。
AI.motivation: Sn₁₋ₓGeₓO₂合金因其可掺杂性和可调超宽带隙，在高功率电子应用中具有潜力。然而实验中观察到的高Ge和Sn溶解度无法用非相干相图解释，需要研究相干应变对相稳定性的影响。
AI.method: 采用第一性原理密度泛函理论和统计力学方法，使用混合HSE06泛函计算带隙，分析无序相的混合焓和短程有序参数，计算非相干和相干相图以研究相稳定性。
AI.result: 预测晶格参数符合Vegard定律，带隙存在强弯曲；无序相具有大的正混合焓和微弱Ge-Sn聚集倾向；非相干相图显示临界温度高于2300K的混溶隙，而相干应变将临界温度降至约900K，显著抑制混溶隙。
AI.conclusion: 相干应变能稳定这些亚稳态合金，使在典型生长温度下获得高溶解度成为可能，从而在该超宽带隙材料系统中实现带隙工程。

title: Additive-Functional Approach to Transport in Periodic and Tilted Periodic Potentials
summary: We present a unified theoretical framework for effective transport in periodic and tilted periodic potentials based on additive functionals of stochastic processes. By systematically combining the Poisson equation, corrector construction, and martingale decomposition, we show that both the long-time drift and diffusion of overdamped Brownian motion can be derived within a single and transparent scheme. In the absence of external tilt, the formalism naturally recovers the classical Lifson-Jackson formula for the effective diffusion coefficient. When a constant bias is applied, breaking detailed balance and inducing a finite stationary current, the same approach yields the Stratonovich expressions for the effective drift and diffusion in tilted periodic potentials. Beyond one dimension, we demonstrate that the same additive-functional structure extends directly to two-dimensional and general N dimensional periodic diffusions, leading to the standard homogenized drift and diffusion tensor expressed in terms of vector-valued correctors. Our derivation highlights the central role of additive functionals in separating bounded microscopic corrections from unbounded macroscopic transport and clarifies the connection between reversible and nonequilibrium steady states. This work provides a conceptually unified and mathematically controlled route to transport coefficients in periodic media, with direct relevance to stochastic transport, soft matter, and nonequilibrium statistical physics.

AI.tldr: 提出基于随机过程加性泛函的统一理论框架，用于计算周期和倾斜周期势中的有效输运系数，涵盖可逆和非平衡稳态。
AI.motivation: 为周期介质中的输运系数提供一个概念统一且数学可控的推导路径，连接可逆与非平衡稳态，适用于随机输运、软物质和非平衡统计物理。
AI.method: 结合泊松方程、校正子构造和马氏分解，基于随机过程的加性泛函，将微观有界修正与宏观无界输运分离。
AI.result: 在无外倾时自然恢复Lifson-Jackson有效扩散公式；有恒定偏置时得到Stratonovich有效漂移和扩散表达式；框架可扩展到二维及N维周期扩散。
AI.conclusion: 加性泛函在分离微观修正与宏观输运中起核心作用，为周期介质中的输运系数提供了统一的理论框架，澄清了可逆与非平衡稳态间的联系。

title: Properties of topological insulators and superconductors under relativistic gravity
summary: The interplay between the curved spacetimes of general relativity and quantum mechanical systems is an active field of research. However, analysis of relativistic gravitation on extended quantum systems remains understudied. To this end, we study here the effects of a general relativistic curved spacetime on the topological phases of the Su-Schrieffer-Heeger model and Kitaev superconducting wire. We find that the topological states remain robust and well localized. In the topological insulator we find that the energy level of the topological state becomes shifted away from zero according to the gravitational redshift, breaking the system's chiral symmetry. In contrast, the Majorana zero mode of the topological superconductor remains at zero energy. Furthermore, within the topological superconductor, we identify the possibility of a gravitationally induced topological phase transition leading to the formation of a domain wall, shifting one of the boundary Majorana zero modes into the bulk.

AI.tldr: 研究广义相对论弯曲时空对拓扑量子系统的影响，发现拓扑态保持鲁棒性，但引力红移会破坏手性对称性，而Majorana零模保持零能态，并可能引发引力诱导的拓扑相变。
AI.motivation: 研究广义相对论弯曲时空与量子系统之间的相互作用，特别是对扩展量子系统拓扑相的影响，填补该领域研究空白。
AI.method: 分析广义相对论弯曲时空对Su-Schrieffer-Heeger模型和Kitaev超导线的拓扑相的影响，研究拓扑态的鲁棒性和局域化特性。
AI.result: 拓扑态保持鲁棒且局域化良好；拓扑绝缘体中拓扑态能级因引力红移偏离零能，破坏手性对称性；拓扑超导体中Majorana零模保持零能；发现引力可能诱导拓扑相变，形成畴壁并将边界Majorana零模移入体态。
AI.conclusion: 弯曲时空对拓扑量子系统有显著影响，引力红移破坏手性对称性但Majorana零模保持稳定，引力可诱导拓扑相变，为量子引力与拓扑物态交叉研究提供新方向。

title: Sparse Statistical Modeling in Condensed Matter Physics
summary: In this work we explore the possibility of using sparse statistical modeling in condensed matter physics. The procedure is employed to two well known problems: elemental superconductors and heavy fermions, and was shown that in most cases performs better than other AI methods, such as machine or deep learning. More importantly, sparse modeling has two major advantages over other methods: the ability to deal with small data sets and in particular its interpretabilty. Namely, sparse modeling can provide insight into the calculation process and allow the users to give physical interpretation of their results. We argue that many other problems in condensed matter physics would benefit from these properties of sparse statistical modeling.

AI.tldr: 稀疏统计建模在凝聚态物理中的应用，相比传统AI方法在元素超导体和重费米子问题上表现更好，具有处理小数据集和可解释性两大优势。
AI.motivation: 探索稀疏统计建模在凝聚态物理中的应用潜力，特别是在处理小数据集和结果可解释性方面优于传统机器学习方法。
AI.method: 将稀疏统计建模方法应用于两个经典问题：元素超导体和重费米子体系，并与机器学习、深度学习等其他AI方法进行比较。
AI.result: 在大多数情况下，稀疏统计建模的表现优于其他AI方法，特别是在处理小数据集时，并且能够提供计算过程的物理解释。
AI.conclusion: 稀疏统计建模因其处理小数据集的能力和结果可解释性，在凝聚态物理的许多其他问题中具有广泛应用前景。

title: Entanglement entropy and disorder operator at kagome deconfined quantum criticality
summary: We investigate the deconfined quantum critical point (DQCP) candidate in the extended hard-core Bose-Hubbard model on the kagome lattice, employing quantum Monte Carlo simulations to study the entanglement entropy and the $U(1)$ disorder operator. In stark contrast to findings in $J$-$Q$ models and other candidates, the universal logarithmic correction coefficients for both quantities are found to be {positive}, consistent with a unitary conformal field theory (CFT). Crucially, the current central charge $C_J$, extracted from the small-angle behavior of the disorder operator, is enhanced by a factor of approximately {4/3} compared to that of the conventional 3D $O(2)$ Wilson-Fisher fixed point. This enhancement {implies} a consistent explanation in the recently observed low-energy excitation spectrum at this DQCP, which features {two distinct linearly dispersing modes} with a velocity ratio of approximately three. Our results provide evidence that this quantum phase transition constitutes a genuine DQCP, characterized by coexisting fractionalized excitations that collectively modify its critical properties.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过量子蒙特卡洛模拟发现，kagome晶格扩展硬核玻色-哈伯德模型中的去禁闭量子临界点表现出与传统O(2)威尔逊-费米固定点不同的临界性质，具有增强的中心电荷和两个不同速度的线性色散模式，证实了其作为真正去禁闭量子临界点的特征。
AI.motivation: 研究去禁闭量子临界点(DQCP)的临界性质，特别是在kagome晶格扩展硬核玻色-哈伯德模型中，探索其与传统量子临界点的差异，验证其是否构成真正的DQCP。
AI.method: 使用量子蒙特卡洛模拟研究纠缠熵和U(1)无序算符，分析对数修正系数，提取当前中心电荷C_J，并与传统3D O(2)威尔逊-费米固定点进行比较。
AI.result: 发现对数修正系数为正，符合幺正共形场论；当前中心电荷C_J比传统O(2)固定点增强约4/3倍；低能激发谱中存在两个速度比约为3的线性色散模式。
AI.conclusion: 该量子相变构成真正的去禁闭量子临界点，其特征是共存的分数量化激发集体改变了临界性质，中心电荷增强和双模激发谱为其提供了证据。

title: Intrinsic ductility enhancement in Mg alloys elucidated via large-scale ab-initio calculations
summary: Magnesium is the lightest structural alloy, yet its practical use is limited by its low ductility. Recent studies suggest ductility enhancement in dilute Mg alloys may stem from favorable solute modification of <c+a> pyramidal I/II screw dislocation core energy difference, activating <c+a> slip via a double cross-slip mechanism. This work conducts large-scale DFT calculations, reaching ~6,000 atoms, of <c+a> dislocation energetics in Mg and Mg-Y/Zn alloys. We find that relative solute strengthening effects on pyramidal I and II screw dislocation glide are crucial for cross-slip enhancement in Mg-Y, in contrast to prior investigations, that find solute-mediated dislocation-core energy modification as the main driver. Our predictions align with single- and poly-crystal experimental results and also capture the transition from pyramidal II to I preferred slip in Mg-Y.

AI.tldr: 通过大规模DFT计算发现，镁合金塑性增强的关键是溶质对两种锥面位错滑移的相对强化效应，而非之前认为的位错核能改变
AI.motivation: 镁作为最轻的结构合金，其实际应用受限于低塑性。近期研究表明稀镁合金塑性增强可能源于溶质对<c+a>锥面I/II螺位错核能差的有利调节，但具体机制尚不明确
AI.method: 采用大规模密度泛函理论计算（约6000个原子），研究镁及镁-钇/锌合金中<c+a>位错能量学，分析溶质对锥面I和II螺位错滑移的相对强化效应
AI.result: 发现溶质对锥面I和II螺位错滑移的相对强化效应是镁-钇合金中交叉滑移增强的关键因素，与之前认为的溶质介导的位错核能改变机制不同；预测结果与单晶和多晶实验结果一致，并捕捉到镁-钇中从锥面II到I优先滑移的转变
AI.conclusion: 镁合金塑性增强机制应重新理解为溶质对两种锥面位错滑移的相对强化效应，而非单纯的位错核能改变，这为设计高塑性镁合金提供了新思路

title: Macroscopic localization and collective memory in Poisson renewal resetting
summary: Stochastic renewal processes are ubiquitous across physics, biology, and the social sciences. Here, we show that continuous-time renewal dynamics can naturally produce a mixed discrete-continuous structure, with a macroscopic fraction of particles occupying a discrete state. For ensembles of continuous-time random walkers subject to Poissonian renewal resets, we develop an age-structured framework showing this discrete component corresponds to localization at the reset configuration. We next show that collective interactions can retain memory although all reset events are memoryless. Remarkably, the transition to collective memory is discontinuous, and we identify a first-order dynamical phase transition between weak collective bias, where the dynamics are stationary, to strong collective bias where the dynamics are nonstationary and display aging up to finite-size effects. We explicitly discuss ecological implications of our work, illustrating how continuous-time renewal dynamics shape macroscopic structure and collective organization with long-term memory.

AI.tldr: 连续时间更新过程可产生混合离散-连续结构，其中宏观粒子分数占据离散状态；集体相互作用可在无记忆重置事件中保留记忆，出现一阶动力学相变
AI.motivation: 研究连续时间更新过程如何自然产生混合离散-连续结构，探索集体相互作用如何在无记忆重置事件中产生集体记忆，并理解这种结构对宏观组织和长期记忆形成的影响
AI.method: 为受泊松重置的连续时间随机游走者建立年龄结构框架，分析离散分量对应重置配置的局域化；研究集体相互作用如何保留记忆，识别集体记忆转变的不连续性
AI.result: 发现连续时间更新过程可产生混合离散-连续结构，其中离散分量对应重置配置的局域化；集体相互作用可在无记忆重置中产生集体记忆，且集体记忆转变是一阶动力学相变，从弱集体偏置的平稳动态转变为强集体偏置的非平稳动态并显示老化效应
AI.conclusion: 连续时间更新过程能够塑造具有长期记忆的宏观结构和集体组织，这种混合离散-连续结构和一阶相变对理解物理、生物和社会科学中的集体行为具有重要意义

title: A functionally reversible probabilistic computing architecture enabled by interactions of current-controlled magnetic devices
summary: Probabilistic computers replace logic gates with networks of interacting random variables, creating bidirectional systems that can back-derive inputs from outputs. Such architectures enable efficient generation of random samples, implementations of novel algorithms, and natural solutions to classically hard problems such as prime factorization. We present a new physical implementation for these networks: ferromagnetic disks whose magnetization switching process is triggered by current pulses, skewed by external magnetic fields, and randomized by ambient thermal noise. We show that geometry-dependent magnetostatic interactions between these magnetic cells lead to system behavior that emulates deterministic logic gates. Furthermore, by chaining multiple "gates," we achieve a highly accurate bidirectional one-bit full-adder, a proof of concept for complex multi-gate logic functions with reversible information flow. This analog magnetic probabilistic computer methodology improves on other implementations in speed, tunability, and energy efficiency, thereby enabling a powerful new pathway towards practical solution of classically hard problems.

AI.tldr: 提出基于铁磁磁盘的磁性概率计算机，利用磁化切换、热噪声和磁相互作用实现可逆逻辑门，构建双向全加器，为求解经典难题提供新途径。
AI.motivation: 概率计算机通过随机变量网络实现双向计算，能高效生成随机样本、实现新算法并解决经典难题（如质因数分解）。现有实现方法在速度、可调性和能效方面有限，需要更优的物理实现方案。
AI.method: 使用铁磁磁盘作为基本单元，通过电流脉冲触发磁化切换，外部磁场偏置，环境热噪声引入随机性。利用几何相关的磁静相互作用模拟确定性逻辑门，通过链式连接多个"门"构建复杂逻辑功能。
AI.result: 实现了高度精确的双向一位全加器，证明了复杂多门逻辑函数与可逆信息流的可行性。该磁性概率计算机方法在速度、可调性和能效方面优于其他实现方案。
AI.conclusion: 磁性概率计算机为实际解决经典难题提供了强大新途径，其模拟磁性方法在性能指标上显著改进，展示了可逆计算架构的物理实现潜力。

title: Quantum simulation of general spin-1/2 Hamiltonians with parity-violating fermionic Gaussian states
summary: We introduce equations of motion for a parity-violating fermionic mean-field theory (PV-FMFT): a numerically efficient fermionic mean-field theory based on parity-violating fermionic Gaussian states (PV-FGS). This work provides explicit equations of motion for studying the real- and imaginary-time evolution of spin-1/2 Hamiltonians with arbitrary geometries and interactions. We extend previous formulations of parity-preserving fermionic mean-field theory (PP-FMFT) by including fermionic displacement operators in the variational Ansatz. Unlike PP-FMFT, PV-FMFT can be applied to general spin-1/2 Hamiltonians, describe quenches from arbitrary initial spin-1/2 product states, and compute local and non-local observables in a straight-forward manner at the same modest computational cost as PP-FMFT -- scaling as $O(N^3)$ in the worst case for a system of $N$ spins or fermionic modes. We demonstrate that PV-FMFT can exactly capture the imaginary- and real-time dynamics of non-interacting spin-1/2 Hamiltonians. We then study the post quench-dynamics of the one- and two-dimensional Ising model in presence of longitudinal and transversal fields with PV-FMFT and compute the single site magnetization and correlation functions, and compare them against results from other state-of-the-art numerical approaches. In two-dimensional spin systems, we show that the employed spin-to-fermion mapping can break rotational symmetry within the PV-FMFT description, and we discuss the resulting consequences for the calculated correlation functions. Our work introduces PV-FMFT as a benchmark for other numerical techniques and quantum simulators, and it outlines both its capabilities and its limitations.

AI.tldr: 提出了宇称破坏费米子平均场理论（PV-FMFT），这是一种基于宇称破坏费米子高斯态的高效数值方法，用于研究任意几何和相互作用的spin-1/2哈密顿量的实时和虚时演化。
AI.motivation: 现有宇称保持费米子平均场理论（PP-FMFT）存在局限性：无法应用于一般spin-1/2哈密顿量，不能描述任意初始spin-1/2乘积态的淬火，计算局部和非局域可观测量不够直接。需要发展更通用的理论框架。
AI.method: 通过将费米子位移算子纳入变分Ansatz，扩展了PP-FMFT。PV-FMFT基于宇称破坏费米子高斯态，提供了明确的运动方程。计算成本与PP-FMFT相同，最坏情况下为O(N^3)。
AI.result: PV-FMFT能精确捕捉非相互作用spin-1/2哈密顿量的虚时和实时动力学。在一维和二维Ising模型中，计算了淬火后的单点磁化和关联函数，与其他先进数值方法进行了比较。在二维系统中，发现spin-to-fermion映射可能破坏旋转对称性。
AI.conclusion: PV-FMFT为其他数值技术和量子模拟器提供了基准，论文既展示了其能力（通用性、高效性、精确性），也讨论了其局限性（对称性破坏等），为spin-1/2系统的动力学研究提供了新工具。

title: Atomic Alignment in PbS Nanocrystal Superlattices with Compact Inorganic Ligands via Reversible Oriented Attachment of Nanocrystals
summary: Nanocrystals (NCs) serve as versatile building blocks for the creation of functional materials, with NC self-assembly offering opportunities to enable novel material properties. Here, we demonstrate that PbS NCs functionalized with strongly negatively charged metal chalcogenide complex (MCC) ligands, such as $Sn_2S_6^{4-}$ and $AsS_4^{3-}$, can self-assemble into all-inorganic superlattices with both long-range superlattice translational and atomic-lattice orientational order. Structural characterizations reveal that the NCs adopt unexpected edge-to-edge alignment, and numerical simulation clarifies that orientational order is thermodynamically stabilized by many-body ion correlations originating from the dense electrolyte. Furthermore, we show that the superlattices of $Sn_2S_6^{4-}$-functionalized PbS NCs can be fully disassembled back into the colloidal state, which is highly unusual for orientationally attached superlattices with atomic-lattice alignment. The reversible oriented attachment of NCs, enabling their dynamic assembly and disassembly into effectively single-crystalline superstructures, offers a pathway toward designing reconfigurable materials with adaptive and controllable electronic and optoelectronic properties.

AI.tldr: PbS纳米晶通过强负电荷金属硫属化物配体自组装成具有长程超晶格平移和原子晶格取向有序的全无机超晶格，实现可逆定向附着
AI.motivation: 纳米晶作为功能材料构建模块，自组装可产生新颖材料性质。研究如何通过配体工程实现具有原子晶格取向有序的超晶格，并探索可逆组装的可能性
AI.method: 使用强负电荷金属硫属化物复合物配体（如Sn₂S₆⁴⁻和AsS₄³⁻）功能化PbS纳米晶，使其自组装成超晶格。通过结构表征和数值模拟分析取向有序的热力学稳定性
AI.result: 纳米晶采用意外的边对边排列方式，取向有序由密集电解质中多体离子关联热力学稳定。Sn₂S₆⁴⁻功能化的PbS纳米晶超晶格可完全解离回胶体状态，实现可逆定向附着
AI.conclusion: 纳米晶的可逆定向附着使其能够动态组装和解组装成有效单晶超结构，为设计具有自适应和可控电子/光电性质的可重构材料提供了途径

title: Component systems: do null models explain everything?
summary: Component systems - ensembles of realizations built from a shared repertoire of modular parts - are ubiquitous in biological, ecological, technological, and socio-cultural domains. From genomes to texts, cities, and software, these systems exhibit statistical regularities that often meet the "bona fide" requirements of laws in the physical sciences. Here, we argue that the generality and simplicity of those laws are often due to basic combinatorial or sampling constraints, raising the question of whether such patterns are actually revealing system-specific mechanisms and how we might move beyond them. To this end, we first present a unifying mathematical framework, which allows us to compare modular systems in different fields and highlights the common "null" trends as well as the system-specific uniqueness, which, arguably, are signatures of the underlying generative dynamics. Next, we can exploit the framework with statistical mechanics and modern machine-learning tools for a twofold objective. (i) Explaining why the general regularities emerge, highlighting the constraints between them and the general principles at their origins, and (ii) "subtracting" them from data, which will isolate the informative features for inferring hidden system-specific generative processes, mechanistic and causal aspects.

AI.tldr: 论文提出了一个统一框架来分析组件系统的统计规律，区分通用组合约束与系统特定机制，并利用统计力学和机器学习工具解释规律并提取系统特异性特征。
AI.motivation: 组件系统（如基因组、文本、城市、软件）普遍存在统计规律，但这些规律往往源于基本组合约束而非系统特定机制。需要区分通用趋势与系统特异性特征，以揭示底层生成动态。
AI.method: 1. 提出统一数学框架，比较不同领域模块化系统，识别通用"零"趋势和系统特异性特征；2. 结合统计力学和现代机器学习工具，解释通用规律出现原因，并从数据中"减去"通用趋势以提取系统特异性信息。
AI.result: 框架能够：1. 揭示组件系统统计规律的通用组合约束；2. 区分通用趋势与系统特异性特征；3. 为推断隐藏的生成过程、机制和因果方面提供方法。
AI.conclusion: 组件系统的统计规律往往反映基本组合约束而非系统特定机制。通过统一框架分离通用趋势与系统特异性特征，可以更有效地揭示底层生成动态和因果机制。

title: Quantum Entanglement and Teleportation of Magnons in Coupled Spin Chains
summary: This study explores how entanglement and quantum teleportation of magnons can be achieved in coupled spin chain systems. By utilizing different magnetic configurations, we show that parallel spin chains function like magnonic beam splitters, whereas anti-parallel chains produce two-magnon squeezing and strong entanglement. Combining these components, we design magnonic circuits capable of continuous-variable quantum entanglement and teleportation, supported by quantum Langevin simulations.

AI.tldr: 该研究展示了如何在耦合自旋链系统中实现磁振子的纠缠和量子隐形传态，通过不同磁构型实现磁振子分束器和双磁振子压缩，构建了连续变量量子纠缠和隐形传态的磁振子电路。
AI.motivation: 探索在耦合自旋链系统中实现磁振子的量子纠缠和隐形传态的可能性，为磁振子量子信息处理提供理论基础。
AI.method: 利用不同磁构型：平行自旋链作为磁振子分束器，反平行链产生双磁振子压缩和强纠缠；结合这些组件设计磁振子电路，并通过量子朗之万模拟进行验证。
AI.result: 成功展示了磁振子纠缠和量子隐形传态的实现，平行链实现分束功能，反平行链产生强纠缠，构建的磁振子电路能够实现连续变量量子纠缠和隐形传态。
AI.conclusion: 耦合自旋链系统为磁振子量子信息处理提供了有效平台，通过不同磁构型组合可以构建功能化的磁振子量子电路，实现量子纠缠和隐形传态等量子信息处理任务。

title: To infinity and back -- $1/N$ graph expansions of light-matter systems
summary: We present a method for performing a full graph expansion for light-matter systems, utilizing the linked-cluster theorem. This method enables us to explore $1/N$ corrections to the thermodynamic limit $N\to \infty$ in the number of particles, giving us access to the mesoscopic regime. While this regime is yet largely unexplored due to the challenges of studying it with established approaches, it incorporates intriguing features, such as entanglement between light and matter that vanishes in the thermodynamic limit. As a representative application, we calculate physical quantities of the low-energy regime for the paradigmatic Dicke-Ising chain in the paramagnetic normal phase by accompanying the graph expansion with both exact diagonalization (NLCE) and perturbation theory (\pcst), benchmarking our approach against other techniques. We investigate the ground-state energy density and photon density, showing a smooth transition from the microscopic to the macroscopic regime up to the thermodynamic limit. Around the quantum critical point, we extract the $1/N$ corrections to the ground-state energy density to obtain the critical point and critical exponent using extrapolation techniques.

AI.tldr: 提出基于关联簇定理的全图展开方法，用于研究光-物质系统的1/N修正，探索热力学极限N→∞的介观区域
AI.motivation: 介观区域由于现有方法难以研究而未被充分探索，该区域包含有趣特征（如光与物质间的纠缠在热力学极限下消失）
AI.method: 利用关联簇定理进行全图展开，结合精确对角化(NLCE)和微扰理论(pcst)计算物理量，以Dicke-Ising链为代表性应用
AI.result: 展示了从微观到宏观再到热力学极限的平滑过渡，提取了量子临界点附近的1/N修正，获得了临界点和临界指数
AI.conclusion: 该方法成功探索了光-物质系统的介观区域，为研究热力学极限的1/N修正提供了有效工具

title: Enhanced Interlayer Coupling and Excitons in Twin-Stacked Two-Dimensional Magnetic CrSBr Bilayers
summary: The degree of electronic coupling between individual layers in few-layer van der Waals heterostructures offers a route to engineer their magnetic, electronic, and optical functionalities. Using state-of-the-art first-principles calculations, we demonstrate that the electronic coupling between two monolayers of CrSBr, an anisotropic two-dimensional magnetic semiconductor, is highly nonlinear and nonmonotonic with respect to their relative twist angle, exhibiting a pronounced maximum at the twin-stacking configuration. The coupling strength scales with both the degree of overlap of Br orbitals adjacent to the van der Waals gap and the cosine of half of the interlayer spin angle. This enhanced interlayer electronic coupling gives rise to excitons delocalized across the two layers with a strong polarization dependence that reflects the details of the interlayer spin alignment. Our results reveal a sensitive interplay between twist angle, magnetism, and excitonic properties in twin-stacked CrSBr bilayers, and they establish twin stacking as an effective route to engineering interlayer coupling and optical response in anisotropic two-dimensional magnets with rectangular lattices.

AI.tldr: CrSBr双层异质结中，扭转角度、磁性和激子特性之间存在敏感相互作用，孪晶堆叠构型能显著增强层间电子耦合和光学响应。
AI.motivation: 研究二维范德华异质结中层间电子耦合对磁性、电子和光学功能的调控作用，特别关注各向异性磁性半导体CrSBr中的耦合机制。
AI.method: 采用先进的第一性原理计算方法，研究CrSBr单层在不同相对扭转角度下的电子耦合特性，分析孪晶堆叠构型的耦合机制。
AI.result: CrSBr双层间的电子耦合呈现高度非线性和非单调性，在孪晶堆叠构型达到最大值；耦合强度与Br轨道重叠程度和层间自旋角余弦相关；增强的耦合导致激子跨层离域，具有强烈的偏振依赖性。
AI.conclusion: 孪晶堆叠是调控各向异性二维磁体中层间耦合和光学响应的有效途径，揭示了扭转角度、磁性和激子特性之间的敏感相互作用。

title: Universal Coarsening and Giant-Cluster Formation in Growing Interfaces
comment: for the supplementary material, please visit https://sites.google.com/view/renan-almeida/publications
summary: Clusters formed by fluctuations of two-dimensional (2D) directed interfaces around a threshold level have been extensively studied at equilibrium and in nonequilibrium steady states, but their coarsening dynamics remain poorly understood. Here, we numerically investigate this unexplored coarsening of clusters in 2D growing interfaces believed to belong to the Kardar-Parisi-Zhang universality class. Using a two-point spatial correlator, we demonstrate statistical time invariance of the evolving configurations and identify scaling forms shared across distinct models. We reveal a pronounced asymmetry in the growth of the largest clusters: one cluster emerges as a giant structure whose characteristic length exceeds the correlation length. Population-dependent scaling forms for the number densities of cluster areas are uncovered. These findings highlight new universal aspects of growing interfaces and suggest avenues for experimental verification.

AI.tldr: 研究二维生长界面中团簇的粗化动力学，揭示KPZ类界面生长过程中团簇演化的统计不变性和新的标度形式
AI.motivation: 二维定向界面在阈值水平附近的涨落形成的团簇在平衡态和非平衡稳态下已被广泛研究，但其粗化动力学仍知之甚少，需要探索KPZ类生长界面中团簇的演化规律
AI.method: 数值研究二维生长界面（属于KPZ普适类）的团簇粗化过程，使用两点空间关联函数分析演化构型的统计时间不变性，识别不同模型间的共享标度形式
AI.result: 发现演化构型具有统计时间不变性，识别出跨模型的共享标度形式；揭示最大团簇生长的不对称性：一个团簇演化为巨型结构，其特征长度超过关联长度；发现团簇面积数密度的种群依赖标度形式
AI.conclusion: 这些发现突出了生长界面的新普适性方面，为实验验证提供了途径，深化了对KPZ类界面生长过程中团簇粗化动力学的理解

title: Surface Phonon Hall Viscosity Induced Phonon Chirality and Nonreciprocity in Magnetic Topological Insulator Films
summary: The surface half-quantum Hall effect, a hallmark consequence of axion electrodynamics, can be induced by gapping out the surface states of topological insulators through surface magnetization, and has led to a variety of topological response phenomena observed in experiments. In this work, we investigate phonon dynamics originating from an acoustic analog - the surface phonon Hall viscosity - that can also occur at the surface of magnetic topological insulators. This surface phonon Hall viscosity stems from the Nieh-Yan action in the strain response of topological insulators, where strain acts as the effective vierbein field for the bulk low-energy massive Dirac fermions. Crucially, this viscosity term entangles phonon dynamics with surface magnetization. In magnetic topological insulator films, we find that this interaction causes acoustic phonons to become chiral when the magnetization at the top and bottom surfaces is parallel, and nonreciprocal when it is anti-parallel. We further discuss potential experimental signatures of phonon dynamics induced by surface phonon Hall viscosity, specifically the phonon thermal Hall effect and magnon-polarons. Surface phonon Hall viscosity provides a mechanism to control phonon chirality and nonreciprocity via surface magnetization configurations in magnetic topological insulator films.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了磁性拓扑绝缘体薄膜中的表面声子霍尔粘度现象，这是一种声学类比于表面半量子霍尔效应的效应，能够通过表面磁化配置控制声子的手性和非互易性。
AI.motivation: 表面半量子霍尔效应作为轴子电动力学的标志性结果，已在拓扑绝缘体表面态中通过表面磁化实现。本研究旨在探索其声学类比——表面声子霍尔粘度，该现象同样可能出现在磁性拓扑绝缘体表面，为声子动力学控制提供新机制。
AI.method: 基于Nieh-Yan作用在拓扑绝缘体应变响应中的理论框架，将应变视为体低能大质量狄拉克费米子的有效四脚场。研究磁性拓扑绝缘体薄膜中表面声子霍尔粘度对声子动力学的影响，分析不同表面磁化配置（平行与反平行）下的声子行为。
AI.result: 发现表面声子霍尔粘度导致声子动力学与表面磁化纠缠。在磁性拓扑绝缘体薄膜中，当上下表面磁化平行时，声子变为手性；当磁化反平行时，声子表现出非互易性。该效应可能产生声子热霍尔效应和磁振子-极化子等实验特征。
AI.conclusion: 表面声子霍尔粘度提供了一种通过表面磁化配置控制磁性拓扑绝缘体薄膜中声子手性和非互易性的新机制，为拓扑材料中的声子调控开辟了新途径。

title: A non-equilibrium strategy for the general synthesis of single-atom catalysts
summary: Single-atom catalysts (SACs) maximize atom efficiency and exhibit unique electronic structures, yet realizing precise and scalable atomic dispersion remains a key challenge. Here, we report a non-equilibrium strategy for the scalable synthesis of SACs via ion implantation, enabling precise stabilization of metal atoms on diverse supports. Using an industrial-grade ion source, wafer-scale ion implantation with milliampere-level beam currents enables high-throughput fabrication of SACs, while the synergistic energy-mass effects stabilize isolated metal atoms in situ. A library of 36 SACs was constructed, and the resulting Pt/MoS2 exhibits outstanding hydrogen evolution performance with an overpotential of only 26 mV at 10 mA cm-2 and exceptional long-term stability, surpassing commercial Pt/C. This work demonstrates ion implantation as a versatile platform bridging fundamental SACs design and scalable manufacturing, providing new opportunities for high-performance catalysts in energy conversion applications.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种通过离子注入技术实现单原子催化剂规模化合成的新方法，成功制备了36种单原子催化剂，其中Pt/MoS2在析氢反应中表现出优异性能。
AI.motivation: 单原子催化剂虽然具有原子效率和独特的电子结构优势，但实现精确且可扩展的原子分散仍然是一个关键挑战。传统方法难以同时满足精确控制和规模化生产的需求。
AI.method: 采用非平衡策略，通过离子注入技术实现单原子催化剂的规模化合成。使用工业级离子源，通过毫安级束流进行晶圆级离子注入，利用协同能量-质量效应在多种载体上原位稳定孤立金属原子。
AI.result: 成功构建了包含36种单原子催化剂的库，其中Pt/MoS2表现出卓越的析氢性能：在10 mA cm-2电流密度下过电位仅为26 mV，且具有优异的长期稳定性，性能超过商业Pt/C催化剂。
AI.conclusion: 离子注入技术为单原子催化剂的基础设计和规模化制造提供了一个通用平台，为能源转换应用中的高性能催化剂开发提供了新机遇。

title: Correlation-driven branch in doped excitonic insulators
summary: We investigate the spectral properties of a doped one-dimensional excitonic insulator. Employing matrix-product-state-based methods, we compute the single-particle spectrum and optical conductivity in a correlated two-band model. Our numerical calculation reveals the emergence of a correlation-driven in-gap branch in the doped state. The origin of the in-gap branch is examined by decomposing the propagation dynamics of a single particle, elucidating that the doping-induced branch is associated with excitonic correlations. Our demonstrations suggest that the doping-induced branch can serve as an indicator of electron-hole correlations.

AI.tldr: 研究掺杂一维激子绝缘体的光谱特性，发现掺杂诱导的带隙内分支可作为电子-空穴关联的指示器
AI.motivation: 研究掺杂一维激子绝缘体的光谱性质，特别是掺杂状态下可能出现的关联驱动现象
AI.method: 使用基于矩阵乘积态的方法，在相关双带模型中计算单粒子谱和光学电导率
AI.result: 数值计算揭示了掺杂状态下出现关联驱动的带隙内分支，该分支与激子关联相关
AI.conclusion: 掺杂诱导的带隙内分支可作为电子-空穴关联的有效指示器

title: Sub-domain structure in a single crystal of the magnetic topological insulator MnSb2Te4
summary: The domain structure of a MnSb$_2$Te$_4$ single crystal with a Curie temperature $T_C \approx 45~K$ was studied using the high-resolution Bitter decoration technique. Magnetotransport measurements confirm a soft ferromagnetic ordering with a coercive field of $ \sim 100$ Oe. We revealed the formation of a hierarchical domain structure characterized by two distinct spatial scales. These results indicate the existence of two magnetically weakly coupled subsystems -- surface and bulk. The observed sub-domain structure can be attributed to the formation of a ferromagnetic well due to an inhomogeneous distribution of $\mathrm{Mn_{Sb}}$ antisite defects, with an additional contribution from symmetry breaking in the near-surface layer.

AI.tldr: MnSb₂Te₄单晶的磁畴结构研究显示存在两个空间尺度的层次化磁畴结构，表明表面和体相存在弱耦合的磁性子系统。
AI.motivation: 研究MnSb₂Te₄单晶的磁畴结构，了解其磁有序特性，特别是探索表面和体相磁性子系统之间的耦合关系。
AI.method: 使用高分辨率Bitter装饰技术研究磁畴结构，同时进行磁输运测量验证软铁磁有序特性。
AI.result: 发现具有两个不同空间尺度的层次化磁畴结构，磁输运测量显示软铁磁有序和约100 Oe的矫顽场，表明存在表面和体相两个弱耦合的磁性子系统。
AI.conclusion: 观察到的亚畴结构可归因于MnSb反位缺陷不均匀分布形成的铁磁势阱，以及近表面层对称性破缺的额外贡献，证实了MnSb₂Te₄中表面和体相磁性子系统的弱耦合特性。

title: The $O(n\to\infty)$ Rotor Model and the Quantum Spherical Model on Graphs
summary: We show that the large $n$ limit of the $O(n)$ quantum rotor model defined on a general graph has the same critical behavior as the corresponding quantum spherical model and that the critical exponents depend solely on the spectral dimension $d_s$ of the graph. To this end, we employ a classical to quantum mapping and use known results for the large $n$ limit of the classical $O(n)$ model on graphs. Away from the critical point, we discuss the interplay between the Laplacian and the Adjacency matrix in the whole parameter plane of the quantum Hamiltonian. These results allow us to paint the full picture of the $O(n)$ quantum rotor model on graphs in the large $n$ limit.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了大n极限下一般图上O(n)量子转子模型与量子球模型的临界行为相同，临界指数仅取决于图的谱维度d_s。
AI.motivation: 研究O(n)量子转子模型在一般图上的临界行为，特别是大n极限下的普适性特征，以及临界指数与图几何结构的关系。
AI.method: 采用经典到量子的映射方法，利用已知的经典O(n)模型在图上的大n极限结果，分析量子哈密顿量参数平面中拉普拉斯矩阵和邻接矩阵的相互作用。
AI.result: 证明了大n极限下O(n)量子转子模型与量子球模型具有相同的临界行为，临界指数完全由图的谱维度d_s决定，并绘制了模型在整个参数平面上的完整相图。
AI.conclusion: O(n)量子转子模型在一般图上的大n极限行为具有普适性，临界性质仅依赖于图的谱维度而非具体结构，为理解量子多体系统在复杂几何上的行为提供了理论框架。

title: Loopless multiterminal quantum circuits at odd parity
summary: We theoretically investigate loopless multiterminal hybrid superconducting devices at odd fermion parity with time-reversal symmetry. We find that the energy-phase relationship has a double minimum corresponding to opposite windings of the superconducting phases. Spin-orbit coupling adds multi-axial spin splittings, which contrasts with two-terminal devices where spin dependence is uniaxial. Capacitive shunting localizes quantum circuit states in the wells and exponentially suppresses their splitting. For weak spin-orbit strength, the system has a four-dimensional spin-chirality low-energy subspace which can be universally controlled with electric fields only.

AI.tldr: 该论文理论研究了具有时间反演对称性的奇费米子宇称多端混合超导器件，发现其能量-相位关系具有双最小值，对应超导相位的相反缠绕方向。
AI.motivation: 研究多端超导器件在奇费米子宇称下的量子特性，探索其在量子计算中的应用潜力，特别是通过电场实现通用量子控制的可能性。
AI.method: 理论分析具有时间反演对称性的无环多端混合超导器件，考虑自旋轨道耦合效应和电容分流，研究能量-相位关系和量子态局域化。
AI.result: 发现能量-相位关系具有双最小值对应相反相位缠绕；自旋轨道耦合产生多轴自旋分裂；电容分流使量子态局域化并指数抑制能级分裂；弱自旋轨道耦合下系统具有四维自旋手性低能子空间。
AI.conclusion: 多端超导器件在奇费米子宇称下展现出独特的量子特性，特别是通过电场即可实现四维自旋手性子空间的通用量子控制，为量子计算提供了新的实现途径。

title: INTERFACE Force Field for Alumina with Validated Bulk Phases and a pH-Resolved Surface Model Database for Electrolyte and Organic Interfaces
comment: 102 pages (52 main text, 50 SI), 9 figures main text, 14 Figures SI, 2 Tables main text, 8 Tables SI
summary: Alumina and aluminum oxyhydroxides underpin chemical-engineering technologies from heterogeneous catalysis, corrosion protection, functional coatings, energy-storage devices, to biomedical components. Yet molecular models that predictively connect phase structure, pH-dependent surface chemistry, electrolyte organization, and adsorption across operating conditions remain limited. Here we introduce a unified INTERFACE Force Field (IFF) parameterization together with a curated, ready-to-use pH-resolved surface model database that provides the most accurate and transferable atomistic description of major alumina phases to date. The framework covers a-Al2O3, g-Al2O3, boehmite, diaspore, and gibbsite using a single, physically interpretable parameter set that is directly compatible with CHARMM, AMBER, OPLS-AA, CVFF, and PCFF. Across structural, thermodynamic, mechanical, and interfacial benchmarks, simulations reproduce experimental reference data with more than 95 percent accuracy, exceeding existing force fields and the reliability of current density-functional approaches. A key advance is the first transferable treatment of surface ionization and charge regulation across alumina phases over a broad range of pH values, enabling simulations of realistic solid electrolyte interfaces without phase-specific reparameterization. Quantitative reliability is demonstrated by reproducing trends in zeta potentials and pH-dependent adsorption of a corrosion inhibitor at alumina-water interfaces. Predicted adsorption free energies and surface contact times correlate with experiments across more than an order of magnitude. Relative to ML-DFT workflows, the speed 100 to 1000 times faster, reaching system sizes and time scales inaccessible to quantum methods. The results establish a predictive computational platform to design alumina-containing functional materials under realistic process conditions.

AI.tldr: 开发了统一的INTERFACE力场参数化方法和pH分辨表面模型数据库，为氧化铝相提供最准确的原子尺度描述，实现跨pH值的表面电离和电荷调控模拟。
AI.motivation: 氧化铝和羟基氧化铝在化学工程中应用广泛，但缺乏能够预测性连接相结构、pH依赖表面化学、电解质组织和吸附行为的分子模型。
AI.method: 引入统一的INTERFACE力场参数化方法，创建pH分辨表面模型数据库，覆盖α-Al2O3、γ-Al2O3、勃姆石、硬水铝石和氢氧化铝等多种相，使用单一物理可解释参数集。
AI.result: 模拟结果在结构、热力学、力学和界面基准测试中重现实验参考数据的准确度超过95%，优于现有力场和密度泛函方法，首次实现跨氧化铝相的pH依赖表面电离和电荷调控模拟。
AI.conclusion: 建立了预测性计算平台，可在真实工艺条件下设计含氧化铝的功能材料，模拟速度比ML-DFT工作流程快100-1000倍，达到量子方法无法达到的系统尺寸和时间尺度。

title: Alternative $ν+ν$-picture of bosonic fractional Chern insulators at high filling factors in multiple flat-band systems
summary: Most fractional quantum Hall states have been traditionally identified within a single energy band, such as the lowest Landau level or topological flat band. As more particles are introduced, they inevitably populate higher energy bands. Whether the inclusion of multiple topological bands leads to new physics remains an open question. Here, we propose a universal picture applicable at higher filling factors $ν\geq 1$ in bosonic systems: the occupied bands tend to coalesce into an effective single topological band characterized by a total Chern number $\vert C\vert$, the sum of the Chern number of all occupied lower topological flat bands. Using a Kekulé lattice model with two lower flat bands featuring a total Chern number $C=1$, regardless of their specific configurations, we identify the emergence of a $\frac{1}{2}$ fractional Chern insulator (FCI) state at integer filling factor $ν=1$, followed by the Jain sequence states $\frac{2}{3}$ and $\frac{3}{4}$ at filling $ν=\frac{4}{3}$ and $\frac{6}{4}$. That is a $ν+ν$ picture, rather than the generally expected $1+ν^{\prime}$ picture, where $ν^{\prime}$ is the permitted FCI filling factor in the single second topological flat band. Our findings deepen the understanding of FCI states and open avenues for discovering exotic fractional topological phases in multiband systems.

AI.tldr: 在拓扑多带系统中，占据带会合并成一个有效单带，其总陈数为各占据带陈数之和，这导致在整数填充因子下出现分数陈绝缘体态，而非传统的1+ν'图像。
AI.motivation: 传统分数量子霍尔态研究主要关注单能带系统，但实际系统中粒子会占据多个能带。多拓扑能带是否会产生新物理现象是一个未解决的问题。
AI.method: 提出适用于玻色系统填充因子ν≥1的普适图像：占据带合并为有效单拓扑带，总陈数为所有占据低拓扑平带陈数之和。使用具有两个低平带（总陈数C=1）的Kekulé晶格模型进行验证。
AI.result: 在整数填充因子ν=1时出现1/2分数陈绝缘体态，在ν=4/3和6/4时分别出现2/3和3/4的Jain序列态。这符合ν+ν图像，而非传统的1+ν'图像。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果深化了对分数陈绝缘体态的理解，为在多带系统中发现奇异分数拓扑相开辟了新途径。

title: Transition from conventional ferroelectricity to ion-conduction-like ferroelectricity
summary: The cross-unitcell long displacements in some recent emergent ferroelectrics have actually challenged the classical definition of ferroelectricity, while the relative explorations are still in the early stage and even controversial. In this paper we provide a general model that gives the picture for the evolution and transition from typical ferroelectricity to long displacement ferroelectricity, which is classified into type-I and type-II. In particular, type-I with two switching modes of different barriers may switch between conventional ferroelectricity and ion-conduction-like ferroelectricity depending on various factors including electric field, boundaries, vacancies, temperature, etc.., which is demonstrated by first-principles calculations on γ-AlOOH and CuInP2S6 as two paradigmatic cases. Intriguingly, their polarizations are nonlocal since the boundaries also determine the switching mode and polarization direction, which can be different for the same given crystal structure. Such type-I can be evolved from conventional ferroelectricity as the migration barrier across unitcell is reduced, and will behave like type-II at elevated temperature as the conventional part becomes paraelectric. These unconventional behaviors can be applicable to various systems, and many previously unclarified phenomena can be well explained.

AI.tldr: 论文提出了一个通用模型，将铁电性分为I型和II型长位移铁电体，解释了从典型铁电性到长位移铁电性的演化与转变。
AI.motivation: 近年来一些新兴铁电体中的跨晶胞长位移挑战了经典铁电性定义，相关研究尚处于早期且存在争议，需要建立理论框架来解释这些现象。
AI.method: 提出了一个通用模型，将长位移铁电性分为I型和II型，并通过第一性原理计算以γ-AlOOH和CuInP2S6作为典型案例进行验证。
AI.result: I型铁电体具有两种不同势垒的切换模式，可在传统铁电性和类离子传导铁电性之间转换，其极化具有非局域性，边界条件也决定切换模式和极化方向。
AI.conclusion: 该模型可应用于多种系统，能很好地解释许多先前未澄清的现象，为理解长位移铁电体提供了理论框架。

title: Improving the electrical conductivity of Pt nanowires deposited by focused electron beam induced deposition using thermal annealing
summary: We investigated the electrical conductivity of platinum nanowires with heights ranging from 2 nm to 200 nm, deposited by focused electron beam induced deposition (FEBID). Post-deposition processing was employed to enhance the electrical conductivity of the platinum nanowires. Thermal annealing of as-deposited nanowires in air at 225$^{\circ}$C for 4 hours increased electrical conductance by up to five orders of magnitude. After annealing, 22.5 $\mathrm{μm}$-long nanowires with a height of 36 nm exhibited resistances of approximately 10 k$Ω$. This nanowire underwent a reduction in height to one-quarter of its original value, a reduction in width to one half, and a reduction in cross-sectional area by approximately one order of magnitude. The platinum-to-carbon weight ratio increased from 35:65 to 85:15. The electrical resistance decreased monotonically as temperature was lowered from room temperature to 100 mK, confirming that annealed FEBID platinum nanowires are promising building blocks for nanoelectronic devices operating at millikelvin temperatures.

AI.tldr: 铂纳米线通过FEBID沉积后，热退火处理使电导率提高5个数量级，成为适用于毫开尔文温度纳米电子器件的理想材料
AI.motivation: 研究如何提高FEBID沉积的铂纳米线的电导率，使其适用于低温纳米电子器件
AI.method: 使用FEBID沉积2-200nm高度的铂纳米线，然后在225°C空气中进行4小时热退火处理
AI.result: 退火后电导提高5个数量级，36nm高、22.5μm长纳米线电阻约10kΩ，铂碳比从35:65提升至85:15，电阻随温度降低而单调下降
AI.conclusion: 退火处理的FEBID铂纳米线是适用于毫开尔文温度纳米电子器件的理想构建模块

title: Altermagnetic phases and phase transitions in Lieb-$5$ Hubbard model
summary: The emergence of altermagnetism, the collinear magnetic phase characterized by momentum-dependent spin-split bands but zero net magnetization, has fundamentally reshaped the classification of magnetic order. We propose an altermagnetic (AM) order in a repulsive Hubbard model on the Lieb-$5$ lattice. Considering only nearest-neighbor hoppings within the lattice, we show a phase transition from the nonmagnetic to a unique AM isolated band metal phase (AMIM), allowing clear identification of spin-split states. Additionally, the AM metallic phase (AMM) is also shown to appear as an intermediate phase during the transition from the normal metal to the AMIM in the presence of the diagonal hopping within each unit cell of the Lieb-$5$ lattice. The manifestation of distinct AM phases and the phase transitions, driven by Hubbard interaction and hopping integrals, have been explored in terms of spin-resolved band structure, spectral function, and the behavior of the AM order parameter. The stability of these AM phases against the spin-orbit coupling and temperature is also established.

AI.tldr: 在Lieb-5晶格上的排斥Hubbard模型中发现了交变磁性（altermagnetism）有序，包括交变磁性孤立带金属相（AMIM）和交变磁性金属相（AMM），这些相由Hubbard相互作用和跳跃积分驱动，并在自旋轨道耦合和温度下保持稳定。
AI.motivation: 交变磁性作为具有动量依赖自旋分裂带但零净磁化的共线磁相，从根本上重塑了磁有序的分类。本研究旨在探索在Lieb-5晶格上实现交变磁性的可能性，以扩展对这类新型磁相的理解。
AI.method: 在Lieb-5晶格上构建仅考虑最近邻跳跃的排斥Hubbard模型，通过引入晶胞内对角跳跃，研究从非磁性到交变磁性孤立带金属相（AMIM）的相变，以及从正常金属到AMIM的中间交变磁性金属相（AMM）。使用自旋分辨能带结构、谱函数和交变磁性序参数分析相变行为。
AI.result: 发现了独特的交变磁性孤立带金属相（AMIM），能够清晰识别自旋分裂态。在存在晶胞内对角跳跃时，交变磁性金属相（AMM）作为从正常金属到AMIM的中间相出现。这些交变磁性相在自旋轨道耦合和温度下保持稳定。
AI.conclusion: 在Lieb-5晶格上的排斥Hubbard模型中成功实现了交变磁性有序，揭示了由Hubbard相互作用和跳跃积分驱动的不同交变磁性相及其相变，为理解和设计交变磁性材料提供了理论框架。

title: Gigahertz-frequency Lamb wave resonator cavities on suspended lithium niobate for quantum acoustics
summary: Phononic nanodevices offer a promising route toward quantum technologies, as phonons combine strong confinement within matter with broad coupling capabilities to various quantum systems. In particular, the piezoelectric response of materials such as lithium niobate enables coupling between superconducting qubits and gigahertz-frequency phonons. However, bulk lithium niobate phononic devices typically rely on surface acoustic waves and are therefore inherently subject to leakage from the surface into the bulk substrate. Here, we explore the acoustic behavior of resonator cavities supporting GHz-frequency Lamb waves in a 200 nm-thick suspended lithium niobate layer. We characterize the acoustic response at both room and millikelvin temperatures. We find that our resonator cavities with strong confinement reach intrinsic quality factors of approximately 6000 at the single phonon level. We use the measured parameters of the resonators to model their coupling to a superconducting transmon qubit, allowing us to evaluate their potential as quantum acoustic devices.

AI.tldr: 研究在200纳米厚的悬浮铌酸锂薄膜中实现GHz频率Lamb波谐振腔，在单声子水平达到约6000的本征品质因数，并评估其作为量子声学器件的潜力。
AI.motivation: 声子纳米器件在量子技术中具有前景，但传统的铌酸锂体声波器件通常依赖表面声波，容易从表面泄漏到衬底中。需要探索更好的声学限制方法。
AI.method: 在200纳米厚的悬浮铌酸锂层中构建支持GHz频率Lamb波的谐振腔，在室温和毫开尔文温度下表征声学响应，测量本征品质因数，并建模其与超导transmon量子比特的耦合。
AI.result: 强限制的谐振腔在单声子水平达到约6000的本征品质因数，通过测量参数建模显示其与超导量子比特的良好耦合潜力。
AI.conclusion: 悬浮铌酸锂薄膜中的Lamb波谐振腔通过强声学限制实现了高本征品质因数，展示了作为量子声学器件的良好潜力，特别是在与超导量子比特耦合方面。

title: Insights into $CO_{2}$ activation on defective ZnS surfaces
summary: In this work, we investigate $CO_{2}$ activation on ZnS using Near Ambient-Pressure X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy measurements (NAP-XPS) and density functional theory calculations (DFT). Our NAP-XPS experiments reveal that $CO_{2}$ adsorbs onto a defective ZnS surface upon heating above $473 \ K$ in a $CO_{2}$ atmosphere (up to $0.55 \ mbar$). The $CO_{2}$ adsorption fingerprint is detectable even after cooling to room temperature under ultra-high vacuum. Our DFT calculations suggest that $CO_{2}$ adsorption is energetically favorable on ZnS surfaces containing zinc vacancies, highlighting defect sites as key adsorption centers. Additionally, oxygen adsorption on a defective ZnS surface is exothermic, in contrast to the endothermic behavior observed on a defect-free surface. These findings contribute to a deeper understanding of defect-driven surface reactivity and may inform ZnS-based catalyst's design for $CO_{2}$ capture and reutilization.

AI.tldr: 研究通过NAP-XPS和DFT发现CO₂在473K以上可吸附到有缺陷的ZnS表面，锌空位是关键吸附位点，缺陷表面氧吸附为放热过程。
AI.motivation: 研究ZnS表面缺陷对CO₂活化的影响，为设计基于ZnS的CO₂捕获和再利用催化剂提供理论基础。
AI.method: 使用近常压X射线光电子能谱（NAP-XPS）实验和密度泛函理论（DFT）计算相结合的方法。
AI.result: CO₂在473K以上可吸附到有缺陷的ZnS表面，吸附指纹在冷却至室温后仍可检测；DFT计算表明CO₂在含锌空位的ZnS表面吸附在能量上有利，缺陷表面氧吸附为放热过程。
AI.conclusion: 缺陷位点是CO₂吸附的关键中心，这些发现有助于理解缺陷驱动的表面反应性，并为设计ZnS基CO₂捕获和再利用催化剂提供指导。

title: Many-body Euler topology
summary: Integer and fractional Chern insulators exhibit a nonzero quantized anomalous Hall conductivity due to a spontaneous breaking of time reversal symmetry. To identify nontrivial topology in their time-reversal symmetric many-body spectra, we introduce many-body Euler numbers as a counterpart to many-body Chern numbers. Exemplarily, we perform calculations in a topological Hubbard model that can realize Chern and fractional Chern insulating phases. Furthermore, we lay out a classification scheme to realize different topological phases in interacting systems using symmetry indicators in analogy to topological band theory.

AI.tldr: 提出多体欧拉数作为多体陈数的对应概念，用于识别时间反演对称多体谱中的非平凡拓扑，并在拓扑哈伯德模型中演示，同时建立基于对称性指标的相互作用系统拓扑相分类方案。
AI.motivation: 整数和分数量子陈绝缘体通过自发破缺时间反演对称性展现非零量子化反常霍尔电导。然而，在时间反演对称的多体谱中识别非平凡拓扑需要新的拓扑不变量。
AI.method: 引入多体欧拉数作为多体陈数的对应概念，在拓扑哈伯德模型中进行计算，并建立基于对称性指标的相互作用系统拓扑相分类方案，类比于拓扑能带理论。
AI.result: 成功将多体欧拉数应用于识别时间反演对称多体谱中的拓扑性质，并在拓扑哈伯德模型中验证了该方法，同时建立了相互作用系统的拓扑分类框架。
AI.conclusion: 多体欧拉数为识别时间反演对称多体系统的拓扑性质提供了新工具，建立的对称性指标分类方案将拓扑能带理论推广到相互作用系统，为研究相互作用拓扑相开辟了新途径。

title: Accurate and efficient simulation of photoemission spectroscopy via Kohn-Sham scattering states
summary: We introduce an efficient first-principles framework for simulating angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy (ARPES) by computing photoelectron states as solutions of the Kohn-Sham equation with scattering boundary conditions. This approach is formally equivalent to the Lippmann-Schwinger formalism but offers superior computational efficiency and direct integration with plane-wave or real-space density functional theory. By enabling direct calculation of photoemission matrix elements, our method bridges the gap between intrinsic electronic properties and experimental ARPES spectra. We demonstrate its accuracy through circular dichroism ARPES simulations for monolayer graphene and bulk $2H$-WSe$_2$, achieving excellent agreement with experimental data and highlighting the critical role of pseudopotentials in describing high-energy photoelectron scattering. Our results establish a robust and accessible route for quantitative ARPES modeling, paving the way for advanced studies of orbital textures, many-body effects, and time-resolved photoemission.

AI.tldr: 提出一种基于散射边界条件的Kohn-Sham方程求解方法，用于高效模拟角分辨光电子能谱，可直接计算光电子矩阵元，在石墨烯和WSe₂中验证了准确性。
AI.motivation: 传统ARPES模拟方法计算效率低，难以直接整合密度泛函理论。需要一种能直接计算光电子矩阵元、连接理论电子性质与实验光谱的高效方法。
AI.method: 采用散射边界条件求解Kohn-Sham方程，形式上等价于Lippmann-Schwinger形式，但计算效率更高，可直接与平面波或实空间密度泛函理论整合。
AI.result: 在单层石墨烯和块体2H-WSe₂的圆二色性ARPES模拟中，与实验数据高度吻合，验证了赝势在高能光电子散射描述中的关键作用。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为定量ARPES建模提供了稳健且易用的途径，为轨道纹理、多体效应和时间分辨光电子能谱的先进研究铺平了道路。

title: Probing Fermi-surface spin-textures via the nonlinear Shubnikov-de Haas effect
summary: The coupling of spin and electronic degrees of freedom via the spin-orbit interaction (SOI) is an essential ingredient for many proposed future technologies. However, probing the strength and nature of SOI is a significant challenge, especially in heterostructures. Here, we consider the nonlinear Shubnikov-de Haas (NSdH) effect, a quantum oscillatory effect that occurs under conditions similar to those of the well-known SdH effect, but is second order in the applied electric field. We demonstrate that, unlike its linear counterpart, the NSdH effect is highly sensitive to the spin textures that arise from SOI. In particular, we show that the phase and beating of NSdH oscillations in nonlinear conductivities can clearly distinguish between different types of SOI. As a demonstration, we show how NSdH can distinguish between the linear and cubic Rashba couplings that are expected in germanium heterostructures. Our results establish the NSdH effect as a powerful and sensitive probe of SOI, offering a new framework for characterizing materials relevant to topology, spintronics, and solid-state quantum information technologies.

AI.tldr: 非线性Shubnikov-de Haas效应可作为探测自旋轨道耦合的灵敏工具，能区分不同类型的自旋轨道相互作用。
AI.motivation: 自旋轨道耦合是未来技术的关键要素，但在异质结构中探测其强度和性质具有挑战性。需要开发新的探测方法。
AI.method: 研究非线性Shubnikov-de Haas效应，这是一种二阶电场的量子振荡效应。通过分析非线性电导中的相位和拍频来区分不同类型的自旋轨道耦合。
AI.result: 非线性SdH效应对自旋轨道耦合产生的自旋纹理高度敏感，能清晰区分线性Rashba耦合和立方Rashba耦合等不同类型。
AI.conclusion: 非线性SdH效应是探测自旋轨道耦合的强大灵敏工具，为拓扑材料、自旋电子学和固态量子信息技术提供了新的表征框架。

title: Transport of indirect excitons and exciton mediated spin transport in a van der Waals heterostructure in magnetic fields
summary: We studied transport of indirect excitons (IXs) and IX mediated spin transport in a MoSe$_2$/WSe$_2$ van der Waals heterostructure in magnetic fields up to 8 T. We observed the long-range IX transport and the long-range IX mediated spin transport in the magnetic fields. The IX transport and spin transport are characterized by the 1/e decay distances reaching $\sim$ 100 micrometers. The decay distance of the spin transport correlates with the decay distance of IX transport. These decay distances first increase and then decrease with increasing IX density for all studied magnetic fields. The long-range IX transport and the long-range spin transport in the magnetic fields are consistent with the similar long-range transport in zero magnetic field.

AI.tldr: 在MoSe2/WSe2范德华异质结中，间接激子(IX)及其介导的自旋输运在高达8T磁场下表现出长程特性，衰减距离达~100微米，且输运距离随IX密度先增后减。
AI.motivation: 研究二维材料范德华异质结中间接激子及其介导的自旋输运在磁场下的行为，探索长程输运特性及其与激子密度的关系。
AI.method: 在MoSe2/WSe2范德华异质结中，施加高达8T的磁场，测量间接激子输运和间接激子介导的自旋输运，分析其1/e衰减距离与激子密度和磁场的关系。
AI.result: 观察到长程间接激子输运和长程自旋输运，衰减距离达~100微米；自旋输运衰减距离与激子输运衰减距离相关；所有磁场下，衰减距离随激子密度先增加后减小；磁场下的长程输运特性与零磁场下的类似长程输运一致。
AI.conclusion: MoSe2/WSe2范德华异质结在磁场下表现出长程间接激子输运和长程自旋输运，输运距离与激子密度呈非单调关系，且磁场下的输运特性与零磁场下相似，为二维材料异质结中的激子和自旋输运研究提供了重要见解。

title: Quantum theory of elastic strings and the thermal conductivity of glasses
summary: We study the thermal conductivity of amorphous solids by constructing a continuum model whose degrees of freedom are propagating vibrational modes (phonons) and extended Volterra dislocation line defects with their own vibrational degrees of freedom which do not propagate in space. Our working assumption is that these additional degrees of freedom account for the "boson peak" that is observed in glassy materials. This identification allows us to obtain the length distribution of dislocations from experimental data of the boson peak for each material, which we use as input to calculate the phonon self-energy in a quantum field theory framework using that the phonon-dislocation interaction is given by the Peach-Koehler force. The tail of the distribution for long dislocations is consistent with an $L^{-5}$ power law.
