Our results show that this power law yields a linear rise in the thermal conductivity, as observed in glasses at low temperatures. We then consider two approaches to describe thermal conductivity data quantitatively. In the simplest approach we only keep the low-frequency behavior of the phonon self-energy with one free parameter, plus an adjustable UV cutoff. In the more realistic approach we keep the full frequency dependence of the phonon self-energy as dictated by the phonon-dislocation interaction plus an additional contribution due to scattering with point defects, with a cutoff set by the typical interatomic spacing of the material. We obtain a satisfactory description of thermal conductivity data with both approaches. We conclude by discussing prospects to test the predictive power of this model.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过构建包含传播声子和扩展Volterra位错线的连续介质模型，解释了非晶固体中热导率的线性上升现象，并将位错分布与实验观测的玻色峰联系起来。
AI.motivation: 研究非晶固体热导率的微观机制，特别是解释玻璃材料在低温下观察到的热导率线性上升现象，并将实验观测的玻色峰与材料中的位错缺陷联系起来。
AI.method: 构建包含传播声子和扩展Volterra位错线的连续介质模型，位错线具有自身振动自由度但不传播；利用玻色峰实验数据推导位错长度分布；在量子场论框架下计算声子自能，声子-位错相互作用通过Peach-Koehler力描述；采用两种方法定量描述热导率数据。
AI.result: 长位错分布的尾部符合L^{-5}幂律，该幂律导致热导率线性上升，与玻璃低温实验观测一致；两种方法（简化低频行为和完整频率依赖）都能满意地描述热导率数据。
AI.conclusion: 该模型成功解释了非晶固体热导率的线性上升现象，将玻色峰与位错分布联系起来，为理解玻璃材料热输运性质提供了新视角，并讨论了进一步验证模型预测能力的前景。

title: Classical transport theory for the planar Hall effect with threefold symmetry
summary: In recent years, the planar Hall effect (PHE) has become a key probe of Berry curvature and the anomalous Hall effect (AHE). Threefold-symmetric signals under in-plane fields are often attributed to such quantum mechanisms. Here, we establish a purely classical origin for a three-fold-symmetric PHE. The idea is simple yet decisive: a third-order expansion of the Boltzmann equation in the magnetic field reveals that the threefold component originates from the relative positions of the mirror planes in the crystals with respect to the measurement setups. Remarkably, the threefold contribution should be ubiquitous because this symmetry condition can be realized across a broad range of crystals. Numerical estimates based on concrete models further show that its amplitude is comparable to that expected from the AHE.

AI.tldr: 该论文揭示平面霍尔效应中的三重对称信号可以完全由经典机制解释，而非必须归因于量子机制如贝里曲率或反常霍尔效应。
AI.motivation: 近年来，平面霍尔效应（PHE）已成为研究贝里曲率和反常霍尔效应（AHE）的关键探针。通常将面内磁场下的三重对称信号归因于量子机制，但本文旨在探索其经典起源。
AI.method: 通过对玻尔兹曼方程进行磁场的三阶展开，发现三重对称分量源于晶体中镜像平面相对于测量设置的相对位置。这种对称条件可以在广泛的晶体中实现。
AI.result: 建立了三重对称平面霍尔效应的纯粹经典起源。数值估计基于具体模型显示，其振幅与反常霍尔效应预期的振幅相当，表明这种贡献应该是普遍存在的。
AI.conclusion: 平面霍尔效应中的三重对称信号不一定需要量子解释，而是可以通过经典机制充分解释。这一发现对理解平面霍尔效应的物理起源具有重要意义，并提示在实验解释中需要考虑经典贡献。

title: Ontology-aligned structuring and reuse of multimodal materials data and workflows towards automatic reproduction
summary: Reproducibility of computational results remains a challenge in materials science, as simulation workflows and parameters are often reported only in unstructured text and tables. While literature data are valuable for validation and reuse, the lack of machine-readable workflow descriptions prevents large-scale curation and systematic comparison. Existing text-mining approaches are insufficient to extract complete computational workflows with their associated parameters. An ontology-driven, large language model (LLM)-assisted framework is introduced for the automated extraction and structuring of computational workflows from the literature. The approach focuses on density functional theory-based stacking fault energy (SFE) calculations in hexagonal close-packed magnesium and its binary alloys, and uses a multi-stage filtering strategy together with prompt-engineered LLM extraction applied to method sections and tables. Extracted information is unified into a canonical schema and aligned with established materials ontologies (CMSO, ASMO, and PLDO), enabling the construction of a knowledge graph using atomRDF. The resulting knowledge graph enables systematic comparison of reported SFE values and supports the structured reuse of computational protocols. While full computational reproducibility is still constrained by missing or implicit metadata, the framework provides a foundation for organizing and contextualizing published results in a semantically interoperable form, thereby improving transparency and reusability of computational materials data.

AI.tldr: 提出基于本体论和LLM的框架，从文献中自动提取和结构化计算工作流，应用于镁合金堆垛层错能计算，构建知识图谱以支持系统比较和重用。
AI.motivation: 材料科学中计算结果的复现性面临挑战，因为模拟工作流和参数通常以非结构化文本和表格形式报告。现有文本挖掘方法无法提取完整的计算工作流及其参数，阻碍了大规模数据管理和系统比较。
AI.method: 采用本体论驱动、LLM辅助的框架，通过多阶段过滤策略和提示工程化的LLM提取，从方法部分和表格中提取信息。提取的信息统一到规范模式中，并与现有材料本体（CMSO、ASMO、PLDO）对齐，使用atomRDF构建知识图谱。
AI.result: 成功构建了知识图谱，能够系统比较报告的堆垛层错能值，并支持计算协议的结构化重用。虽然完整计算复现性仍受限于缺失或隐含的元数据，但该框架为以语义互操作形式组织和情境化发表结果提供了基础。
AI.conclusion: 该框架提高了计算材料数据的透明度和可重用性，为组织和管理文献中的计算工作流提供了有效方法，尽管完全复现性仍有挑战，但在语义互操作方面取得了重要进展。

title: Layer Decoupling in Twisted Bilayer WSe$_2$ Uncovered by Automated Dark-Field Tomography
summary: Twisted bilayer systems host a wealth of emergent phenomena, such as flat-band superconductivity, ferromagnetism, and ferroelectricity, arising from moiré superlattices and unconventional interlayer coupling. Despite their central role, direct and quantitative access to the out-of-plane atomic structure in these systems has remained elusive due to their nanoscale dimensions. Here, we introduce an automated dark-field electron tomography technique that enables three-dimensional structural analysis of atomically thin materials with sub-angstrom precision. Applying this method to twisted bilayer WSe$_2$, we uncover a significant expansion of the interlayer spacing compared to the bulk configuration, exceeding 0.1 angstrom, along with a remarkable temperature-driven interlayer decoupling unique to the twisted bilayer. Ultrafast measurement further reveals optically induced interlayer separation of ~0.2 angstrom on the picosecond timescale, attributed to transient exciton formation. These findings not only establish a powerful approach for visualizing hidden out-of-plane structures in atomically thin micro-flake materials, but also uncover the intrinsic fragility and dynamical tunability of interlayer coupling in moiré-engineered 2-dimensional materials.

AI.tldr: 开发自动化暗场电子断层扫描技术，实现原子薄材料三维结构分析，应用于扭曲双层WSe₂，发现层间距显著膨胀和温度驱动的层间解耦现象。
AI.motivation: 扭曲双层系统展现出丰富的涌现现象，但由于纳米尺度限制，其面外原子结构的直接定量表征一直难以实现。
AI.method: 引入自动化暗场电子断层扫描技术，能够以亚埃精度对原子薄材料进行三维结构分析。
AI.result: 在扭曲双层WSe₂中发现：1）层间距比体材料膨胀超过0.1埃；2）温度驱动的层间解耦现象；3）皮秒时间尺度上光学诱导的层间分离约0.2埃，归因于瞬态激子形成。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为可视化原子薄微片材料中隐藏的面外结构提供了强大工具，同时揭示了莫尔工程二维材料中层间耦合的内在脆弱性和动态可调性。

title: Multi-modal data-driven microstructure characterization
summary: Electron backscatter diffraction is one of the most prevalent techniques used for microstructural characterization. In recent years, there has been an increase in the use of data-driven methods to analyze raw Kikuchi patterns. However, most of these require user input and the interpretation of the data-derived features is often challenging and subject to \textit{informed interpretation}. By using a combination of principal component analysis, constrained non-negative matrix factorization, and a variational autoencoder along with information-theoretical considerations on a multimodal dataset, it is shown that a) automated decision on method-specific hyperparameters, here the number of components in principal component analysis, the number of components for constrained non-negative matrix factorization, and the selection of reference constraints; and b) latent space features can be mapped to physically-meaningful quantities. In addition, the recommended region-of-interest (ROI) size for optimal model performance is approximated automatically to be twice the characteristic grain size based on information content of the dataset. Implemented in a workflow, this allows for a transferable, dataset-specific autonomous data-driven phase and grain segmentation including grain boundary detection and the analysis of very-small-angle intra-grain variations to complement conventional electron backscatter analysis.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种自动化数据驱动方法，结合PCA、约束非负矩阵分解和变分自编码器，用于电子背散射衍射数据的自主相与晶粒分割分析。
AI.motivation: 当前电子背散射衍射数据分析主要依赖用户输入，数据驱动方法提取的特征解释困难且需要主观判断。需要开发自动化、可解释的微结构表征方法。
AI.method: 结合主成分分析(PCA)、约束非负矩阵分解和变分自编码器，利用信息论原理处理多模态数据集，自动确定方法超参数，并将潜在空间特征映射到物理量。
AI.result: 实现了自动化超参数决策和物理意义特征映射，自动确定最佳感兴趣区域尺寸为特征晶粒尺寸的两倍，建立了可转移的自主数据驱动相与晶粒分割工作流。
AI.conclusion: 该方法实现了电子背散射衍射数据的自动化、可解释分析，能够检测晶界和分析晶内微小角度变化，补充了传统分析方法。

title: Confinement-Induced Floquet Engineering and Non-Abelian Geometric Phases in Driven Quantum Wire Qubits
summary: This work theoretically demonstrates that a spin qubit in a parabolic quantum wire driven by a bichromatic field exhibits a confinement-tunable synthetic gauge field, leading to novel Floquet topological phenomena. The study presents the underlying mechanism for topological protection of qubit states against time-periodic perturbations. The analysis reveals a confinement-induced topological Landau-Zener transition, marked by a shift from preserved symmetries to chiral interference patterns in Landau-Zener-St$\ddot{u}$ckelberg-Majorana interferometry. Notably, the emergence of non-Abelian geometric phases under cyclic evolution in curved confinement and phase-parameter space is identified, enabling holonomic quantum computation. Additionally, the prediction of unconventional Floquet-Bloch oscillations in the quasi-energy and resonance transition probability spectra as a function of the biharmonic phase indicates exotic properties, including fractal spectra and fractional Floquet tunneling. These phenomena provide direct evidence of coherent transport in the synthetic dimension. Collectively, these findings position quantum wire materials has a versatile platform for Floquet engineering, topological quantum control, and fault-tolerant quantum information processing.

AI.tldr: 该研究理论证明，在双色场驱动的抛物线量子线中，自旋量子比特展现出可调谐的合成规范场，导致新颖的Floquet拓扑现象，为拓扑量子计算提供了新平台。
AI.motivation: 探索量子线系统中通过合成规范场实现拓扑保护的量子比特状态，为Floquet工程、拓扑量子控制和容错量子信息处理提供理论基础。
AI.method: 理论分析抛物线量子线中的自旋量子比特在双色场驱动下的动力学行为，研究合成规范场、拓扑Landau-Zener跃迁、非阿贝尔几何相和Floquet-Bloch振荡等现象。
AI.result: 发现限制可调谐的合成规范场导致拓扑保护、非阿贝尔几何相、分形谱和分数Floquet隧穿等奇异现象，为量子比特状态提供拓扑保护并支持全息量子计算。
AI.conclusion: 量子线材料成为Floquet工程、拓扑量子控制和容错量子信息处理的多功能平台，为拓扑量子计算提供了新的实现途径。

title: Engineering of Orbital Hybridization: An Exotic Strategy to Manipulate Orbital Current
comment: 18 pages, 5 figures; accepted by Adv. Funt. Mater
summary: Current-induced spin-orbit torque (SOT) plays a crucial role in the next-generation spin-orbitronics. Enhancing its efficiency is both fundamentally and practically interesting and remains a challenge to date. Recently, orbital counterparts of spin effects that do not rely on the spin-orbit coupling (SOC) have been found as an alternative mechanism to realize it. This work highlights the engineering of copper oxidation states for manipulating the orbital current and its torque in the CuO$_x$-based heterostructures. The orbital hybridization and thus the orbital-Rashba-Edelstein effect at the CuO$_x$/Cu interfaces are significantly enhanced by increasing the copper oxidation state, yielding a torque efficiency that is almost ten times larger than the conventional heavy metals. The Cu$_4$O$_3$/Cu interface, rather than the widely accepted CuO/Cu interface, is revealed to account for the enhanced SOT performance in the CuO$_x$-based heterostructures. In addition, the torque efficiency can be alternatively switched between high and low thresholds through the redox reaction. The current results establish an exotic and robust strategy for engineering the orbital current and SOT for spin-orbitronics, which applies to other weak-SOC materials.

AI.tldr: 通过调控铜氧化态增强CuOₓ基异质结中的轨道电流和自旋轨道转矩，效率比传统重金属高近10倍
AI.motivation: 自旋轨道转矩(SOT)在下一代自旋轨道电子学中至关重要，但提高其效率仍是一个挑战。最近发现不依赖自旋轨道耦合的轨道效应可作为替代机制来实现SOT，这为效率提升提供了新思路。
AI.method: 通过工程化调控铜的氧化态来操纵CuOₓ基异质结中的轨道电流和转矩。研究发现Cu₄O₃/Cu界面(而非广泛接受的CuO/Cu界面)能显著增强轨道杂化和轨道Rashba-Edelstein效应。
AI.result: 增加铜氧化态显著增强了CuOₓ/Cu界面的轨道杂化和轨道Rashba-Edelstein效应，产生的转矩效率比传统重金属高近10倍。此外，通过氧化还原反应可在高低阈值之间切换转矩效率。
AI.conclusion: 这项工作建立了一种新颖且稳健的策略，用于工程化调控轨道电流和自旋轨道转矩，适用于其他弱自旋轨道耦合材料，为自旋轨道电子学发展提供了新途径。

title: Successful growth of low carrier density $α$-In$_2$Se$_3$ single crystals using Se-flux in a modified Bridgman furnace
summary: Indium selenide (In$_2$Se$_3$) has garnered significant attention for its intriguing properties and applications in batteries, solar cells, photodetectors and ferroelectric devices. However, the controlled synthesis of single phase $α$-In$_2$Se$_3$ remains challenging owing to its complex phase diagram, presence of multiple polymorphs and the high volatility of selenium that induces non-stoichiometry and unintentional carrier doping. For ferroelectric α-In2Se3, minimizing the carrier density is essential because leakage current can obscure polarization switching. Here, we report the growth of $α$-In$_2$Se$_3$ single crystals using a unique approach, the Se-flux assisted modified vertical Bridgman technique combined with liquid encapsulation under high pressure. This approach creates a high-pressure, Se-rich environment that effectively minimizes Se-vaporization. Structural and compositional analysis using X-ray diffraction, transmission electron microscopy and energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy confirm the formation of pure $α$-In$_2$Se$_3$ single crystals with 3R stacking. Furthermore, the crystals exhibit remarkably low carrier density of 1.5-3.2 $\times$ 10$^{16}$ cm$^{-3}$ at 300K$-$the lowest reported to date, reflecting a significant suppression of Se-vacancies relative to the conventional Bridgman or melt-grown crystals. Through transport and ARPES measurements on different batches of crystals, we also demonstrate that the amount of Se-flux plays a crucial role in controlling Se-vacancies. Our results thus establish this modified Bridgman method as an effective strategy for synthesizing large $α$-In$_2$Se$_3$ single crystals with reduced intrinsic defects. This technique can be broadly applied to grow other volatile chalcogenides with reduced defects and controlled stoichiometry.

AI.tldr: 开发了一种改进的垂直布里奇曼技术，结合高压液态封装和硒助熔剂，成功生长出低载流子密度、高质量的单相α-In₂Se₃单晶
AI.motivation: α-In₂Se₃因其在电池、太阳能电池、光电探测器和铁电器件中的应用而备受关注，但单相α-In₂Se₃的可控合成面临挑战，主要由于复杂的相图、多种多晶型存在以及硒的高挥发性导致的非化学计量比和意外载流子掺杂。对于铁电α-In₂Se₃，最小化载流子密度至关重要，因为漏电流会掩盖极化切换。
AI.method: 采用硒助熔剂辅助的改进垂直布里奇曼技术，结合高压液态封装。这种方法创建了一个高压、富硒环境，有效减少了硒的挥发。通过X射线衍射、透射电子显微镜和能量色散X射线光谱进行结构和成分分析。
AI.result: 成功生长出纯α-In₂Se₃单晶，具有3R堆垛结构。晶体在300K时表现出极低的载流子密度（1.5-3.2×10¹⁶ cm⁻³），这是迄今为止报道的最低值，表明相对于传统的布里奇曼或熔体生长晶体，硒空位得到了显著抑制。通过不同批次晶体的输运和ARPES测量，证明硒助熔剂的量在控制硒空位方面起着关键作用。
AI.conclusion: 这种改进的布里奇曼方法是合成具有减少本征缺陷的大型α-In₂Se₃单晶的有效策略。该技术可广泛应用于生长其他挥发性硫族化合物，实现减少缺陷和可控化学计量比。

title: Interlayer charge transfer from contact electrification in conducting micro and nanoscale thin film heterostructures
summary: Contact electrification give rise to charge accumulation at the interface when two materials are brought into contact with each other. The charge accumulation at the interface will diffuse to the interior of the conducting material if the dimensions of the contacting conducting material is of the order of an unknown critical length scale. This contact electrification induced interlayer charge transfer will modify the fundamental physical properties of both the contacting materials. This review first discusses the reported experimental evidence of flexoelectricity induced contact electrification and interlayer charge transfer in conducting thin film based heterostructures. The interlayer charge transfer creates a gradient of charge carrier in both the thin films constituting the heterostructure and also modifies the electron-electron interactions. Further, the interlayer charge transfer changes the electron-phonon coupling, spin-phonon coupling and magnetoelectronic coupling that give rise to new physical behavior, which did not exist prior to the interlayer charge transfer. The new physical behaviors from interlayer charge transfer and their mechanistic origins are reanalyzed and discussed, which include spin-Hall effect of charge carriers, topological Hall effect of magnetoelectronic electromagnon, inhomogeneous magnetoelectronic multiferroic effect, flexoelectronic proximity effect and topological spin texture. This review article presents a unified picture of current status and future directions that will provide the scientists a stepping stone for research in the field of flexoelectricity mediated contact electrification and interlayer charge transfer mediated behavior in the micro/nanoscale heterostructures of the conducting materials.

AI.tldr: 该综述探讨了接触起电诱导的层间电荷转移在导电薄膜异质结构中的影响，重点关注挠曲电效应如何改变材料的电子-电子相互作用、电子-声子耦合、自旋-声子耦合等基本物理性质，并产生新的物理行为。
AI.motivation: 研究接触起电引起的层间电荷转移对导电材料异质结构基本物理性质的影响，揭示挠曲电效应在微纳米尺度异质结构中的重要作用，为相关领域研究提供统一框架。
AI.method: 综述方法：首先讨论挠曲电诱导接触起电和层间电荷转移的实验证据，然后分析电荷转移如何改变电荷载流子梯度、电子-电子相互作用、电子-声子耦合、自旋-声子耦合和磁电耦合，最后重新分析层间电荷转移产生的新物理行为及其机制起源。
AI.result: 层间电荷转移导致电荷载流子梯度变化，改变多种耦合机制，产生新的物理行为包括：电荷载流子的自旋霍尔效应、磁电电子电磁子的拓扑霍尔效应、非均匀磁电多铁效应、挠曲电邻近效应和拓扑自旋纹理。
AI.conclusion: 该综述为挠曲电介导的接触起电和层间电荷转移在导电材料微纳米尺度异质结构中的研究提供了统一图景和未来方向，为科学家在该领域的研究奠定了基石。

title: Spatially-resolved coherence of organic molecular spins at room-temperature
summary: Molecular spins are a versatile platform for quantum sensing. Not only are the spin-bearing molecules themselves widely tunable, they are also capable of being used as sensors as crystals, films and in solution. Using thin-films offers the advantages of high doping ratios and the ability to control the thickness with nanometre precision, however they also introduce disorder to the system. High proximity sensing can also be realised by using micro- and nano-crystals, however in many solid-state systems this leads to a reduction in coherence. In this paper we combine room-temperature optically detected coherent control of molecular spins and microscopy to image the coherence properties of both thin-films and micro-crystals of pentacene doped p-terphenyl. In thin-films we find large amounts of variation in both the contrast and coherence times, leading to a variability in the magnetic field sensitivity of approximately 7.6 %. Applying the technique to micro-crystals shows much lower sensitivity variability (1.3 %), and we find no evidence of coherence loss toward the edge of the crystal. Finally we perform optically-detected coherent control on a nano-crystal, showing minimal loss in coherence and contrast compared to the bulk crystal, with a coherence time of 1.09 μs and a contrast of 25 %.

AI.tldr: 该论文结合室温光学检测相干控制与显微技术，成像研究了p-三联苯掺杂并五苯薄膜和微晶的相干特性，发现薄膜中相干时间和对比度变化较大导致磁场灵敏度变异性约7.6%，而微晶变异性仅1.3%，纳米晶相干性能接近块体晶体。
AI.motivation: 分子自旋是量子传感的通用平台，薄膜和微晶各有优势但存在挑战：薄膜可实现高掺杂和厚度精确控制但引入无序，微晶可实现高接近传感但可能降低相干性。需要系统比较不同形态分子自旋材料的相干特性。
AI.method: 结合室温光学检测相干控制技术和显微成像技术，对p-三联苯掺杂并五苯的薄膜和微晶进行相干特性成像分析，包括对比度和相干时间的空间分布测量。
AI.result: 薄膜中对比度和相干时间变化较大，导致磁场灵敏度变异性约7.6%；微晶变异性显著降低至1.3%，且晶体边缘未发现相干性损失；纳米晶相干时间1.09μs、对比度25%，性能接近块体晶体。
AI.conclusion: 微晶和纳米晶在保持高相干性方面优于薄膜，特别是微晶显示出更均匀的相干特性和更低的灵敏度变异性，为分子自旋量子传感的实际应用提供了重要指导。

title: Layer-engineered quantum anomalous Hall effect in twisted rhombohedral graphene family
summary: The quantum anomalous Hall (QAH) insulator is uniquely characterized by the topological Chern number C. Controlling the Chern number is a key step toward functional topological electronics and enables access to exotic quantum phases beyond the traditional quantum Hall physics. Here, we report a series of QAH insulators in twisted rhombohedral graphene family, in which the Chern number can be tuned through layer configuration, in-situ electrostatic doping, and displacement field. Specifically, in twisted monolayer-rhombohedral N-layer graphene, denoted as (1+N) L, we observe QAH states with C=N at moire filling v=1, where N=3,4,5 represents the layer number of rhombohedral graphene. These results are experimentally confirmed by quantized Hall resistance and the Streda formula. In twisted monolayer-trilayer graphene, we also observe states with |C|=3 at v=3, whose sign can be switched by either electrostatic doping or displacement field. Furthermore, in twisted Bernal bilayer-rhombohedral tetralayer graphene denoted as (2+4) L, we demonstrate a displacement-field-driven topological phase transition between two distinct QAH states with C=3 and C=4 at v=1. Our work establishes twisted rhombohedral graphene as a highly versatile, layer-engineered platform for designing and dynamically controlling high-Chern-number topological matters.

AI.tldr: 在扭曲菱面体石墨烯家族中实现了可调控Chern数的量子反常霍尔绝缘体，通过层数配置、静电掺杂和位移场可动态控制拓扑态
AI.motivation: 控制Chern数是实现功能性拓扑电子学和探索超越传统量子霍尔物理的奇异量子相的关键步骤
AI.method: 使用扭曲单层-菱面体N层石墨烯(1+N)L结构，通过层数配置(N=3,4,5)、原位静电掺杂和位移场调控拓扑态
AI.result: 在v=1处观察到C=N的QAH态；在扭曲单层-三层石墨烯中观察到|C|=3的态；在(2+4)L结构中实现了位移场驱动的C=3到C=4的拓扑相变
AI.conclusion: 扭曲菱面体石墨烯是一个高度通用、可层工程化的平台，用于设计和动态控制高Chern数拓扑物质

title: 3D atomistic imaging of polymer nanocomposites with Atom Probe Tomography: experimental methodology, preliminary results and future outlook
summary: The use of polymer nanocomposites as gas barrier materials has seen increasing interest, including applications involving hydrogen transport and storage. Better understanding of gas transport through those polymeric systems requires 3D nanoscale detection of distributions and the possible trapping of gas molecules within nanoparticles and polymer/nanoparticle interfaces While atom probe tomography (APT) offers promising means for such nanoscale characterisation, its use for polymers has been mainly limited to thin organic layers deposited onto substrates or pre-fabricated metal needle shaped specimens. This work provides the very first application of APT to bulk polymer nanocomposites. Particularly, site specific atom probe sample preparation by Focused Ion Beam (FIB) liftout has been shown for the first time in a model system of hexagonal boron nanoparticles within a PVDF polymer matrix, using a variety of FIB workflows including Xe FIB, Ga FIB, cryogenic Ga FIB and deuterium charging. Mass spectra from the bulk polymer and the nanoparticle were collected using pulsed laser atom probe using standard conditions and compared. Several challenges encountered during this research including damage of the polymeric matrix during sample preparation were extensively discussed in this paper. Once those challenges have been resolved (e.g. by developing site specific sample preparation protocols), the application of APT to polymer nanocomposites can open new options for nanoscale characterisation of those systems.

AI.tldr: 首次将原子探针层析技术应用于块体聚合物纳米复合材料，开发了针对PVDF/六方氮化硼纳米颗粒系统的FIB样品制备方法，解决了聚合物损伤等挑战。
AI.motivation: 聚合物纳米复合材料作为气体阻隔材料在氢传输和储存中应用日益广泛，但需要3D纳米尺度表征气体分子在纳米颗粒和界面中的分布与捕获情况。虽然APT技术具有潜力，但此前仅用于沉积在基板上的薄有机层或预制的金属针状样品。
AI.method: 首次将APT应用于块体聚合物纳米复合材料，在PVDF/六方氮化硼纳米颗粒模型系统中，开发了基于FIB（包括Xe FIB、Ga FIB、低温Ga FIB和氘充电）的位点特异性样品制备方法，使用脉冲激光原子探针收集块体聚合物和纳米颗粒的质谱。
AI.result: 成功实现了块体聚合物纳米复合材料的APT表征，获得了聚合物和纳米颗粒的质谱数据，但遇到了样品制备过程中聚合物基体损伤等挑战。通过开发位点特异性样品制备方案，这些问题可以得到解决。
AI.conclusion: 一旦解决样品制备中的挑战，APT技术应用于聚合物纳米复合材料将为这些系统的纳米尺度表征开辟新途径，有助于深入理解气体传输机制。

title: Nonlinear optical response as a probe of emergent Lorentz symmetry violation in noncentrosymmetric materials
summary: We propose an electrically controlled protocol to detect weak Lorentz-violating (LV) backgrounds through the second-order shift photocurrent in noncentrosymmetric crystals. Using a spinful Rice--Mele model, we show that a stationary LV background induces a momentum-odd correction to the Bloch Hamiltonian, which generates an odd-in-field contribution to the shift current. This leads to a directional asymmetry, whereby the photocurrent distinguishes opposite orientations of an applied static field. The effect originates from an LV-induced deformation of the interband phase and can be isolated experimentally by comparing field-reversed configurations, with vanishing response at transverse orientations, providing an internal consistency check. Our results demonstrate that nonlinear optical responses offer a practical and symmetry-selective route for probing LV effects in solid-state systems.

AI.tldr: 提出一种电控协议，通过非中心对称晶体中的二阶位移光电流检测弱洛伦兹破坏背景
AI.motivation: 探索在固态系统中探测洛伦兹破坏效应的实用方法，利用非线性光学响应的对称选择性优势
AI.method: 使用自旋Rice-Mele模型，分析静止洛伦兹破坏背景对布洛赫哈密顿量的动量奇修正，研究其对位移光电流的贡献
AI.result: 洛伦兹破坏背景诱导了位移光电流的奇场贡献，产生方向不对称性，可通过比较场反转配置实验分离，横向取向响应为零
AI.conclusion: 非线性光学响应为探测固态系统中的洛伦兹破坏效应提供了实用且对称选择性的途径

title: Adsorption-Driven Symmetry Lowering in Single Molecules Revealed by Ångstrom-scale Tip-Enhanced Raman Imaging
summary: The vibrational landscape of adsorbed molecules is central to understanding surface interactions at the atomic scale, influencing phenomena from catalysis to molecular electronics. Recent advances in atomic-scale tip-enhanced Raman spectroscopy (TERS) have enabled vibrational mapping of single molecules with sub-nanometer spatial resolution, providing unprecedented insights into molecule-surface interactions by confining light in plasmonic picocavities. Here, we exploit TERS in a cryogenic scanning tunneling microscope junction to perform Raman hyperspectral mapping of single iron phthalocyanine (FePc) molecules in three non-equivalent adsorption configurations on Ag surfaces. We explore the changes in the vibrational modes of FePc molecules adsorbed on two distinct silver crystal terminations with differing symmetry, Ag(111) and Ag(110), revealing how subtle variations in the adsorption geometry due to substrate anisotropy can strongly influence molecular vibrations, lifting the degeneracy of individual normal modes. Our findings not only demonstrate the first use of sub-nanometer TERS mapping across different symmetry configurations but also provide a deeper understanding of how site-specific vibrational properties are intimately linked to local atomic environments. This capability paves the way for precisely tailoring surface interactions and controlling chemical reactions at the atomic scale.

AI.tldr: 利用低温扫描隧道显微镜中的尖端增强拉曼光谱（TERS）对单个酞菁铁分子在不同银晶面（Ag(111)和Ag(110)）上的三种非等效吸附构型进行亚纳米分辨率的拉曼超光谱成像，揭示了吸附几何的细微变化如何强烈影响分子振动并解除简并。
AI.motivation: 吸附分子的振动特性对于理解原子尺度的表面相互作用至关重要，影响从催化到分子电子学的各种现象。需要研究不同吸附构型下分子振动的变化，以理解局部原子环境如何影响振动特性。
AI.method: 在低温扫描隧道显微镜（STM）结中使用尖端增强拉曼光谱（TERS）技术，对单个酞菁铁（FePc）分子在两种不同对称性的银晶体表面（Ag(111)和Ag(110)）上的三种非等效吸附构型进行拉曼超光谱成像，实现亚纳米空间分辨率。
AI.result: 发现由于基底各向异性引起的吸附几何的细微变化可以强烈影响分子振动，解除单个简正模式的简并。首次实现了在不同对称构型间的亚纳米TERS成像，揭示了位点特异性振动特性与局部原子环境的密切关联。
AI.conclusion: 该研究不仅展示了在不同对称构型间进行亚纳米TERS成像的首个应用，还提供了对位点特异性振动特性如何与局部原子环境密切相关的深入理解，为在原子尺度精确调控表面相互作用和控制化学反应铺平了道路。

title: Lithium and sodium decorated PHE-graphene for high capacity hydrogen storage: A DFT and GCMC study
summary: Porous nanocarbon materials are seen as potential excellent materials for hydrogen storage due to their high surface area, excellent cycling stability and favorable kinetics. This study employs Density Functional Theory (DFT) simulations to investigate key property of Li$^-$ and Na$^-$ modified PHE-graphene, including structural stability, electronic properties, and hydrogen storage capabilities. The results show that when each Li atom adsorbs six hydrogen molecules, the material reaches the maximum hydrogen adsorption gravimetric density of 15.20 wt%. Additionally, through Grand Canonical Monte Carlo (GCMC) simulations, we obtained the hydrogen weight ratios and adsorption enthalpy curves for Li- and Na-modified PHE under varying temperature and pressure conditions. These findings indicate that both Li- and Na-modified PHE-graphene are exceptional candidates for hydrogen storage materials, particularly in mobile applications.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过DFT和GCMC模拟发现，Li和Na修饰的PHE-石墨烯是优异的储氢材料，Li修饰材料最高储氢密度达15.20 wt%
AI.motivation: 多孔纳米碳材料因其高比表面积、优异循环稳定性和良好动力学特性，被认为是潜在的优异储氢材料。本研究旨在探索Li和Na修饰的PHE-石墨烯的储氢性能。
AI.method: 采用密度泛函理论（DFT）模拟研究Li和Na修饰的PHE-石墨烯的结构稳定性、电子性质和储氢能力。同时使用巨正则蒙特卡洛（GCMC）模拟获取不同温度和压力条件下的氢重量比和吸附焓曲线。
AI.result: 当每个Li原子吸附六个氢分子时，材料达到最大氢吸附重量密度15.20 wt%。GCMC模拟获得了Li和Na修饰PHE在不同温度和压力条件下的氢重量比和吸附焓曲线。
AI.conclusion: Li和Na修饰的PHE-石墨烯都是优异的储氢材料候选者，特别适用于移动应用领域。

title: Efficient charge transfer in solution-processed PbS Quantum Dot-reduced graphene oxide hybrid materials
summary: Quantum dot - graphene hybrid materials have raised significant interest due to the unique synergy of the optical properties of colloidal quantum dots (QDs) and the transport properties of graphene. This stimulated the development of low-cost and up-scalable solution-processed strategies for hybrid materials with potential application in light harvesting and opto-electronic devices. Here we report a versatile covalent-linking based approach for the functionalization of reduced graphene oxide (rGO), to prepare a variety of QD-rGO hybrid dispersions with QDs of different size and composition (PbS, PbS/CdS and CdSe QDs), and shape (CdSe/CdS dot-in-rods). We achieved a well-controlled QD coverage of the rGO sheets by functionalizing the rGO surface with mercapto-silane linkers. A further spectroscopic investigation of near-infrared PbS QD-rGO materials demonstrates efficient electronic coupling between both materials. The QD photoluminescence emission quenching and exciton lifetime shortening up to 95%, together with subtle graphene Raman G-band shifts upon QD linking, supports electron transfer as the dominant relaxation pathway from the QD to the rGO. The use of core/shell PbS/CdS QDs allows tuning of the transfer efficiency from 94% for a 0.2 nm thin CdS shell, down to 30% for a 1.1 nm thick shell.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种基于共价连接的方法，用于制备量子点-还原氧化石墨烯杂化材料，实现了对石墨烯表面的可控功能化，并证明了量子点与石墨烯之间的高效电子耦合。
AI.motivation: 量子点-石墨烯杂化材料结合了胶体量子点的光学特性和石墨烯的传输特性，在光收集和光电器件中具有应用潜力。需要开发低成本、可扩展的溶液处理策略来制备这类杂化材料。
AI.method: 采用基于巯基硅烷连接剂的共价连接方法，对还原氧化石墨烯进行功能化，制备了多种不同尺寸、组成（PbS、PbS/CdS、CdSe）和形状（CdSe/CdS点-棒结构）的量子点-rGO杂化分散液。
AI.result: 实现了对rGO片上量子点覆盖率的良好控制。光谱研究表明，近红外PbS QD-rGO材料中两种材料之间存在高效的电子耦合：量子点光致发光淬灭达95%，激子寿命缩短，石墨烯拉曼G带发生微小位移，表明电子转移是主要的弛豫途径。使用核/壳PbS/CdS量子点可调节转移效率（0.2nm薄壳为94%，1.1nm厚壳为30%）。
AI.conclusion: 该共价连接方法是一种通用且可控的策略，可用于制备各种量子点-石墨烯杂化材料，并证明了通过调节量子点壳层厚度可以调控电子转移效率，为光电器件应用提供了重要基础。

title: Room temperature intrinsic anomalous Hall effect in disordered half-metallic ferromagnetic quaternary Heusler alloy CoRuFeSi
summary: Quaternary Heusler alloys offer a versatile platform for engineering magnetic and topological transport phenomena through chemical flexibility and tunable disorder. Here, we report a comprehensive experimental and theoretical investigation of the magnetic, magnetotransport, and anomalous Hall properties of the quaternary Heusler alloy CoRuFeSi. The compound crystallizes in the LiMgPdSn-type structure with significant Co--Ru antisite disorder and exhibits soft ferromagnetism with a saturation magnetization of $4.21~μ_{\mathrm{B}}/\mathrm{f.u.}$ at low temperature and a Curie temperature well above room temperature. Hall measurements reveal a robust anomalous Hall effect persisting up to 300~K, with an anomalous Hall conductivity of $\sim 74$~S/cm that is nearly temperature independent. Scaling analysis demonstrates that the anomalous Hall response is dominated by the intrinsic Berry-curvature mechanism. First-principles calculations identify CoRuFeSi as a topologically nontrivial nodal-line semimetal in its ordered phase. Incorporation of experimentally relevant Co--Ru antisite disorder redistributes the Berry curvature and quantitatively reproduces the experimentally observed anomalous Hall conductivity, while preserving half-metallicity. These results establish CoRuFeSi as a disorder-tolerant half-metallic ferromagnet with a sizable intrinsic anomalous Hall effect at room temperature, highlighting its potential for spintronic and Hall-based device applications.

AI.tldr: CoRuFeSi是一种四元Heusler合金，具有室温下稳定的铁磁性、半金属性和显著的异常霍尔效应，其异常霍尔电导率约74 S/cm，主要由本征Berry曲率机制主导。
AI.motivation: 研究四元Heusler合金CoRuFeSi的磁性、磁输运和异常霍尔特性，探索其在自旋电子学和霍尔器件应用中的潜力，特别是其无序容忍性和室温稳定性。
AI.method: 采用实验与理论相结合的方法：实验上通过结构表征、磁性测量和霍尔效应测试；理论上进行第一性原理计算，分析有序相和无序相（Co-Ru反位无序）的电子结构、拓扑性质和Berry曲率分布。
AI.result: CoRuFeSi结晶为LiMgPdSn型结构，具有显著的Co-Ru反位无序；呈现软铁磁性，低温饱和磁化强度4.21 μB/f.u.，居里温度高于室温；异常霍尔效应在300K下稳定存在，电导率约74 S/cm且几乎不随温度变化；理论计算表明有序相为拓扑非平庸节线半金属，无序相仍保持半金属性并能定量重现实验观测的异常霍尔电导率。
AI.conclusion: CoRuFeSi是一种无序容忍的半金属铁磁体，具有室温下显著的本征异常霍尔效应，在自旋电子学和霍尔基器件应用中具有重要潜力。

title: Coupling Quantum Dots to Elastic Waves in a Phononic Crystal Waveguide
comment: 25 pages, 17 figures, Supplementary Material with additional datas
summary: We present a comprehensive study of quantum dot (QD) coupling to various phononic modes in a phononic waveguide, combining multiband kp and configuration-interaction (CI) QD state simulations with finite-element waveguide mode modeling. We consider self-assembled Stranski-Krastanov InGaAs/GaAs as well as local droplet-etched GaAs/AlGaAs structures. Using kp-CI calculations, we quantify the strain and piezoelectric responses of InAs and GaAs QDs. By systematically isolating volumetric/shear deformation-potential and piezoelectric channels, we demonstrate how mode symmetries dictate distinct coupling mechanisms. We identify the dominant coupling channels and characterize their observable signatures in the QD response. We predict strong linear energy shifts under volumetric strain and quadratic behavior under shear strain, especially in GaAs QDs. The piezoelectric effect is dominated by polarizability, which also leads to a quadratic response. The simulations show energy modulations up to 0.7 meV for an acoustic wave with 0.1 nm amplitude. The quadratic response to shear strain and piezoelectric field leads to frequency doubling in the QD response to a mechanical wave and to non-harmonic time traces when linear and quadratic effects contribute to a similar degree. The deep understanding of QD-acoustic couplings opens pathways to the optimal design of QD and waveguide structures, as well as to improved engineering of acousto-optic quantum interfaces.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过多带kp和组态相互作用计算结合有限元波导模式建模，系统分析了量子点与声子波导中各种声学模式的耦合机制，揭示了不同应变和压电通道的耦合特征。
AI.motivation: 研究量子点与声子波导的耦合机制对于优化量子点设计、改进声光量子接口工程至关重要。目前对量子点与声学模式耦合的深入理解有限，需要系统分析不同耦合通道的物理机制。
AI.method: 采用多带kp理论和组态相互作用计算量子点态，结合有限元方法建模波导模式。研究自组装Stranski-Krastanov InGaAs/GaAs和局部液滴蚀刻GaAs/AlGaAs结构，系统分离体积/剪切形变势和压电耦合通道。
AI.result: 发现体积应变导致强线性能量偏移，剪切应变和压电效应则产生二次响应。GaAs量子点对剪切应变尤为敏感。预测0.1nm振幅声波可产生高达0.7meV的能量调制。二次响应导致频率加倍和非谐时间轨迹。
AI.conclusion: 对量子点-声学耦合的深入理解为优化量子点和波导结构设计、改进声光量子接口工程开辟了新途径，揭示了不同对称性模式如何决定特定的耦合机制。

title: Colossal low-field negative magnetoresistance in CaAl$_{2}$Si$_{2}$-type diluted magnetic semiconductors (Ba,K)(Cd,Mn)$_{2}$As$_{2}$
summary: We report the magnetic and magnetotransport properties of the layered CaAl$_2$Si$_2$-type diluted magnetic semiconductor (Ba$_{1-x}$K$_x$)(Cd$_{1-y}$Mn$_y$)$_2$As$_2$ over a broad Mn (spin) substitution range of $0.05 \le y \le 0.5$. K substitution introduces hole carriers, whereas Mn provides local moments, resulting in bulk ferromagnetism with Curie temperatures up to $\sim 17$ K. Intrinsic magnetic ordering is further supported by an anomalous Hall contribution and a specific-heat anomaly near $T_{\mathrm{C}}$. A key performance feature is a colossal negative magnetoresistance: for heavily Mn-doped compositions ($y \ge 0.3$), $\mathrm{MR}=[ρ(H)-ρ(0)]/ρ(0)$ reaches approximately $-100\%$ at 2 K and nearly saturates at a relatively low magnetic field of $\sim 0.35\,\mathrm{T}$. The combination of soft ferromagnetism, strong spin-charge coupling, and low-field MR saturation highlights (Ba,K)(Cd,Mn)$_2$As$_2$ as a promising bulk platform for low-temperature magnetoresistive functionalities.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了(Ba₁₋ₓKₓ)(Cd₁₋yMn_y)₂As₂稀释磁性半导体的磁性和磁输运性质，发现通过K和Mn掺杂可实现体铁磁性，并在低温下观察到巨负磁阻效应。
AI.motivation: 研究新型稀释磁性半导体材料，探索其磁性和磁输运特性，特别是寻找具有低场饱和磁阻效应的材料，为低温磁阻功能器件提供平台。
AI.method: 通过K掺杂引入空穴载流子，Mn掺杂提供局域磁矩，在宽Mn掺杂范围(0.05≤y≤0.5)内系统研究材料的磁性和磁输运性质，包括磁化率、反常霍尔效应、比热和磁阻测量。
AI.result: 材料表现出体铁磁性，居里温度高达~17K；在重Mn掺杂(y≥0.3)时观察到巨负磁阻效应，在2K时MR≈-100%，且在低场(~0.35T)下接近饱和；反常霍尔效应和比热异常证实了本征磁有序。
AI.conclusion: (Ba,K)(Cd,Mn)₂As₂结合了软铁磁性、强自旋-电荷耦合和低场磁阻饱和特性，是低温磁阻功能应用的理想体材料平台。

title: Inverse Chiral Phonon Zeeman Effect in Noncentrosymmetric Crystals
summary: We present a microscopic theory of the inverse chiral phonon Zeeman effect in noncentrosymmetric crystals. Within micropolar elasticity, coupled translational displacements and microrotations give rise to intrinsically chiral phonons, which generate an elliptically polarized internal magnetic field through dynamical piezoelectricity. In the high-frequency Floquet regime and under incomplete electronic screening, this field acts as an effective longitudinal Zeeman field on electronic spins, leading to spin polarization and band splitting. The results establish a purely lattice-driven mechanism for the inverse chiral phonon Zeeman effect in noncentrosymmetric crystals.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了非中心对称晶体中逆手性声子塞曼效应的微观理论，通过微极弹性理论解释手性声子如何通过动态压电效应产生内部磁场，从而驱动电子自旋极化和能带分裂。
AI.motivation: 研究非中心对称晶体中手性声子与电子自旋相互作用的微观机制，特别是探索如何通过晶格振动产生有效的塞曼场，为纯晶格驱动的自旋操控提供理论基础。
AI.method: 采用微极弹性理论，结合平移位移和微旋转的耦合，描述本征手性声子。通过动态压电效应分析手性声子产生的椭圆极化内部磁场，并在高频Floquet体系和电子不完全屏蔽条件下，研究该磁场作为有效纵向塞曼场对电子自旋的影响。
AI.result: 建立了非中心对称晶体中逆手性声子塞曼效应的微观理论框架，表明手性声子通过动态压电效应产生的内部磁场能够导致电子自旋极化和能带分裂，证实了纯晶格驱动的塞曼效应机制。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为非中心对称晶体中的逆手性声子塞曼效应提供了完整的微观理论解释，揭示了晶格振动直接驱动电子自旋极化的新机制，为自旋电子学和量子材料研究开辟了新途径。

title: Discovery of Ferroelectric Twin Boundaries in a Photoactive Halide Perovskite
summary: Halide perovskites have emerged as promising materials for next-generation photovoltaics, laser sources and X-ray detectors. There is intense debate as to whether some photoactive halide perovskites exhibit ferroelectric behaviour and whether it might be possible to utilise the bulk photovoltaic effect to enhance the performance of halide perovskite solar cells. Here, using low-dose scanning transmission electron microscopy, we discover the existence of ferroelastic twin boundaries in vapor-deposited CsPbI3 thin films, parallel to {110} and {112}. Remarkably, despite photoactive CsPbI3 being centrosymmetric and non-polar, we observe directly that Pb atoms shift at {110} twin boundaries driving a local ferroelectric-like polarisation. These polar twin walls form an intrinsic array of nanoscale functional interfaces, spaced ~30-50 nm apart, embedded within the non-polar perovskite lattice. In contrast, {112} twin boundaries remain non-polar but strongly suppress octahedral tilt and off-centre Cs atom displacements, revealing a different untapped ferroic degree of freedom. These discoveries together uncover previously hidden ferroic functionality in halide perovskite semiconductors, opening opportunities for enhanced conductivity and photovoltaic behaviour through domain wall engineering.

AI.tldr: 在CsPbI3钙钛矿薄膜中发现两种孪晶界：{110}界产生局部铁电性，{112}界抑制八面体倾斜，揭示了卤化物钙钛矿中隐藏的铁性功能。
AI.motivation: 探索卤化物钙钛矿是否具有铁电行为，以及能否利用体光伏效应提升太阳能电池性能，这是当前研究的热点争议问题。
AI.method: 采用低剂量扫描透射电子显微镜（STEM）技术，研究气相沉积CsPbI3薄膜中的微结构。
AI.result: 发现两种孪晶界：{110}孪晶界中铅原子位移产生局部铁电极化，形成纳米级功能界面；{112}孪晶界保持非极性但强烈抑制八面体倾斜和铯原子位移。
AI.conclusion: 揭示了卤化物钙钛矿半导体中隐藏的铁性功能，为通过畴壁工程增强电导率和光伏性能开辟了新途径。

title: Effect of uniaxial compressive stress on polarization switching and domain wall formation in tetragonal phase BaTiO3 via machine learning potential
comment: 35 pages, 9 figures + Supplementary Information (3 pages, 3 figures), submitted to Materials & Design
summary: Ferroelectric materials such as BaTiO3 exhibit spontaneous polarization that can be reoriented by an external electric field, forming the basis of various memory, actuator, and sensor applications. The polarization switching behavior, however, is strongly influenced by mechanical boundary conditions due to the intrinsic electromechanical coupling in ferroelectrics. In this study, we employ a machine learning interatomic potential to investigate the effect of uniaxial compressive stress on polarization switching and domain wall evolution in the tetragonal phase of BaTiO3. This study revealed a critical stress about 120 MPa which 90 degree polarization switching occurs. Beyond the critical stress, larger supercells exhibit lower activation energies for polarization switching with 180-degree domain wall formation and weaker constraints from periodic boundary conditions, thereby facilitating domain-wall formation. Besides, Increasing compressive stress reduces both the remnant polarization and the coercive field, while a double hysteresis loop emerges at a stress level of 80 MPa. These findings provide atomistic insights into stress-controlled ferroelectric switching and highlight the crucial role of mechanical loading in designing reliable ferroelectric devices.

AI.tldr: 使用机器学习原子间势研究单轴压应力对BaTiO3铁电材料极化翻转和畴壁演化的影响，发现约120MPa的临界应力下发生90度极化翻转，压应力降低剩余极化和矫顽场。
AI.motivation: 铁电材料如BaTiO3的自发极化可通过电场重定向，用于存储器、执行器和传感器应用。但极化翻转行为受机械边界条件强烈影响，因为铁电材料具有固有的机电耦合特性。需要研究应力对极化翻转和畴壁演化的影响。
AI.method: 采用机器学习原子间势研究单轴压应力对四方相BaTiO3极化翻转和畴壁演化的影响。分析不同应力水平下的极化翻转行为、畴壁形成和激活能变化。
AI.result: 发现约120MPa的临界应力，在此应力下发生90度极化翻转。超过临界应力后，较大超晶胞表现出较低的极化翻转激活能，有利于180度畴壁形成。压应力降低剩余极化和矫顽场，80MPa应力水平出现双回滞环。
AI.conclusion: 研究提供了应力控制铁电翻转的原子尺度见解，强调了机械载荷在设计可靠铁电器件中的关键作用。应力条件显著影响极化翻转行为和畴壁演化，对器件性能优化有重要指导意义。

title: Water Phase Diagram from a General-Purpose Atomic Cluster Expansion Potential
summary: Water's phase diagram remains one of the most intricate and challenging benchmarks in molecular modeling. In this study, we compute the phase diagram of water using an Atomic Cluster Expansion (ACE) potential trained on density-functional theory (DFT) calculations based on the revPBE-D3 exchange and correlation functional. We compute solid-liquid chemical potential differences and melting points using biased coexistence simulations with the On-the-Fly Probability Enhanced Sampling (OPES) method. Starting from these points, we trace coexistence lines using Gibbs-Duhem integration. This combination of methods allows us to consistently map pressure-temperature phase boundaries and reconstruct the full phase diagram between approximately 100-500 K and 0-4 GPa. The stability regions of the main ice polymorphs (Ih, II, V, VI, and VII) are reproduced in close agreement with experiments. As in earlier studies based on DFT, ice III is metastable and there are systematic shifts of coexistence lines with respect to experimental results. Our results demonstrate the capability of our general-purpose ACE potential to capture the complex phase behavior of water across wide thermodynamic conditions.

AI.tldr: 使用基于revPBE-D3泛函的ACE势能模型计算水的相图，通过OPES采样和Gibbs-Duhem积分方法，在100-500K和0-4GPa范围内重现了主要冰相（Ih、II、V、VI、VII）的稳定区域，与实验结果高度一致。
AI.motivation: 水的相图是分子建模中最复杂和最具挑战性的基准之一，本研究旨在开发一种能够准确描述水在广泛热力学条件下相行为的通用势能模型。
AI.method: 使用基于revPBE-D3密度泛函理论计算的原子簇展开（ACE）势能模型，通过OPES偏置共存模拟计算固液化学势差和熔点，然后采用Gibbs-Duhem积分方法追踪共存线。
AI.result: 在100-500K和0-4GPa范围内成功重建了完整的相图，主要冰相（Ih、II、V、VI、VII）的稳定区域与实验高度一致，但冰III相为亚稳态，共存线存在系统性偏移。
AI.conclusion: 研究证明了通用ACE势能模型能够准确捕捉水在广泛热力学条件下的复杂相行为，为分子模拟提供了可靠的工具。

title: Machine learning interatomic potentials for solid-state precipitation
summary: Machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) are routinely used to model diverse atomistic phenomena, yet parameterizing them to accurately capture solid-state phase transformations remains difficult. We present error metrics and data-generation schemes designed to streamline the parameterization of MLIPs for modeling precipitation in multi-component alloys. We developed an algorithm that enumerates symmetrically distinct transformation pathways connecting chemical decorations on different parent crystal structures. Additionally, we introduce the weighted Kendall-$τ$ coefficient and its semi-grand canonical generalization as metrics for quantifying MLIP accuracy in predicting low-temperature thermodynamics. We apply these approaches to parameterize an MLIP for a dilute Mg-Nd alloy. The resulting potential reproduces the complex early-stage precipitation behavior observed in experiment. Large-scale atomistic simulations reveal competition between order-disorder and structural transformations. Furthermore, these results suggest a continuous transition between high-symmetry hcp and bcc crystal structures during aging heat treatments.

AI.tldr: 开发了用于多组分合金沉淀建模的机器学习原子间势（MLIPs）参数化方法和误差度量，应用于Mg-Nd合金，成功再现早期沉淀行为并揭示有序-无序与结构转变的竞争。
AI.motivation: 机器学习原子间势（MLIPs）在模拟固态相变时参数化困难，需要开发专门的方法和度量标准来准确捕捉多组分合金中的沉淀现象。
AI.method: 1. 开发算法枚举不同母晶体结构上化学装饰的对称性不同转变路径；2. 引入加权Kendall-τ系数及其半巨正则推广作为量化MLIP预测低温热力学准确性的度量；3. 将这些方法应用于Mg-Nd合金MLIP参数化。
AI.result: 1. 得到的势能函数成功再现了实验中观察到的复杂早期沉淀行为；2. 大规模原子模拟揭示了有序-无序转变与结构转变之间的竞争；3. 结果表明在时效热处理过程中，高对称性hcp和bcc晶体结构之间存在连续转变。
AI.conclusion: 提出的误差度量和数据生成方案能够有效参数化MLIPs用于多组分合金沉淀建模，揭示了Mg-Nd合金中复杂的相变机制，为固态相变模拟提供了新工具。

title: Visual Luminescence Thermometry Enabled by Phase-Transition-Activated Cross Relaxation of Tb3+ Ions
summary: The development of visual luminescent thermometers capable of exhibiting pronounced color changes in response to temperature variations requires the rational design of phosphors with high spectrally selective thermal sensitivity. In this work, we present a strategy based on phase-transition-induced activation of cross-relaxation processes in LiYO2:Tb3+. The monoclinic-to-tetragonal structural phase transition modifies the point symmetry of Tb3+ ions in the host lattice, enhances the Stark effect, and enables energetic resonance required for efficient cross relaxation. Consequently, emission originating from the 5D3 excited state is rapidly quenched relative to that from the 5D4 level above approximately 300 K, resulting in a distinct temperature-dependent color change of the emitted light from blue to green. This mechanism yields exceptionally high chromaticity-coordinate-based sensitivities, reaching SRx,max = 0.40% K-1 and SRy,max=0.72% K-1 at 410 K. Furthermore, phase-transition-driven modifications of the Tb3+ emission spectral profile enable the realization of a multimode luminescent thermometer with a maximum relative sensitivity of SRmax=13% K-1. The practical applicability of this system is demonstrated through an ON-OFF luminescent thermal switch and fully filter-free, dynamic two-dimensional thermal imaging using the blue and green channels of a standard digital camera, enabling intuitive visualization, remote readout, and temperature mapping under dynamic conditions.

AI.tldr: 基于LiYO2:Tb3+中相变诱导交叉弛豫激活的视觉发光温度计，通过结构相变实现从蓝到绿的明显颜色变化，具有高灵敏度和多模式测温能力。
AI.motivation: 开发能够响应温度变化而显示明显颜色变化的视觉发光温度计，需要合理设计具有高光谱选择性热敏感性的磷光体。
AI.method: 利用LiYO2:Tb3+中单斜到四方结构相变诱导的交叉弛豫过程激活策略。相变改变了Tb3+离子的点对称性，增强了斯塔克效应，并实现了高效交叉弛豫所需的能量共振。
AI.result: 在约300K以上，5D3激发态的发射相对于5D4能级迅速淬灭，导致发射光从蓝色到绿色的明显温度依赖性颜色变化。获得了极高的色度坐标灵敏度（SRx,max=0.40% K-1，SRy,max=0.72% K-1），并实现了多模式发光温度计（SRmax=13% K-1）。
AI.conclusion: 该相变驱动机制实现了高灵敏度的视觉温度传感，通过ON-OFF发光热开关和完全无滤波的动态二维热成像展示了实际应用潜力，可用于直观可视化、远程读取和动态条件下的温度映射。

title: Phase Transitions in Low-Dimensional Layered Double Perovskites: The Role of the Organic Moieties
summary: Halide double perovskites are an interesting alternative to Pb-containing counterparts as active materials in optoelectronic devices. Low-dimensional double perovskites are fabricated by introducing large organic cations, resulting in organic/inorganic architectures with one or more inorganic octahedral layers separated by organic cations. Here, we synthesize layered double perovskites based on 3D Cs2AgBiBr6 that consist of double (2L) or single (1L) inorganic octahedral layers, using ammonium cations of different size and chemical structure. Temperature-dependent Raman spectroscopy reveals phase transition signatures in both inorganic lattice and organic moieties by detecting variations in their vibrational modes. Changes in the conformational arrangement of the organic cations to an ordered state coincide with a phase transition in the 1L systems with the shortest ammonium moieties. Significant changes of photoluminescence intensity observed around the transition temperature suggest that optical properties may be deeply affected by the octahedral tilts emerging at the phase transition.

AI.tldr: 该研究合成了基于Cs2AgBiBr6的层状双钙钛矿，通过不同尺寸的铵阳离子形成双层(2L)或单层(1L)无机八面体层结构，利用温度依赖拉曼光谱揭示了无机晶格和有机基团的相变特征，并发现相变显著影响光致发光强度。
AI.motivation: 卤化物双钙钛矿作为含铅钙钛矿的替代材料在光电器件中具有应用潜力，但需要研究其低维结构（特别是层状双钙钛矿）的相变行为和光学性质调控机制。
AI.method: 合成基于Cs2AgBiBr6的层状双钙钛矿，使用不同尺寸和化学结构的铵阳离子形成双层(2L)或单层(1L)无机八面体层结构；采用温度依赖拉曼光谱技术分析无机晶格和有机基团的振动模式变化，研究相变特征；测量光致发光强度随温度的变化。
AI.result: 拉曼光谱揭示了无机晶格和有机基团的相变特征；最短铵基团的1L体系中，有机阳离子构象排列向有序状态的转变与相变同时发生；在相变温度附近观察到光致发光强度的显著变化，表明八面体倾斜对光学性质有重要影响。
AI.conclusion: 层状双钙钛矿的相变行为同时涉及无机晶格和有机组分的变化，有机阳离子的有序化与无机八面体倾斜共同影响材料的光学性质，这为调控双钙钛矿的光电性能提供了重要见解。

title: Beta-AlGaO/Ga2O3 Tri-Gate MOSHEMT with 70GHz fT and 55GHz fmax
summary: We report Beta-AlGaO/Ga2O3 tri-gate heterostructure MOSHEMTs incorporating a thin 5 nm Al2O3 gate oxide layer for improved gate control and reduced leakage. The devices were fabricated on AlGaO/GaO heterostructures grown by ozone MBE on Fe-doped Ga2O3 (010) substrates. The tri-gate MOSHEMTs, with 1 micron-wide fins and Lg=155 nm, exhibit a peak current-gain cut-off frequency fT=70 GHz and a power-gain cut-off frequency fMAX=55 GHz.The fT.L product of 10.85 GHz-micron is the highest among reported Ga2O3 FETs to date. The devices show Vth =-0.5 V, an on/off ratio 10^6 I=80 mA/mm, a peak gm=60 mS/mm, and a low gate leakage current of 10^(-10) mA/mm at Vgs=0.5 V. Passivation with a 100 nm ALD Al2O3 layer effectively removes DC/RF dispersion and maintains stable operation under pulsed IV and repeated RF measurements. These results demonstrate the potential of tri-gate AlGaO/GaO MOSHEMTs for next-generation high-frequency and high-power applications.

AI.tldr: Beta-AlGaO/Ga2O3三栅MOSHEMT采用5nm Al2O3栅氧化层，实现70GHz fT和55GHz fMAX，创下Ga2O3 FET最高fT.L积10.85 GHz-μm，展示高频高功率应用潜力。
AI.motivation: 开发基于Ga2O3的高频高功率器件，通过三栅结构和薄栅氧化层改善栅极控制和降低漏电流，解决传统Ga2O3 FET在频率性能方面的限制。
AI.method: 在Fe掺杂Ga2O3(010)衬底上通过臭氧MBE生长AlGaO/GaO异质结，采用5nm Al2O3栅氧化层，制造三栅MOSHEMT（鳍宽1μm，栅长155nm），并用100nm ALD Al2O3进行钝化。
AI.result: 器件实现fT=70GHz、fMAX=55GHz、fT.L=10.85 GHz-μm（Ga2O3 FET最高），Vth=-0.5V、开关比10^6、峰值跨导60mS/mm、低栅漏电流10^(-10)mA/mm，钝化有效消除DC/RF色散。
AI.conclusion: 三栅AlGaO/GaO MOSHEMT展现出优异的高频性能，为下一代高频高功率应用提供了有前景的Ga2O3器件解决方案。

title: Photoelectron Spectroscopy Study of U-Te Thin Films: A Unified Perspective of Hybridization Effects across Compositions
summary: Uranium tellurides span magnetic and superconducting ground states, yet systematic electronic-structure information across the U-Te series remains scarce. In this study, we perform photoemission measurements on freshly prepared UxTey thin films covering the range of bulk stoichiometries under ultra-high vacuum (10^-9 Pa), enabling clean surfaces and compositions matching bulk phases, including the celebrated UTe2. X-ray and ultraviolet photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS/UPS) reveal consistent evolution of the U 4f and Te 3d core levels and valence states across the series, in good agreement with the limited bulk data. Supported by uniform ab initio calculations for all U-Te compounds, we identify systematic trends in U-Te hybridization and charge-transfer effects across the series. These results establish thin-film photoemission as a reliable route for mapping electronic-structure trends in tellurides of heavy elements with diverse electronic ground states.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过光电子能谱测量新鲜制备的UxTey薄膜，系统分析了铀碲化物系列的电子结构演化，揭示了U-Te杂化和电荷转移效应的系统趋势。
AI.motivation: 铀碲化物具有丰富的磁性和超导基态，但整个U-Te系列的电子结构信息仍然稀缺，需要系统研究来理解这些材料的电子特性。
AI.method: 在超高真空条件下制备新鲜UxTey薄膜，覆盖体相化学计量范围，使用X射线和紫外光电子能谱测量U 4f和Te 3d核心能级及价带态，并结合从头计算进行系统分析。
AI.result: 光电子能谱显示U 4f和Te 3d核心能级及价带态在整个系列中呈现一致的演化趋势，与有限的体相数据吻合良好，揭示了U-Te杂化和电荷转移效应的系统变化规律。
AI.conclusion: 薄膜光电子能谱是研究具有不同电子基态的重元素碲化物电子结构趋势的可靠方法，为理解铀碲化物系列的电子特性提供了系统框架。

title: Intrinsic Negative-U Centers in Freestanding LaAlO3/SrTiO3 Micro-membranes
summary: The LaAlO3/SrTiO3 (LAO/STO) interface hosts a rich range of electronic phenomena, including unconventional electron pairing that in quantum dots gives rise to a negative effective charging energy U. Here, we show freestanding LAO/STO micro-membranes naturally hosting negative-U centers, where lateral confinement arises intrinsically, rather than from engineered nanostructures. These centers coexist with gate-tunable superconductivity and can remain stable upon thermal cycling from millikelvin temperatures to room temperature. Transport is in excellent agreement with calculations based on a negative-U Anderson model, and electrostatic simulations indicate characteristic center sizes of 20-80 nm. Our findings suggest that negative-U centers may arise from the intrinsic interfacial inhomogeneity typical of LAO/STO, and should therefore be considered a general feature of the LAO/STO interface. This could have important consequences for the microwave response of interfacial superconducting devices.

AI.tldr: LAO/STO界面中发现的负U中心是固有特性而非人工结构，这些中心与可调控超导性共存且热稳定性好，对界面超导器件有重要影响。
AI.motivation: 研究LAO/STO界面中负有效充电能U现象的本质来源，探索其是否源于界面固有特性而非人工纳米结构。
AI.method: 使用独立式LAO/STO微膜作为研究平台，通过输运测量结合负U安德森模型计算，配合静电模拟分析中心尺寸。
AI.result: 发现负U中心自然存在于微膜中，尺寸约20-80nm，与门电压可调超导性共存，且能在毫开尔文到室温的热循环中保持稳定。
AI.conclusion: 负U中心源于LAO/STO界面的固有非均匀性，是界面的普遍特征，这对界面超导器件的微波响应有重要影响。

title: Robust phonon engineering and symmetry-selective lattice dynamics in CrSBr$_{1-x}$Cl$_{x}$
summary: Atomic substitution provides a controlled route to engineer lattice dynamics in low-symmetry two-dimensional materials. Here, by combining polarization-resolved Raman spectroscopy and first-principles calculations, we investigate the evolution of phonon characteristics in CrSBr$_{1-x}$Cl$_{x}$ ($0 \leq x \leq \sim 0.5$) upon partial substitution of Br with Cl atoms. Progressive Cl substitution of Br induces systematic shifts of parent CrSBr out-of-plane $A_\textrm{g}$ phonon modes and activates additional Raman features. These features persist across different polarization configurations and excitation energies, reflecting substitution-induced symmetry lowering and local lattice perturbations. Explicit supercell phonon calculations combined with Raman $Γ$-density-of-states simulations identify these features as symmetry-lowered descendants of parent modes arising from alloy disorder. Complementary strain-dependent calculations reveal that anisotropic lattice compression plays a key role in renormalizing Cr-S dominated phonons. Under near-resonant excitation, stimulated Raman scattering-like amplification remains observable with increasing Cl content, highlighting the resilience of anisotropic electron-phonon coupling in this system.

AI.tldr: 通过CrSBr中Br被Cl部分替代，研究二维材料CrSBr₁₋ₓClₓ的声子特性演化，发现Cl替代引起声子模式系统性位移并激活新拉曼特征，揭示了合金无序导致的对称性降低和局部晶格扰动。
AI.motivation: 研究原子替代如何调控低对称性二维材料的晶格动力学，特别是通过Br被Cl部分替代来工程化CrSBr的声子特性，探索合金无序对材料物理性质的影响。
AI.method: 结合偏振分辨拉曼光谱和第一性原理计算，研究CrSBr₁₋ₓClₓ（0≤x≤~0.5）的声子特性演化。使用超胞声子计算结合拉曼Γ态密度模拟分析新特征，并进行应变相关计算。
AI.result: Cl替代Br引起母体CrSBr面外A_g声子模式的系统性位移，并激活额外的拉曼特征。这些特征在不同偏振配置和激发能量下持续存在，反映了替代诱导的对称性降低和局部晶格扰动。应变相关计算显示各向异性晶格压缩在重整化Cr-S主导声子中起关键作用。
AI.conclusion: 原子替代是调控低对称性二维材料晶格动力学的有效途径。Cl替代Br通过合金无序导致对称性降低，激活了母体声子模式的对称性降低衍生物。即使在Cl含量增加的情况下，近共振激发下的受激拉曼散射样放大仍然可观测，表明该系统中各向异性电子-声子耦合具有韧性。

title: Magnetism and 3D Electron Diffraction Solution of Hydrated Rubidium-Ruthenium Oxide Rb$_2$Ru$_2$O$_7$.H$_2$O
summary: The crystal structure of Rb$_2$Ru$_2$O$_7$.H$_2$O was determined by three-dimensional electron diffraction from the individual crystallites of a solid-state powder product. Rb$_2$Ru$_2$O$_7$.H$_2$O crystallizes in space group \textit{C}2/\textit{c} ($a=7.841(3)$ Å, $b=12.500(3)$ Å, $c=8.392(2)$ Å, $β=93.57(4)^\circ$, Z=4). The structure contains infinite chains that run normal to the (101) plane and consist of alternating RuO$_6$ octahedra and square-pyramidal RuO$_5$ units connected via shared O-O edges. Magnetic properties were measured on the bulk powder, showing a diamagnetic baseline from 300 to 60 K with a small Curie tail below 55 K. The magnetic moment, calculated from the 1.8 K isotherm, saturates at $M=4.4\times10^{-3}\,μ_\mathrm{B}\,\mathrm{Ru}^{-1}$, much less than would be expected for $S=1$ ruthenium. Bond-valence-sum analysis indicates high-valent Ru, and the near-diamagnetic response is consistent with the edge-sharing Ru-Ru motif, where weak direct Ru-Ru overlap yields a local singlet.

AI.tldr: 通过三维电子衍射解析Rb₂Ru₂O₇·H₂O晶体结构，发现其包含交替的RuO₆八面体和RuO₅四方锥构成的无限链，磁测量显示近抗磁性响应
AI.motivation: 研究Rb₂Ru₂O₇·H₂O的晶体结构以理解其独特的Ru-Ru边共享构型和相应的磁学性质，探索高价位钌化合物的结构-性能关系
AI.method: 使用三维电子衍射技术从固态粉末产物中的单个晶粒解析晶体结构，通过磁测量分析体相粉末的磁学性质，并进行键价和计算验证钌的价位
AI.result: 确定晶体为C2/c空间群，包含沿(101)面法线方向的无限链结构，链由交替的RuO₆八面体和RuO₅四方锥通过共享O-O边连接而成；磁测量显示300-60K为抗磁性基线，55K以下出现小居里尾，饱和磁矩远低于S=1钌的预期值
AI.conclusion: Rb₂Ru₂O₇·H₂O的高价位钌和边共享Ru-Ru构型导致弱直接Ru-Ru重叠，形成局域单重态，解释了其近抗磁性的磁响应特性

title: Scaling of Two-Dimensional Semiconductor Nanoribbons for High-Performance Electronics
summary: Monolayer transition metal dichalcogenide (TMD) field-effect transistors (FETs), with their atomically thin bodies, are promising candidates for future gate-all-around (GAA) nanoribbon architectures. While state-of-the-art Si GAA nanoribbon transistors feature channel widths in the tens of nanometers, most reported TMD-based FETs remain limited to micrometer-scale dimensions, limiting their relevance for ultra-scaled electronics. In this work, we investigate the channel width scaling in nanoribbon transistors based on monolayer MoS2 grown on 2-inch wafers, achieving widths of approximately 30-40 nm. Remarkably, nanoribbon width scaling enhances the on-current by 30-40%, reaching up to 700 uA/um for the smallest-width devices, while also improving the subthreshold slope (SS) to as low as 70 mV/dec. This enhancement is attributed to a stronger electric field at the nanoribbon edges without significant degradation from edge-related scattering. To further demonstrate the scalability of the nanoribbon device, we evaluate the variability of extremely scaled monolayer MoS2 nanoribbon transistor arrays featuring a contact pitch of 60 nm and an effective oxide thickness (EOT) of approximately 0.9 nm. Beyond MoS2, we extend the nanoribbon structure to WS2 n-type and WSe2 p-type FETs, demonstrating a viable path toward complementary monolayer TMD nanoribbon FETs for future ultra-scaled electronics.

AI.tldr: 该研究实现了30-40纳米宽度的单层MoS2纳米带晶体管，发现宽度缩放可将导通电流提升30-40%，亚阈值摆幅改善至70 mV/dec，并展示了60纳米接触间距的阵列可扩展性，为未来超尺度电子器件提供了可行路径。
AI.motivation: 目前大多数TMD基场效应晶体管仍限于微米级尺寸，而硅基GAA纳米带晶体管已实现数十纳米宽度，限制了TMD在超尺度电子器件中的应用潜力。
AI.method: 在2英寸晶圆上生长单层MoS2，制备宽度约30-40纳米的纳米带晶体管，并评估其电学性能；进一步测试60纳米接触间距的纳米带晶体管阵列，并将纳米带结构扩展到WS2 n型和WSe2 p型FET。
AI.result: 纳米带宽度缩放使导通电流提升30-40%，最高达700 uA/um，亚阈值摆幅改善至70 mV/dec；边缘电场增强效应主导性能提升，边缘散射影响不大；展示了60纳米接触间距阵列的可扩展性，并在WS2和WSe2上验证了纳米带结构的普适性。
AI.conclusion: 单层TMD纳米带晶体管通过宽度缩放可显著提升性能，展示了在超尺度互补逻辑器件中的应用潜力，为未来纳米电子学提供了可行的技术路径。

title: Machine Learning Guided Polymorph Selection in Molecular Beam Epitaxy of In2Se3
summary: Indium selenide (In2Se3), a layered chalcogenide with multiple polymorphs, is a promising material for optoelectronic and ferroelectric applications. However, achieving polymorph-pure thin films remains a major challenge due to the complex growth space. In this work, Bayesian Optimization (BO) is successfully leveraged to guide the molecular beam epitaxy (MBE) growth of In2Se3 on Al2O3 substrates. By training a predictive Gaussian Process Regressor with sequential learning, we efficiently explored substrate temperature, indium flux, selenium flux, and cracker temperature, reducing experimental trials required for successful synthesis. A γ-In2Se3 film with 91% phase purity was achieved after fewer than ten trials. Attempts to isolate α-In2Se3 were limited by amorphous film formation at low temperatures, indicating that single-step co-deposition is unsuitable for crystalline α-In2Se3 on Al2O3. Overall, this study validates Bayesian Optimization as a powerful approach for phase-selective growth in complex materials systems.

AI.tldr: 使用贝叶斯优化指导In2Se3薄膜的MBE生长，快速获得高纯度γ相，验证了该优化方法在复杂材料体系中的有效性。
AI.motivation: In2Se3是一种具有多种晶型的有前景材料，但获得纯相薄膜面临挑战，因为生长参数空间复杂，传统试错方法效率低。
AI.method: 采用贝叶斯优化结合高斯过程回归器，通过顺序学习探索衬底温度、铟通量、硒通量和裂解器温度等参数，指导分子束外延生长。
AI.result: 在不到10次实验后获得了91%相纯度的γ-In2Se3薄膜；尝试生长α相时发现低温下形成非晶膜，表明单步共沉积不适合在Al2O3上生长结晶α相。
AI.conclusion: 贝叶斯优化是复杂材料体系中相选择性生长的有效方法，可显著减少实验次数，提高材料合成效率。

title: Direct probing the quantum geometric tensor for bosonic collective excitations
summary: The quantum geometric tensor (QGT), whose real and imaginary parts define the quantum metric and Berry curvature, encodes the intrinsic geometry of quantum states. While electronic QGT has been directly observed and linked to various phenomena like electron-phonon coupling, its bosonic analogue remains both theoretically and experimentally unexplored. We demonstrate that the dynamical structure factor directly encodes the full QGT throughout the Brillouin zone, establishing it as a sensitive probe of both quantum metric and Berry curvature. Applying this framework, we uncover clear geometric signatures in a twofold quadruple Weyl phonon in BaPtGe and the node-line magnon in Gd. Our results establish a general, direct route to measuring quantum geometry in bosonic systems, a crucial step toward elucidating its impact on condensed matter phenomena.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出通过动力学结构因子直接测量玻色子系统的量子几何张量，并应用于声子和磁振子系统验证。
AI.motivation: 虽然电子系统的量子几何张量已被直接观测并与多种现象关联，但其玻色子对应物在理论和实验上仍未被探索。需要建立测量玻色子系统量子几何的通用方法。
AI.method: 证明动力学结构因子直接编码了整个布里渊区的完整量子几何张量，将其确立为量子度量和贝里曲率的灵敏探针。将该框架应用于BaPtGe中的双重四重外尔声子和Gd中的节点线磁振子。
AI.result: 在BaPtGe的双重四重外尔声子和Gd的节点线磁振子中发现了清晰的几何特征，验证了该方法在玻色子系统中的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 建立了一种测量玻色子系统量子几何的通用直接途径，这是阐明其对凝聚态现象影响的关键一步。

title: High-Resolution Capacitance Dilatometry of Microscopically Thin Samples Using a Miniature Dilatometer
comment: The following article has been accepted by Rev. Sci. Instrum
summary: We present a novel application of our high-resolution capacitance dilatometer, specifically engineered for the precise characterization of quantum materials. These materials, which often appear as ultrathin, platelet-shaped crystals, are known for exotic phenomena such as superconductivity, topological order and quantum spin liquid. However, these crystals seldom reach macroscopic dimensions, making them unsuitable for conventional dilatometry techniques. By introducing a modified sample-mounting configuration, our design enables high-resolution measurements of thermal expansion and magnetostriction along in-plane crystallographic directions in samples with thicknesses well below 500 $μ$m. Validation measurements using a Quantum Design PPMS system confirm reliable performance for a 300 $μ$m-thick silver platelet, relatively hard ferromagnetic EuB$_6$ single crystals down to 50 $μ$m, and a 40 $μ$m-thin, soft AgCrS$_2$ single crystal. This advancement significantly broadens the applicability of capacitance dilatometry, providing a powerful platform for investigating emergent phenomena in reduced-dimensional quantum systems.

AI.tldr: 开发了一种新型高分辨率电容膨胀计，专门用于测量超薄量子材料的平面热膨胀和磁致伸缩特性
AI.motivation: 量子材料通常呈现超薄片状晶体形态，尺寸微小（厚度<500μm），传统膨胀测量技术无法适用，需要开发专门针对这类材料的测量方法
AI.method: 设计了改进的样品安装配置，使高分辨率电容膨胀计能够测量沿晶体平面方向的热膨胀和磁致伸缩，适用于厚度低于500μm的超薄样品
AI.result: 验证实验显示该技术对300μm银片、50μm硬铁磁EuB6单晶和40μm软AgCrS2单晶均能可靠工作，性能通过Quantum Design PPMS系统确认
AI.conclusion: 该技术显著扩展了电容膨胀测量的应用范围，为研究低维量子系统中的涌现现象提供了强大平台

title: Rotating Magnetocaloric Effect in First-order Phase Transition Material Gd5Si2Ge2
comment: 18 pages, 10 figures. To be submitted for peer review
summary: The rotating magnetocaloric effect (RMCE) induced by self-demagnetization has been investigated in the giant magnetocaloric effect (GMCE) material Gd$_5$Si$_2$Ge$_2$. This shape-dependent effect had thus far only been reported in pure Gd, marking this as the first analysis of the effect in a sample with a magnetostructural first-order phase transition. By rotating the applied magnetic field vector while keeping its intensity constant, the demagnetizing field within a high-aspect ratio sample changes significantly, resulting in a RMCE. We characterize RMCE by determining the adiabatic temperature change ($ΔT_{ad}^{rot}$) directly through temperature measurements, and the isothermal entropy change ($ΔS_M^{rot}$) via magnetometry and magnetostatic simulations. We obtain a remarkable maximum $ΔT_{ad}^{rot}$ of 1.77 K for a constant external field of 0.8 T, higher than that obtained under 1.0 T. The magnetostatic simulations not only corroborate the highly non-monotonous field-dependence of $|ΔS_{M}^{rot}|$, which reaches 95\% of its maximum value at 0.8 T, 6.12 J K$^{-1}$ kg$^{-1}$ for the experimentally measured shape, but also estimate a 35\% increase in the maximum $|ΔS_{M}^{rot}|$ up to 8.67 J K$^{-1}$ kg$^{-1}$ in a simulated shape with higher aspect ratio.

AI.tldr: 首次在具有磁结构一级相变的Gd₅Si₂Ge₂材料中研究旋转磁热效应，通过旋转磁场而非改变强度，利用样品形状依赖的自退磁效应获得显著磁热响应。
AI.motivation: 研究旋转磁热效应在具有巨磁热效应的一级相变材料中的表现，此前该效应仅在纯Gd中被报道，探索形状依赖效应在复杂相变材料中的应用潜力。
AI.method: 在恒定磁场强度下旋转磁场方向，利用高纵横比样品的自退磁场变化产生旋转磁热效应；通过直接温度测量获得绝热温度变化，结合磁测量和磁静力学模拟计算等温熵变。
AI.result: 在0.8T恒定磁场下获得1.77K的最大绝热温度变化，高于1.0T下的效果；等温熵变在0.8T达到最大值的95%（6.12 J·K⁻¹·kg⁻¹），模拟更高纵横比形状可提升35%至8.67 J·K⁻¹·kg⁻¹。
AI.conclusion: 首次在磁结构一级相变材料中证实旋转磁热效应，形状依赖效应显著，通过优化样品几何形状可进一步提升性能，为磁制冷技术提供新思路。

title: Epitaxial thin film growth in the U-Ge binary system
summary: We explore the U-Ge phase diagram using thin film growth by co-deposition of U and Ge via d.c. magnetron sputtering. Using three different single crystal substrates - MgO, CaF$_2$ and SrTiO$_3$ - we have stabilised mixed phase films of mostly UGe$_3$ and UGe, with evidence of UGe$_2$ as well. At higher temperatures UO$_2$ forms as a consequence of gettering of oxygen from several types of substrate. Several UGe$_3$ dominated samples grown on MgO substrates have also been characterised electrically, showing residual resistivity ratios up to six.

AI.tldr: 通过直流磁控溅射共沉积U和Ge在MgO、CaF₂、SrTiO₃单晶衬底上制备薄膜，研究了U-Ge相图，主要得到UGe₃和UGe混合相，也有UGe₂证据；高温下衬底释放氧形成UO₂；部分MgO衬底上UGe₃为主的样品显示电阻率比高达6
AI.motivation: 探索U-Ge相图，通过薄膜生长方法研究铀锗化合物的形成条件和相稳定性
AI.method: 采用直流磁控溅射共沉积U和Ge，在三种单晶衬底（MgO、CaF₂、SrTiO₃）上生长薄膜，通过电学表征分析样品性质
AI.result: 成功稳定了主要包含UGe₃和UGe的混合相薄膜，观察到UGe₂存在证据；高温下衬底释放氧导致UO₂形成；UGe₃为主的样品显示高达6的残余电阻率比
AI.conclusion: 直流磁控溅射是研究U-Ge相图的有效方法，可在不同衬底上稳定多种铀锗化合物相，其中UGe₃表现出良好的电学性能

title: Current-driven nonlinear skyrmion dynamics in altermagnets
summary: The center of mass and helicity are two dynamic degrees of freedom of skyrmions. In this work, we study the current-driven skyrmion motion in frustrated altermagnets. Contrary to conventional wisdom, we find that the skyrmion helicity is not locked with the skyrmion Hall angle, but unidirectionally rotates with a global angular velocity proportional to the square of the current density. In addition, we find that the helicity rotation velocity is highly anisotropic, depending on the direction of current flows. We also observe helicity oscillation in the terahertz regimes, where the nonlinear mixing between the fast and slow modes generates a magnon frequency comb. Full atomistic spin dynamics simulations verify our theoretical predictions. Our results establish frustrated altermagnets as a promising platform for skyrmionics, THz technology, and frequency comb.

AI.tldr: 该研究发现在受挫交变磁体中，斯格明子的螺旋度与霍尔角不锁定，而是随电流密度平方单向旋转，且旋转速度高度各向异性，同时观察到太赫兹频段的螺旋度振荡产生磁子频率梳。
AI.motivation: 研究受挫交变磁体中斯格明子的电流驱动运动，探索其动态自由度（质心和螺旋度）的新奇行为，为斯格明子电子学、太赫兹技术和频率梳应用提供新平台。
AI.method: 结合理论分析和全原子自旋动力学模拟，研究电流驱动下受挫交变磁体中斯格明子的运动行为，特别是螺旋度与霍尔角的解耦关系以及螺旋度旋转的各向异性特性。
AI.result: 发现斯格明子螺旋度不与霍尔角锁定，而是以与电流密度平方成正比的全局角速度单向旋转；螺旋度旋转速度高度各向异性，取决于电流方向；观察到太赫兹频段的螺旋度振荡，其中快慢模式非线性混合产生磁子频率梳。
AI.conclusion: 受挫交变磁体为斯格明子电子学、太赫兹技术和频率梳应用提供了有前景的平台，揭示了斯格明子螺旋度动态的新物理机制。

title: CatMaster: An Agentic Autonomous System for Computational Heterogeneous Catalysis Research
summary:
Density functional theory (DFT) is widely used to connect atomic structure with catalytic behavior, but computational heterogeneous catalysis studies often require long workflows that are costly, iterative, and sensitive to setup choices. Besides the intrinsic cost and accuracy limits of first-principles calculations, practical workflow issues such as keeping references consistent, preparing many related inputs, recovering from failed runs on computing clusters, and maintaining a complete record of what was done, can slow down projects and make results difficult to reproduce or extend.
  Here we present CatMaster, a large-language-model (LLM)-driven agent system that turns natural language requests into complete calculation workspaces, including structures, inputs, outputs, logs, and a concise run record. CatMaster maintains a persistent project record of key facts, constraints, and file pointers to support inspection and restartability. It is paired with a multi-fidelity tool library that covers rapid surrogate relaxations and high-fidelity DFT calculations for validation when needed. We demonstrate CatMaster on four demonstrations of increasing complexity: an O2 spin-state check with remote execution, BCC Fe surface energies with a protocol-sensitivity study and CO adsorption site ranking, high-throughput Pt--Ni--Cu alloy screening for hydrogen evolution reaction (HER) descriptors with surrogate-to-DFT validation, and a demonstration beyond the predefined tool set, including equation-of-state fitting for BCC Fe and CO-FeN4-graphene single-atom catalyst geometry preparation. By reducing manual scripting and bookkeeping while keeping the full evidence trail, CatMaster aims to help catalysis researchers focus on modeling choices and chemical interpretation rather than workflow management.

AI.tldr: CatMaster是一个基于大语言模型的智能代理系统，可将自然语言请求转化为完整的计算工作空间，自动化催化研究工作流程，减少手动脚本编写和记录工作。
AI.motivation: 传统DFT催化研究存在工作流程复杂、成本高、迭代性强、对设置敏感等问题，且存在引用一致性、输入准备、计算失败恢复、完整记录维护等实际问题，这些都会减慢项目进度并使结果难以复现或扩展。
AI.method: 开发了一个基于大语言模型的智能代理系统CatMaster，能够将自然语言请求转化为包含结构、输入、输出、日志和简洁运行记录的完整计算工作空间。系统维护持久化的项目记录，包含关键事实、约束和文件指针，支持检查和可重启性。系统还配备了多保真度工具库，涵盖快速代理松弛和高保真DFT计算。
AI.result: 在四个复杂度递增的演示中验证了CatMaster：1）O2自旋态检查与远程执行；2）BCC Fe表面能与协议敏感性研究及CO吸附位点排序；3）用于氢析出反应描述符的高通量Pt-Ni-Cu合金筛选，并进行代理到DFT验证；4）超出预定义工具集的演示，包括BCC Fe的状态方程拟合和CO-FeN4-石墨烯单原子催化剂几何结构准备。
AI.conclusion: CatMaster通过减少手动脚本编写和记录工作，同时保持完整的证据链，旨在帮助催化研究人员专注于建模选择和化学解释，而不是工作流程管理。

title: Hybrid Epitaxial Al/InGaAs system: Solid-state dewetting and Al facet formation
summary: Hybrid superconductor--semiconductor platforms can host subgap electronic excitations such as Andreev bound states (ABSs); in topological regimes, a special zero-energy class, Majorana bound states (MBSs), can emerge. Here we report the growth of epitaxial Al films by molecular-beam epitaxy on $\mathrm{In_{0.75}Ga_{0.25}As}$ under near-room-temperature substrate conditions. Using a combination of AFM/SEM, cross-sectional TEM, and \emph{in situ} RHEED, we map how substrate temperature and Al deposition rate govern film morphology, continuity, and interface quality. We identify a growth window that yields continuous, superconducting Al films with an abrupt $\mathrm{Al}/\mathrm{In_{0.75}Ga_{0.25}As}$ interface and no detectable indium interdiffusion. We further investigate the thermal stability of these films under \emph{in situ} post-growth heating and \emph{ex situ} annealing following surface oxidation. For unoxidized Al, rapid surface diffusion triggers solid-state dewetting at approximately $165\,^\circ\mathrm{C}$, resulting in the formation of $\{111\}$-faceted Al islands. In contrast, the presence of a native oxide largely suppresses dewetting, with failure occurring only locally at surface defects. Annealing above the indium melting point ($156.6\,^\circ\mathrm{C}$) induces significant In surface migration in both cases, leading either to localized interfacial In inclusions beneath Al agglomerates or to uniform surface contamination at sites of localized layer breakdown. Together, these results define growth and annealing conditions for thermally robust epitaxial Al on III--V semiconductors and provide practical guidance for fabricating high-quality superconductor--semiconductor hybrid platforms for quantum devices.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了在In0.75Ga0.25As上分子束外延生长Al薄膜的优化条件，探索了温度、沉积速率对薄膜质量的影响，并分析了热稳定性、氧化和退火对界面特性的影响。
AI.motivation: 超导体-半导体混合平台可以承载Andreev束缚态和Majorana束缚态等亚能隙电子激发态，这对于量子器件至关重要。然而，需要高质量的Al/III-V半导体界面来实现这些应用。
AI.method: 使用分子束外延在近室温条件下在In0.75Ga0.25As上生长Al薄膜。通过AFM/SEM、横截面TEM和原位RHEED分析薄膜形貌、连续性和界面质量。研究不同生长条件（温度和沉积速率）的影响，并分析热稳定性、氧化和退火后的界面变化。
AI.result: 找到了一个生长窗口，能够获得连续、超导的Al薄膜，具有尖锐的Al/In0.75Ga0.25As界面且无明显的In互扩散。未氧化的Al在约165°C时发生固态去湿，形成{111}面Al岛；而原生氧化物能显著抑制去湿。退火超过In熔点会导致In表面迁移，形成局部界面In夹杂物或表面污染。
AI.conclusion: 该研究确定了在III-V半导体上生长热稳定外延Al薄膜的生长和退火条件，为制造高质量超导体-半导体混合量子器件平台提供了实用指导。

title: GPUTB-2:An efficient E(3) network method for learning high-precision orthogonal Hamiltonian
summary: Although equivariant neural networks have become a cornerstone for learning electronic Hamiltonians, the intrinsic non-orthogonality of linear combinations of atomic orbitals (LCAO) basis sets poses a fundamental challenge. The computational cost of Hamiltonian orthogonalization scales as O(N^3), which severely hinders electronic structure calculations for large-scale systems containing hundreds of thousands to millions of atoms. To address this issue, we develop GPUTB-2, a framework that learns implicitly orthogonality-preserving Hamiltonians by training directly on electronic band structures. Benefiting from an E(3)-equivariant network accelerated by Gaunt tensor product and SO(2) tensor product layers, GPUTB-2 achieves significantly higher accuracy than GPUTB across multiple benchmark systems. Moreover, GPUTB-2 accurately predicts large-scale electronic structures, including transport properties of temperature-perturbed SnSe and the band structures of magic-angle twisted bilayer graphene. By further integrating this framework with the linear-scaling quantum transport (LSQT) method, we investigate the electronic properties of million-atom amorphous graphene and uncover pressure-induced electronic structure transitions in more complex amorphous silicon. Together, these results establish GPUTB-2 as a high-accuracy and scalable approach for predicting orthogonal Hamiltonians.

AI.tldr: GPUTB-2是一个学习隐式保持正交性的哈密顿量的框架，通过直接在电子能带结构上训练，解决了LCAO基组非正交性带来的计算瓶颈，实现了高精度和大规模电子结构预测。
AI.motivation: 线性组合原子轨道基组的固有非正交性对学习电子哈密顿量构成根本挑战，哈密顿量正交化的计算成本随O(N^3)增长，严重阻碍了包含数十万到数百万原子的大规模系统的电子结构计算。
AI.method: 开发GPUTB-2框架，通过直接在电子能带结构上训练来学习隐式保持正交性的哈密顿量。利用Gaunt张量积和SO(2)张量积层加速的E(3)-等变网络，并与线性标度量子输运方法集成。
AI.result: GPUTB-2在多个基准系统中比GPUTB获得显著更高的精度，准确预测了温度扰动SnSe的输运性质和魔角扭曲双层石墨烯的能带结构，并揭示了百万原子非晶石墨烯的电子性质和非晶硅的压力诱导电子结构转变。
AI.conclusion: GPUTB-2建立了一个高精度且可扩展的预测正交哈密顿量的方法，能够处理大规模系统的电子结构计算，为复杂材料的电子性质研究提供了有力工具。

title: Near-atomic investigation on the elemental redistribution during co-precipitation of nano-sized kappa phase and B2 phase in an Al-alloyed lightweight steel
summary: In the present study, correlative transmission Kikuchi diffraction transmission electron microscopy (TKD-TEM) measurements, atom probe tomography (APT), and density functional theory (DFT) calculations are used to reveal the elemental redistribution during co-precipitation of nanosized kappa and B2 phases in an FCC matrix of an Al alloyed Fe-10Al-7Mn-6Ni-1C (wt.%) steel. Upon ageing at 800 C for 15 min, two co-nanoprecipitation modes are observed: B2 forming together with kappa and B2 forming separately from kappa in the FCC matrix. APT reveals that the B2 precipitate next to kappa (referred to as B2I) is close to an FeAl type phase, while the isolated B2 precipitate (referred to as B2II) is close to a NiAl type phase. The kappa precipitates maintain a nearly constant Al content of approximately 18.4 at.% regardless of their precipitation position. DFT confirms that kappa may accommodate limited Ni substitution at Fe sites without losing structural stability, and that Fe Ni atomic exchange between kappa and B2 is thermodynamically favorable at 800 C. This exchange drives the B2 phase to evolve from a NiAl type towards an FeAl type, improving the stability of both phases during co-precipitation. These results provide understanding of kappa B2 interactions and offer insights for designing nanosized intermetallic strengthened microstructures in Al alloyed lightweight steels.

AI.tldr: 通过TKD-TEM、APT和DFT研究Fe-10Al-7Mn-6Ni-1C钢中κ和B2相共沉淀的元素再分布，发现两种共沉淀模式，B2相从NiAl型向FeAl型演化，提高相稳定性。
AI.motivation: 研究铝合金轻质钢中纳米级κ和B2相共沉淀时的元素再分布机制，理解相间相互作用，为设计纳米金属间化合物强化微观结构提供基础。
AI.method: 采用相关透射菊池衍射透射电镜(TKD-TEM)、原子探针层析(APT)和密度泛函理论(DFT)计算相结合的方法，分析800°C时效15分钟后κ和B2相的共沉淀行为。
AI.result: 观察到两种共沉淀模式：κ相与B2相共同形成，以及B2相单独在FCC基体中形成。靠近κ相的B2I相接近FeAl型，而孤立的B2II相接近NiAl型。κ相保持约18.4 at.%的恒定Al含量。DFT证实κ相可容纳有限Ni替代Fe位点，且κ与B2相间的Fe-Ni原子交换在800°C热力学有利，驱动B2相从NiAl型向FeAl型演化。
AI.conclusion: κ和B2相间的Fe-Ni原子交换驱动B2相从NiAl型向FeAl型演化，提高两相在共沉淀过程中的稳定性，为设计铝合金轻质钢中纳米金属间化合物强化微观结构提供重要见解。

title: Influence of Ru content on electrocatalytic activity and defect formation of Au-Pd-Pt-Ru compositionally complex solid solution thin films
summary: Compositionally complex solid solutions (CCSSs) consist of a randomly mixed single phase with the potential to enhance electrocatalytic activity through their polyelemental surface atom arrangements. However, microstructural complexity originating from multiple principal elements influences local structure, chemistry, and lattice strain, which might also affect electrocatalytic activity. Here, we investigate the effect of Ru content on electrochemistry and defect formation in Au-Pd-Pt-Ru CCSS thin films. Such defects could provide active sites when terminating at the CCSS surface or modify surface composition through preferential segregation. A thin-film material library covering a wide composition range was fabricated by room-temperature combinatorial co-sputtering. High-throughput compositional, structural and functional characterization, including electron microscopy equipped with energy dispersive X-ray spectroscopy, X-ray diffraction, and electrochemical screening, were used to correlate composition and microstructural features with catalytic activity. Three representative compositions selected from the library - Au68Pd13Pt15Ru4, Au27Pd24Pt23Ru26, and Au9Pd21Pt18Ru52 - were examined in detail. The three samples exhibit face-centered cubic structures, with lattice contraction occurring with increasing Ru content. In addition, with increasing Ru content, a transition from a high density of nanotwins to high-density, atomic-layer stacking faults was observed. Moreover, the hydrogen evolution reaction activity improves with higher Ru content. Atom probe tomography reveals local compositional fluctuations, including element-specific enrichment and depletion at grain boundaries. The findings provide a new insight into surface atom arrangement design in the CCSS electrocatalysts with enhanced performance.

AI.tldr: 研究Ru含量对Au-Pd-Pt-Ru复合固溶体薄膜电化学性能和缺陷形成的影响，发现Ru含量增加导致晶格收缩、缺陷类型转变（从纳米孪晶到堆垛层错），并提高析氢反应活性。
AI.motivation: 复合固溶体(CCSS)的多元素表面原子排列可能增强电催化活性，但微观结构复杂性（包括局部结构、化学和晶格应变）也可能影响电催化性能。需要研究Ru含量如何影响Au-Pd-Pt-Ru CCSS薄膜的电化学性能和缺陷形成。
AI.method: 采用室温组合共溅射制备覆盖宽组成范围的薄膜材料库，通过高通量表征（包括EDS能谱的电子显微镜、X射线衍射、电化学筛选）关联组成与微观结构特征。选取三个代表性组成进行详细研究，并使用原子探针层析技术分析局部成分波动。
AI.result: 1. 所有样品均为面心立方结构，Ru含量增加导致晶格收缩；2. Ru含量增加时，缺陷从高密度纳米孪晶转变为高密度原子层堆垛层错；3. 析氢反应活性随Ru含量增加而提高；4. 原子探针层析显示晶界处存在元素特异性富集和耗尽的局部成分波动。
AI.conclusion: Ru含量通过影响晶格应变、缺陷类型和局部成分波动来调控Au-Pd-Pt-Ru CCSS的电催化性能，为设计具有增强性能的CCSS电催化剂表面原子排列提供了新见解。

title: Nanoparticle Self-assembly Assisted by Polymers: The Role of Shear Stress in the Nanoparticle Arrangement of Langmuir and Langmuir-Blodgett Films
summary: We propose to use the self-assembly ability of a block copolymer combined with compression-expansion cycles to obtain CdSe quantum dots (QDs) structures of different morphology. The methodology proposed consists in transferring onto mica mixed Langmuir monolayers of QDs and the polymer poly (styrene-co-maleic anhydride) partial 2 buthoxy ethyl ester cumene terminated, PS-MA-BEE, previously sheared by 50 compression-expansion cycles. Results indicate that the shear stress takes out nanoparticles at the air-water interface from metastable states and promoted a new equilibrium state of the Langmuir monolayer, then it was transferred onto mica by the Langmuir-Blodgett (LB) methodology and the morphology of the LB films was analyzed by Atomic Force Microscopy and Transmission Electron Microscopy measurements. Our results show that when the amplitude strain increases the QDs domain size decreases and the LB film becomes more ordered. The dynamic of the monolayer relaxation after cycling involves at least three timescales which are related to the damping of surface fluctuation, raft rearrangement and component movements inside each raft. Brewster Angle Microscopy allowed visualizing in situ the raft rearrangement at the air-water interface.
