AI.tldr: 利用嵌段共聚物的自组装能力结合压缩-膨胀循环，获得不同形态的CdSe量子点结构
AI.motivation: 开发一种通过控制剪切应力来调控量子点组装形态的新方法，以获得更有序的量子点薄膜结构
AI.method: 将CdSe量子点与PS-MA-BEE聚合物混合形成Langmuir单层膜，通过50次压缩-膨胀循环施加剪切应力，然后使用Langmuir-Blodgett技术转移到云母基底上
AI.result: 应变幅度增加时，量子点畴尺寸减小，LB薄膜变得更加有序；单层弛豫动力学涉及三个时间尺度，分别与表面波动阻尼、筏状结构重排和组分在筏内的运动相关
AI.conclusion: 压缩-膨胀循环产生的剪切应力能够使量子点从亚稳态转变为新的平衡态，从而实现量子点组装形态的可控调控，为制备有序量子点薄膜提供了一种有效方法

title: Janus MoSSe/WSSe Heterobilayers as Selective Photocatalysts for Water Splitting
summary: Identifying materials that simultaneously straddle the water redox potentials and possess an intrinsic electric field is crucial for achieving high solar-to-hydrogen (STH) efficiency. Using state-of-the-art first-principles calculations, including a range-separated hybrid functional and spin-orbit coupling, we investigate MoXY/WXY (X, Y = S, Se) Janus bilayers for overall water splitting. We find that the Se-Se interfaced heterobilayer is intrinsically capable of driving water splitting, while its S-S counterpart can meet the redox requirements through pH modulation. For both configurations, a remarkable STH efficiency of 17.1\% is predicted. Compared with homo-bilayers, hetero-bilayers benefit from the chemical potential difference between Mo and W, which generates a built-in electric field and promotes spatial separation of photogenerated carriers, suppressing recombination and overall enhancing hydrogen production. These results demonstrate the promise of Janus heterobilayers for efficient solar-driven water splitting.

AI.tldr: MoXY/WXY Janus双层材料通过异质结构的内建电场和能带调控，实现高效太阳能驱动水分解，预测STH效率达17.1%
AI.motivation: 寻找同时满足水氧化还原电位且具有内建电场的材料是实现高效太阳能制氢的关键。传统材料在同时满足这两个条件方面存在挑战。
AI.method: 采用第一性原理计算，包括范围分离杂化泛函和自旋轨道耦合，研究MoXY/WXY (X, Y = S, Se) Janus双层材料用于整体水分解。
AI.result: Se-Se界面异质双层本征能够驱动水分解，S-S对应结构可通过pH调控满足氧化还原要求。两种配置均预测达到17.1%的显著STH效率。异质双层受益于Mo和W之间的化学势差异，产生内建电场促进光生载流子空间分离。
AI.conclusion: Janus异质双层材料在高效太阳能驱动水分解方面展现出巨大潜力，其内建电场和载流子分离机制为设计高效光催化剂提供了新思路。

title: Determinants of Self-Interstitial Energetics in Refractory High-Entropy Alloys
summary: Self-interstitials play a central role in governing the mechanical and anti-irradiation properties of refractory high-entropy alloys (RHEAs), however, the prediction of interstitial formation energies (Ef) is formidable due to the chemically complex environments in RHEAs. Herein, we develop a framework based on the tight-binding model to quantify the effects of complex alloying and lattice distortion on Ef. Our scheme reveals that Ef is jointly determined by the average d-band center of RHEAs and the d-band width of interstitial sites. Notably, the d-band width mainly depends on the interatomic hopping matrix and atomic size-determined coordination number, which together make the metallic bonding around interstitials in RHEAs resemble the distance-dependence law of van der Waals forces. By capturing d-band coupling character, our descriptor describes both interstitial configurations within a universal framework. Our model reveals a new physical picture of interstitial formation, providing a useful tool for the design of high-performance RHEAs.

AI.tldr: 开发基于紧束缚模型的框架，量化复杂合金化和晶格畸变对高熵合金中间隙形成能的影响，揭示间隙形成能与d带中心和宽度相关的新物理图像。
AI.motivation: 自间隙原子在调控难熔高熵合金的力学和抗辐照性能中起关键作用，但由于RHEAs中化学环境的复杂性，预测间隙形成能非常困难。
AI.method: 基于紧束缚模型开发框架，量化复杂合金化和晶格畸变对间隙形成能的影响，通过d带中心和间隙位点d带宽度的耦合特征来描述间隙形成能。
AI.result: 发现间隙形成能由RHEAs的平均d带中心和间隙位点的d带宽度共同决定，d带宽度主要取决于原子间跳跃矩阵和原子尺寸决定的配位数，使RHEAs中间隙周围的金属键合类似于范德华力的距离依赖性规律。
AI.conclusion: 该模型揭示了间隙形成的新物理图像，为高性能RHEAs的设计提供了有用工具，能够在一个统一框架内描述不同间隙构型。

title: Dynamic Multiband Microscopy: A Universal Paradigm for Quantitative Nanoscale Metrology
summary: Scanning Probe Microscopy (SPM) is the primary tool for exploring nanoscale functionality, yet standard single-frequency operation is fundamentally limited, because the dynamic tip-sample interaction is mathematically underdetermined. While advanced methods such as Dual Amplitude Resonance Tracking (DART) and Band Excitation (BE) address this by tracking resonance, they face critical limitations: DART suffers from feedback instability on complex topographies, while Band Excitation is constrained by severe trade-offs between spectral resolution and acquisition speed. Here, we introduce Dynamic Multiband Microscopy (DMM), a general framework that bridges these gaps by combining multifrequency excitation with continuous frequency sweeping. We implement this within an automated experimental workflow that autonomously identifies and targets measurement points of interest. In combination with quantitative interferometric detection, this approach brings SPM to the fundamental limits of noise and spectral sensitivity. Validated on ferroelectric nanofibers, this platform enables simultaneous, crosstalk-free 3D polarization mapping, establishing a universal framework for autonomous, high-fidelity nanoscale metrology.

AI.tldr: 提出动态多频显微镜(DMM)框架，结合多频激发与连续频率扫描，解决传统SPM技术局限性，实现高保真纳米尺度计量
AI.motivation: 传统扫描探针显微镜(SPM)的单频操作在数学上是不确定的，无法充分表征动态针尖-样品相互作用。现有先进方法如DART和BE各有局限：DART在复杂地形上存在反馈不稳定问题，BE则在光谱分辨率和采集速度之间存在严重权衡
AI.method: 提出动态多频显微镜(DMM)通用框架，结合多频激发与连续频率扫描。构建自动化实验工作流程，自主识别和定位感兴趣测量点。结合定量干涉检测技术，将SPM推向噪声和光谱灵敏度的基本极限
AI.result: 在铁电纳米纤维上验证，该平台能够同时进行无串扰的3D极化映射，建立了自主、高保真纳米尺度计量的通用框架
AI.conclusion: DMM框架成功解决了传统SPM技术的局限性，通过结合多频激发和连续扫描，实现了高保真、自主的纳米尺度计量，为纳米功能探索提供了更强大的工具

title: Grain-Growth Stagnation from Vacancy-Diffusion-Limited Disconnection Climb
summary: Grain growth in polycrystals typically stagnates at long times. We identify disconnection climb, limited by vacancy diffusion, as a fundamental microscopic mechanism underlying this behavior. Using a phase-field crystal framework extended to model vacancy diffusion, we resolve grain-boundary migration on diffusive time scales and show that disconnection climb rates correlate with the characteristic grain size at which growth arrests. These results link vacancy transport, disconnection dynamics, and microstructural evolution, establishing vacancy diffusion as a key governing factor.

AI.tldr: 研究发现空位扩散控制的位错攀移是导致多晶材料晶粒生长停滞的微观机制
AI.motivation: 多晶材料中晶粒生长通常在长时间后停滞，需要揭示其微观机制
AI.method: 使用扩展的相场晶体框架模拟空位扩散，在扩散时间尺度上解析晶界迁移
AI.result: 位错攀移速率与晶粒生长停滞的特征晶粒尺寸相关，空位扩散是主要控制因素
AI.conclusion: 空位扩散是连接空位输运、位错动力学和微观结构演化的关键因素，解释了晶粒生长停滞现象

title: Correlated domain and crystallographic orientation mapping in uniaxial ferroelectric polycrystals by interferometric vector piezoresponse force microscopy
comment: 11 pages total (5 pages main text + 6 pages supplementary), 7 figures total (5 in main text + 2 in supplementary)
summary: Ongoing advances in scanning probe microscopy techniques are continually expanding the possibilities for nanoscale characterization and correlated studies of functional materials. Here, we demonstrate how a recent extension of piezoresponse force microscopy (PFM), known as interferometric vector PFM, can be utilized for simultaneously mapping the local crystallographic orientations and the domain structure of distributed grains in uniaxial ferroelectric polycrystals. By shifting the laser beam position on the cantilever, direction-dependent piezoresponse signals are acquired analogous to classical vector PFM, but without the need to rotate the sample. Using polycrystalline ErMnO$_{3}$ as a model system, we demonstrate that the reconstructed piezoresponse vectors correlate one-to-one with the crystallographic orientations of the micrometer-sized grains, carrying grain-orientation and domain-related information. We establish a versatile approach for rapid, multimodal characterization of polycrystalline uniaxial ferroelectrics, enabling automated, high-throughput reconstruction of polarization and grain orientations with nanoscale precision.

AI.tldr: 利用干涉式矢量压电力显微镜技术，无需旋转样品即可同时绘制多晶铁电体的局部晶体取向和畴结构，实现高通量纳米级表征。
AI.motivation: 传统压电力显微镜在表征多晶铁电材料时需要旋转样品才能获取不同方向的压电响应信号，这限制了表征效率和自动化程度。需要开发一种无需样品旋转就能同时获取晶体取向和畴结构信息的高通量表征方法。
AI.method: 采用干涉式矢量压电力显微镜技术，通过改变激光束在悬臂梁上的位置，获取方向依赖的压电响应信号，类似于传统矢量PFM但无需旋转样品。以多晶ErMnO₃为模型系统，重建压电响应矢量与微米级晶粒的晶体取向一一对应。
AI.result: 成功实现了多晶铁电材料中局部晶体取向和畴结构的同步映射。重建的压电响应矢量与晶粒的晶体取向呈一一对应关系，同时携带晶粒取向和畴结构信息。该方法能够以纳米级精度自动、高通量地重建极化和晶粒取向。
AI.conclusion: 干涉式矢量压电力显微镜为多晶单轴铁电体提供了一种快速、多模态的表征方法，无需样品旋转即可实现自动化的高通量表征，显著提高了纳米尺度表征的效率和精度。

title: Binding Energies of Charged Particles on Dielectric Surfaces in Liquid Nitrogen
summary: A new approach for determining the binding energies of charged particles, such as ions and electrons, on dielectric surfaces in cryogenic liquids is introduced. The experimental technique outlined in this paper is employed to observe the buildup of charged particles on nonconductive surfaces using the electro-optic Kerr effect. The initial results of binding energy measurements on surfaces of deuterated tetraphenyl butadiene (dTPB)-coated and uncoated polymethyl methacrylate (PMMA) in liquid nitrogen are presented. Under these conditions, the ions or electrons displayed binding energies of less than 1 meV. Although these findings were obtained in liquid nitrogen, the methodology is not limited to cryogenic liquids and is applicable to a wide variety of fluids, with no essential dependence on temperature.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种测量低温液体中电介质表面带电粒子结合能的新方法，利用电光克尔效应观测带电粒子在非导电表面的积累，首次测量了液氮中dTPB涂层和未涂层PMMA表面的结合能。
AI.motivation: 需要一种能够测量低温液体中电介质表面带电粒子（如离子和电子）结合能的方法，这对于理解表面电荷积累现象和开发相关应用至关重要。
AI.method: 利用电光克尔效应观测带电粒子在非导电表面的积累，通过实验技术测量结合能，在液氮环境中测试了dTPB涂层和未涂层PMMA表面。
AI.result: 在液氮条件下，离子或电子在dTPB涂层和未涂层PMMA表面显示的结合能小于1 meV，表明这些表面的结合能非常低。
AI.conclusion: 该方法不仅适用于低温液体，还可广泛应用于各种流体，且对温度没有本质依赖，为测量不同介质表面带电粒子结合能提供了通用工具。

title: Gilbert Damping Parameters of Epitaxially-Stabilized Iron Gallium Thin Films from Ferromagnetic Resonance
summary: Iron gallium (FeGa) alloys are excellent rare-earth-free magnetostrictors. Through epitaxial stabilization, the disordered A2 alloy can be extended from 19% to 30% gallium resulting in a magnetostrictive coefficient almost twice than that which is seen in rare earth magnetostrictors like SmFe2. In a composite magnetoelectric structure, this makes epitaxially-stabilized iron gallium a key material for energy-efficient beyond CMOS technologies. The energy dissipation and speed of magnetoelectric switching, however, is affected by the magnetic resonance frequency and damping. Here we report the evolution of the ferromagnetic resonance and key materials parameters (magnetic anisotropy, magnetic damping, and magnetostriction coefficient) for 70 nm thick epitaxially-stabilized single crystal A2 FeGa films beyond 19% Ga. Using flip chip ferromagnetic resonance (1-14 GHz), we find that the Gilbert damping parameter spans the range of 0.09-0.16 and decreases as the Ga concentration increases. This correlates an increasing magnetoelastic coupling with a reduction in the Gilbert damping. We find that the effective damping is a mix of contributions from the intrinsic magnon-phonon scattering and other scattering/dissipation mechanisms, with the latter being dominant especially at high Ga composition. Our results provide insight into the mechanism of magnetic relaxation in metastable high magnetostriction materials and potential switching behavior of composite magnetoelectrics.

AI.tldr: FeGa合金通过外延稳定化可将Ga含量从19%提升至30%，磁致伸缩系数达稀土材料SmFe2的两倍，但磁电开关性能受磁共振频率和阻尼影响。研究测量了高Ga含量FeGa薄膜的磁共振和材料参数，发现Gilbert阻尼随Ga浓度增加而降低，与磁弹耦合增强相关。
AI.motivation: FeGa合金作为无稀土磁致伸缩材料，通过外延稳定化可大幅提升Ga含量和磁致伸缩性能，在磁电复合结构中具有应用潜力。但磁电开关的能量耗散和速度受磁共振频率和阻尼影响，需要研究高Ga含量FeGa薄膜的磁动力学特性。
AI.method: 使用翻转芯片铁磁共振技术（1-14 GHz）测量70 nm厚外延稳定化单晶A2 FeGa薄膜的磁共振特性，分析Ga含量超过19%时的磁各向异性、磁阻尼和磁致伸缩系数等关键材料参数。
AI.result: Gilbert阻尼参数范围为0.09-0.16，随Ga浓度增加而降低，这与磁弹耦合增强相关。有效阻尼由本征磁子-声子散射和其他散射/耗散机制共同贡献，后者在高Ga组分中占主导地位。
AI.conclusion: 研究揭示了亚稳态高磁致伸缩材料中的磁弛豫机制，为理解复合磁电材料的潜在开关行为提供了重要见解，有助于优化磁电器件的能量效率和开关速度。

title: Resolving Overlapping EBSD Patterns by Experiment -- Simulation Residuals Analysis
summary: In the technique of Electron Backscatter Diffraction (EBSD), the accurate detection and identification of different phases existing in a sample is often limited by overlapping Kikuchi diffraction patterns originating from the extended probing volume of the individual EBSD map points measured in the scanning electron microscope (SEM). We present an iterative approach that uses simulated Kikuchi patterns to resolve several overlapping diffraction signals. For each measured EBSD pattern, our method first identifies the best-fit simulated Kikuchi pattern using dynamic template matching. This simulated, ideal reference pattern is then further processed to optimally match the experimental image, uncovering any underlying weaker signals after subtraction. Repeatedly utilizing dynamic template matching and pattern subtraction on residual signals of subsequent steps enables the identification of minor phases that might otherwise be missed from the probing volume of the EBSD map point. This method significantly improves phase detection in complex materials, addressing a key limitation of conventional EBSD analysis that conventionally assigns a single phase to each map point. The present method does not require a known orientation relationship between the phases of the overlapping patterns or close neighbor experimental patterns like previously published approaches.

AI.tldr: 提出一种迭代方法，使用模拟菊池衍射图案来解析EBSD中重叠的衍射信号，通过动态模板匹配和图案相减识别次要相，无需已知相间取向关系或邻近实验图案。
AI.motivation: 传统EBSD分析中，由于扫描电子显微镜中单个EBSD映射点的探测体积较大，不同相的重叠菊池衍射图案限制了相的准确检测和识别。传统方法通常为每个映射点分配单一相，无法有效处理复杂材料中的多相重叠问题。
AI.method: 采用迭代方法：1) 对每个测量的EBSD图案，使用动态模板匹配找到最佳匹配的模拟菊池图案；2) 进一步处理模拟参考图案以最佳匹配实验图像；3) 通过相减揭示底层较弱信号；4) 在后续步骤的残差信号上重复进行动态模板匹配和图案相减，识别可能被忽略的次要相。
AI.result: 该方法显著提高了复杂材料中的相检测能力，解决了传统EBSD分析的关键限制。与先前方法不同，本方法不需要已知重叠图案相间的取向关系，也不需要邻近实验图案。
AI.conclusion: 提出的迭代方法能够有效解析EBSD中重叠的衍射信号，识别次要相，为复杂材料的相分析提供了改进方案，克服了传统EBSD分析中单相分配的限制。

title: Faster grain-boundary diffusion with a higher activation enthalpy than bulk diffusion in ionic space-charge layers
summary: Faster diffusion of cations along grain boundaries is reported in the literature for a variety of acceptor-doped $AB\mathrm{O}_{3}$ perovskite-type oxides. The ratio $r$ of the activation enthalpy of grain-boundary diffusion ($ΔH^\mathrm{gb}$) to the activation enthalpy of bulk diffusion ($ΔH^\mathrm{b}$) is seen experimentally to lie in the range $0.7 < r = ΔH^\mathrm{gb} / ΔH^\mathrm{b} < 1.3$, albeit with substantial errors. In a previous publication [Parras and De Souza, Acta Mater. 195 (2020) 383] it was shown through a set of continuum simulations that cation-vacancy accumulation within negative space-charge layers at grain boundaries in acceptor-doped perovskites will give rise to faster grain-boundary diffusion of cations, with the associated values of $r$ approaching but not exceeding unity. In the present study, we demonstrate by means of continuum simulations that under certain conditions $r > 1$ is achievable for faster cation diffusion along grain boundaries in an acceptor-doped perovskite ceramic. Diffusion profiles for a two-dimensional bicrystal geometry are obtained by solving, first, Poisson's equation, and subsequently, the diffusion equation. The specific case we consider is cation migration occurring by two related mechanisms, by isolated cation vacancies and by defect associates of cation and anion vacancies; the electric potential within the space-charge layers shifts the association equilibrium so that associate diffusion dominates in the bulk whereas isolated vacancy diffusion dominates within the space-charge layers. The conditions under which $r > 1$ is observed are described, and issues with experimental confirmation are discussed.

AI.tldr: 本文通过连续介质模拟证明，在特定条件下，受主掺杂钙钛矿陶瓷中沿晶界的阳离子扩散活化能比值r可以大于1，即晶界扩散活化能高于体扩散活化能。
AI.motivation: 先前研究发现，在受主掺杂的ABO₃钙钛矿型氧化物中，阳离子沿晶界的扩散通常比体扩散更快，实验观测到的活化能比值r在0.7到1.3之间。但之前的模拟显示，由于负空间电荷层中阳离子空位积累，r值接近但不超过1。本研究旨在探索在何种条件下可以实现r>1的情况。
AI.method: 采用连续介质模拟方法，首先求解泊松方程，然后求解扩散方程，获得二维双晶几何结构的扩散剖面。具体考虑阳离子通过两种相关机制迁移：孤立阳离子空位机制，以及阳离子和阴离子空位缺陷缔合机制。空间电荷层内的电势会改变缔合平衡，使得缔合扩散在体相中占主导，而孤立空位扩散在空间电荷层内占主导。
AI.result: 模拟结果表明，在特定条件下可以实现r>1，即晶界扩散活化能高于体扩散活化能。这发生在空间电荷层内电势改变缺陷缔合平衡的情况下，使得孤立空位扩散在晶界区域占主导，而缔合扩散在体相中占主导。
AI.conclusion: 本研究证明了在受主掺杂钙钛矿陶瓷中，通过空间电荷层内电势调节缺陷缔合平衡，可以实现阳离子沿晶界扩散的活化能比值r>1。这为理解晶界扩散机制提供了新的视角，并讨论了实验验证中可能遇到的问题。
